23b5: bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab brgyar brjod kyang / / de ya bsngags pa zad par sla ba men// de phyir byang chub mchog rab bla na med// ye shes phung po 'tshang rgyar su 'dod pa// de ni rgyal bas bsngags pa'i bzod bsgoms// byang chub dam
23b6: pa rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur/ / bzod pa la 'jug pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa// gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems
23b7: dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas chos thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes la mkhas par bya'o// /
23b8: gzhon nu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams

24a1: cad dngos po med pa/ / ngo bo nyid med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ yi ge med pa/ stong pa/ gzod ma nas zhi ba/ rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa yin par rab tu shes par bya'o// /
24a2: gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nam chos thams cad dngos po med pa/ ngo bo nyid med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gas pa/ yi ge med pa/ stong pa/ gzod ma nas zhi gang
24a3: b zhin gyis rnam par dag pa yin par rab tu shes par gyur pa de'i tshe gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes la
24a4: mkhas pa zhes bya'o/ / gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes la mkhas pa de ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang chos thams cad
24a5: la 'dod chags par mi byed/ / zhe sdang bar mi byed/ gti mug par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing / chos de mi dmigs te/ gang 'dod chags pa dang gang la 'dod chags
24a6: p a dang gang gis 'dod chags pa dang gang zhe sdang ba dang gang la zhe sdang ba dang gang gis zhe sdang ba dang gang gti mug pa dang gang la gti mug pa dang gang gis gti mug par 'gyur ba'i chos de des yang dag par rjes su
24a7: mi mthong zhing mi dmigs so/ / chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing mi dmigs na khams gsum thams cad la ma chags par 'gyur te myur du ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob bo// myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
24a8: rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste// chos rnams thams cad dngos po med pa ste// thams cad mtshan ma med cing mtshan nyid med// skyes pa med cing 'gags

24b1: pa med par yang / / de ltar chos rnams shin du rig par gyis// thams cad dngos po med cing yi ge med// stong pa zhi ba gzod nas dri ma med// de ltar chos rnams gang gis shes pa ni// gzhon nu de ni sangs rgyas zhes kyang brjod//
24b2: de phyir rang bzhin mnyam nyid rnam smos pa// ngo bo nyid kyis chos kun rang bzhin med// bde bar gshegs pa'i yum 'di su 'dod pa// rgyal ba rnams kyi yum 'di 'thob par 'gyur// gzhon nu de lta bas na rnam grangs 'dis
24b3: kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ gzhon nu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa/ rgya che ba/ gzhal du med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ tshad med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na
24b4: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnam
24b5: kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa las byung ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / / gzhon nu 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de dngos po med pa las byung ba zhes bya zhe na/ gzhon nu de
24b6: bzhin gshegs pa de skyes ma thag tu steng gi nam mkha' la ta la bdun tsam du 'phags nas gom pa bdun bor te tshig 'di skad gsung ngo / / chos thams cad dngos po med pa las byung ngo // chos thams cad dngos po med pa
24b7: las byung ba'o zhes gsungs te/ gzhon nu sgra de'i dbyangs kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams go bar byas so// de nas sa'i lha nas bzung ste tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du sgra bsgrags shing dbyangs
24b8: kyis rjes su go bar byas te/ e ma de bzhin gshegs pa 'di skyes ma thag tu steng gi nam mkha' la ta la bdun srid du 'phags nas gom pa bdun bor te/ dngos po med pa'i sgra 'byin pa las na dngos po med pa las

25a1: byung ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ / zhes mtshan dngos po med pa las byung ba/ dngos po med pa las byung ba'o zhes btags so// bcom ldan 'das de byang chub thob pa na shing thams cad kyi lo ma dang rtswa dang shing ge la
25a2: ba dang nags tshal thams cad dang ri'i rtse mo thams cad las kyang dngos po med pa las byung ba'o zhes sgra byung ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams de na sgrar btags pa ji snyed yod pa thams cad las dngos po med pa
25a3: las byung ba'o zhes rnam par rig par byed pa'i sgra byung ngo / / gzhon nu de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dngos po med pa las byung ba
25a4: de'i gsung rab la rgyal ba gzhon nu snying rje chen po sems shes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa zhig byung ngo / / gzhon nu de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje chen po sems de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
25a5: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dngos po med pa las byung ba ga la ba der song ste byin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan
25a6: gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dngos po med pa las byung bas rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje
25a7: chen po sems kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas ting nge 'dzin 'di bshad do/ / de ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas rab tu dad de/ sems rab tu dad pas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos drar smrig gyon nas dad pas khyim nas khyim/
25a8: med par rab tu byung ngo // de rab tu byung nas ting nge 'dzin 'di bzung ste/ bzung zhing bcangs blags kun chub par byas nas sgom pa'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson par gnas te/ de dge ba'i rtsa ba des bskal pa bye ba phrag

25b1: nyi shwar nas yang ngan 'gre log par ltung bar masong ngo / / sangs rgyas bye ba phrag nyi shu mnyes par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad las kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan to// sangs nas de dag thams cad
25b2: las mnyan nas kyang bzung / / na chub par byas so// bcangs so// blags so/ bton te/ nyon mongs pa med par bsgoms shing mang du byas te/ bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson par gnas so// de dge ba'i rtsa ba des bskam
25b3: ba nyi shu 'das nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don legs par bsams pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ des sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa yongs su smin par byas/
25b4: sems can tshad med pa'i don byas nas de'i 'og tu shing zad pa'i me ltar yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// gzhon du de lta bas na rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam
25b5: kye gces sus byed pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bla na med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin par rig par bya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la sngon byung ba'i le'u 'di nyid rgyas par
25b6: tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to/ / sngon 'das dus kyi bskal pa bsam yas na// mi yi gtso bo byung ba ngas dran te// drang srong chen po gzings kyis don mdzad pa// de ming dngos po med las
25b7: zung zhes bya/ / skyes mthag tu mkha' la rab 'dug nas// chos rnams thams cad dngos po med par bstan// de tshe dang 'thun par mtshan btags te// smras ni 'jig rten kun dkrugs par byas// lha rnams thams cad ba
25b8: sgra 'byin pa/ / dngos po med ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// skyes ma thag tu gom pa bdun por te// rgyal bas chos rnams dngos po med par bshad// thub pa chos rnams thams cad ston pa yi// sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal por

26a1: nam 'gyur tshe/ / rtsi shing gel ba ri dang brag rnams las// chos rnams dngos po med ces sgra yang byung // 'jig rten de na ji snyed sgra yod pa// thams cad dngos med ci 'dra med pa zhes// de lta bur ni 'jig rten
26a2: 'dren pa yi/ / sgra dbyangs rnam pa shin du byung bar gyur// de yi dus na rgyal po'i bu skyes pa// mid ni rtag tu snyed rje sems shes bya// shin du gzugs bzang bltan sdug pa zhig/ rgyal ba de yi drung du nyer 'ongs te// thub pa/
26a3: khyu mchog zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas// ri mor bcas pas bskor bar byas nas ni// rdul bral bla na med pa'i chos mnyan phyir// rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis der 'dug go// rgyal po dpa' bo des ni bsam mkhyen nas//
26a4: ting 'dzin 'di ni rab tu bshad pa mdzad// des ni rdul bral ting 'dzin 'di thos nas// rgyal mchog bstan la myur par rab tu byung // rab tu de byung ting 'dzin 'di yang ni// bzung zhing blags te yongs su chub byas pas//
26a5: bskal pa bye ba nyi shu tshang bar ni// log par ltung ba'i sar yang yod ma song // de ni dge bar byas pa'i las de yis// sangs rgyas bye phrag nyi shu mnyes par byas// rgyal ba de dag kun gyi drung du yang // ting 'dzin zhi mchog 'di
26a6: ni goms par byas/ / de phyis 'jig rten du yang sangs rgyas gyur// ming ni don legs bsams shes rtag tu brjod// sems can bye ba mang po'i don byas nas// phyi ma'i dus la me bzhin mya ngan 'das// dngos po med pa
26a7: las byung ba'i lo'u sde brgyad po'o/ / / 'phags pa tid nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/ bam po gsum hA// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur ba la bka' stsal hA/
26a8: gnod rje das pas na byang chubs mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang desar dag myung dra drazan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyadang / sems can thams cad med pa

26b1: las bsgral bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros
26b2: pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang par bya// kun chub par bya/ klag par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya/ lung nod cing kha ton du bya/ nyon mongs pa med par sgom pas bsgom par bya/ mang du bya/
26b3: gzhan la yang rgya cher rab tu bstan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
26b4: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams skyed pa ste/ 'di las de bzhin gshegs pa dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad byung ngo // gzhon nu de lta bas na khyod kyis kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags pa/ de bzhin
26b5: gshegs pa thams cad skyed pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po gzung bar bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ da phyir byang chub tu ni 'tshang rgya zhing / srid pa'i mtsho las
26b6: sems can sgrol 'dod pas/ / sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i mdo sde 'di zung shig/ byang chub dam pa rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu
26b7: d e lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas chos zab mo bzod pa la
26b8: mkhas par bya'o/ / gzhon nu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa sems dpa' chen po chos zab mo bzod pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad smra

27a1: ma lta bur rab tu shes par bya'o/ / chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang smig rgyu lta bu dang brag cha lta bu dang mig g.yor lta bu dang chu zla lta bu dang sprul pa lta bu dang gzugs brnyan lta bu dang nam mkha' lta bur rab
27a2: tu shes par bya'o/ / gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos na ma chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur yongs su shes shing // chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang smig rgyu lta bu dang brag cha lta bu dang mig g.yor la
27a3: bu dang chu bla lta bu dang sprul pa lta bu dang gzugs brnyan lta bu dang nam mkha' lta bur yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin yongs su shes pa de'i tshe/ / gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di chos zab mo
27a4: bzod pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/ / chos zab mo bzod pa dang ldan pa de 'dod chags par 'gyur ba'i chos la mi chags/ zhe sdang bar 'gyur ba'i chos la mi sdang / gti mug par 'gyur ba'i chos la mi rmongs so// de
27a5: ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / chos de mi dmigs te/ gang 'dod chags pa dang gang la 'dod chags pa dang gang gis 'dod chags pa dang gang zhe sdang ba dang gang la zhe sdang ba
27a6: dang gang gis zhe sdang ba dang gang gti mug pa dang gang la gti mug pa dang gang gis gti mug par 'gyur ba'i chos de des yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing chos de mi dmigs so/ / chos de yang dag par rjes su
27a7: mi mthong zhing mi dmigs pas 'dod chags pa med pa/ zhe sdang ba med pa/ gti mug pa med pa/ sems phyin ci ma log pa/ mnyam par bzhag pa zhes bya'o// spros pa med pa zhes bya'o// rgal ba pha rol du phyin pa
27a8: zhes bya'o/ / skam la phyin pa zhes bya'o// bde bar son pa zhes bya'o// mi 'jigs pa thob pa zhes bya'o// tshul khrims can zhes bya'o// ye shes can zhes bya'o// shes rab can zhes bya'o/ bsod nams can zhes bya'o//

27b1: rdzu 'phral can zhes bya'o// dran pa can zhes bya'o// blo gros can zhes bya'o// rtogs pa can zhes bya'o/ tsha shes pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// brtun pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo/
27b2: byad bsnyungs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya'o// ci'ang med pa zhes bya'o// dgra bcom pa zhes bya'o// zag pa zad pa zhes bya'o// nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin dri rnam par grol ba/
27b3: shes rab shin du rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun du sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin du rnam par
27b4: grol ba/ shes rab shin du rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o// bram ze zhes bya'o// khrus byas pa zhes bya'o// pha rol du song ba zhes bya'o/ rig par byed pa zhes bya'o// gtsang
27b5: sgra can zhes bya'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi sras shes bya'o// shAkya'i sras shes bya'o// tsher ma dkrugs pa zhes bya'o khrims ma dral ba zhes bya'i 'obs dral ba zhes bya'o 'obs las rgal ba ces bya'o// zug rngu phyung ba ces bya'o// nad med pa zhes bya'o// dge slong zhes
27b6: bya'o/ / kun nas dkris pa med pa ces bya'o// skyes bu ces bya'o// skyes bu dam pa ces bya'o// skyes bu mchog ces bya'o// skyes bu chen po ces bya'o// skyes bu seng ge ces bya'o// skyes pa glang po che zhes bya'o// skyes bu cang shes pa zhes bya'o//
27b7: skyes bu lding khyer ba ces bya'o// skyes bu dpa' bo ces bya'o// skyes bu rtsal po che zhes bya'o// skyes bu me tog ces bya'o// skyes bu pad ma zhes bya'o// skyes bu pad ma dkar po zhes bya'o// skyes bu 'dul ba zhes bya'o// skyes bu zla ba ces
27b8: bya'o/ / skyes bu phal ba ma yin pa ces bya'o// mi gos pa ces bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos zab mo bzod pa la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// /

28a1: nam zhig 'jig rten khams 'di 'byung ba dang // 'jig rten thams cad nam mkhar gyur pa'i tshe// ji ltar sngon bzhin phyis kyang de bzhin te// chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// 'jig rten 'di na
28a2: ji snyed ci yod pa/ chu yi phung po 'di ni 'og tu 'gro// 'og tu ci 'drar steng du'ang de bzhin te// chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// ji ltar bar snang chung zad sprin med las// skad cig tu ni sprin gyi dkyil 'khor
28a3: snang / thog ma gang las blang bar shes par bya// de bzhin chos rnams thams cad shes par gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan 'das pa dag/ ji ltar mthing la byas bzhin gzugs brnyan snang // sngon mtha' ji bzhin gyis kyang de
28a4: bzhin te/ chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// ji ltar dbu ba mang po rdos pa dag/ chu bos khyer ba skyes bus des mthong ste// de la brtags na snying po yod mi snang // chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par
28a5: gyis/ ji ltar char ba'i thigs chen bab pa na// chu'i chu bur dag ni tha dad 'byung // byung nas zhig ste chu yi chu bur med// chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// ji ltar spring yig grong gzhan bskur ba las// dge dang mi
28a6: dge'i bya ba so sor 'byung / / sgra las spring yig tu yang 'phos pa med// chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// ji ltar mi dag chang gis myos nas ni// sa 'di kun tu 'khor snyam byed mod kyi// sa 'di 'gul
28a7: shing g.yos pa'ang med pa ltar/ / chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// ma long ngos dang 'bru mar snod rnams la// bud med kha bzhin brgyan pas bltas pa na// byis pa de ni de la chags bskyed nas// 'dod pa tshas
28a8: ba'i phyir yang shin du rgyug/ bzhin ni der yang 'phos pa ma yin te// gzugs brnyan la ni nam yang bzhin mi rnyed/ rmongs pa de dag 'dod chags skyes pa ltar // chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// ji lta

28b1: smig rgyu dri za'i grong khyer dang / / sgyu ma ji bzhin rmi lam ji lta bur// mtshan ma sgom pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong // chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// ji ltar nam mkha' dang bar zla shar ba// de yi gzugs brnyan dang
28b2: 'i mtsher snang ste/ / zla ba chu yi nang du 'phos pa med// chos kun mtshan nyid de 'drar shes par gyis// ji ltar mi dag nags ri'i khrod 'dug nas// glu len smra dang rgod dang ngu ba las// khrag cha thos kyang snang ba med pa
28b3: ltar/ chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// glu dang rol mo de bzhin dra ba yang // de la brten nas brag cha 'byung mod kyi// sgra la dbyangs de nam yang yod ma yin// chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes
28b4: par gyis/ / ji ltar rmi lam na yang 'dod bsten pa// skyes bu sad par gyur nas mi mthong ste// byis pa shin du 'dod la chags shing zhe na// chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// sgyu ma byed pa dag gis
28b5: gzugs sprul te/ / rta dang glang po'i shing rta sna tshogs byas// de la ji ltar snang ba gang yang med// chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// ji ltar bu mo gzhon nu'i rmi lam na// bu pheM byung zhing shi ba des mtho
28b6: nas/ byung nas dga' zhing shi nas mi dga' ltar// chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// ji ltar mtshan mo chu yi zla ba dag/ dang zhing rnyog pa med pa'i chu nang snang // chu zla stong pa gsog ste gzung nga med
28b7: chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ / ji ltar sos ka'i nyi ma phyed dus na// skyes bu sgom pas gdungs shing 'gro ba yis// smig rgyu dag la chu'i phung por mthong // chos rnams thams cad de bzhin
28b8: par gyis/ smig rgyu la yang chu ni yod med na// sems can rmongs pa de la 'thung 'dod do// mi bden chu ni 'thung bar yod mi nus// chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// ji ltar chu shing rlon pa'i sdong

29a1: bo la/ snying po 'dod phyir skyes bus de bshegs kyang // nang dang phyi rol kun na snying po med// chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// mig dang rna ba sna yang tshad ma min// lde dang lus dang
29a2: sems kyang tshad ma min/ / dbang po 'di dag gal te tshad min na// 'phags pa'i lam gyis su la ci zhig bya// 'di ltar dbang po 'di dag tshad min zhing // ngo bo nyid kyis bems po lung ma bstan// de phyir mya
29a3: ngan 'da' ba'i lam 'dod pa/ / des ni 'phags pa'i lam gyis bya ba byos// lus la sngon gyi mtha' ma rab brtags na// de la lus med lus su 'du shes med// gang la lus med lus su shes med pa// de ni
29a4: 'dus ma byas kyi rigs shes bya/ / mya ngan 'das pa'i chos la chos med de// gang phyir 'di med nam yang yod mi 'gyur// rtog can dag gi yod dang med ces bya// de ltar spyod pa sdug bsngal zhi mi 'gyur//
29a5: yod dang med ces bya ba gnyi ga mtha'// gtsang dang mi gtsang 'di yang mtha' yin te// de phyir gnyis ka'i mtha' ni rnam spangs nas// mkhas pa dbus la'ang gnas par yod mi byed// yod dang med
29a6: ces bya ba rtsod pa ste/ / gtsang dang mi gtsang 'di yang rtsod pa yin// rtsod par gyur pa sdug bsngal zhi mi 'gyur// rtsod pa med par gyur pa sdug bsngal 'gag/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gtab byas te// byis pa
29a7: bdag nyid lus la mngon sum snyems/ / lus la mngon sum gyur pa rlom sems med// de ni rlom sems mang po thams cad spangs// bsam gtan bani dag gi yang gtam byas nas// byas pa bdag nyid bsam gtan spyod
29a8: yul smra/ bsam gtan nyon mongs med cing rlom sems med// shes pas rtogs nas drags pa rab tu spongs// bden pa bzhi yi gtam rnams byas nas kyang // byis pa bdag nyid bden pa mthong zhes zer// bden pa mdzang

29b1: la rlom sems gang yang med/ / rlom sems med pa bden pa rgyal bas gsungs// tshul khrims srung zhing de yis snyems mi bya// chos rnams mnyan cing des ni mi snyems te// gang dag shes rab chung du de snyems pa// rtsa ba de las de
29b2: yi sdug bsngal 'phel/ / 'jig rten 'dren pa thams cad mkhyen pa yis// dregs pa sdug bsngal rtsa ba yin par bstan// rgyags pas dregs pa sdug bsngal rab tu 'phel// rlom sems med pa sdug bsngal 'gag par 'gyur/
29b3: ji snyed tshes meng yongs su chub byas nas// thos pas rgyags shing tshul khrims mi srung ni// tshul khrims 'chal bas ngan 'grong de 'grol// thos pa mang pos de la skyob mi nus// gal te tshul khrims grags pas de rgyags
29b4: shing / mang du thos la brtson par mi byed na// tshul khrims 'bras bu ma lus zad nas ni// phyir yang sdug bsngal rab tu myong bar 'gyur// 'jig rten dag na ting 'dzin sgom byed kyang // de ni bdag tu 'du shes gzhig mi byed// de yi
29b5: nyon mongs phyir yang rab tu ldang / / lhag spyod kyis ni ting 'dzin 'dir bsgoms bzhin// gal te bdag med chos la rab rtog cing // de dag brtags nas gal te sgom byed na// 'bras bu mya ngan 'das thob rgyu de yin// rgyu gzhan de dag
29b6: zhi bar 'gyur mi srid/ / mi zhig com rkun mang pos rab gces nas// 'tsha bar 'dod pas bros shing 'gror brtsal na// de yi rkang pa 'gro zhing rgyug ma nus// chom rkun dag gis de bzung bcom pa ltar// de bzhin tshul khrims nyam
29b7: bayongs pa'i mi/ / 'dus byas dag las 'bros par 'dod mod kyi// tshul khrims nyams pas de yang 'bros mi nus// nan 'chi bdag gis shini du bcom// ji ltar mi nang stong phrag mang po dag/ rnam pa dra pa'i skanas sdigs
29b8: pa byed/ / de bzhin nyon mongs sgo rnams du ma nas// mi rgod bzhin du dge ba'i phyogs rnams 'joms// gang gis phung po bdag med rab brtags te// spyos shing brgyad kyang zhum par mi 'gyur ba// nyon mongs bdud kyi dbang du demi 'gro/

30a1: stong pa shes pa de la 'khrug pa med// 'gro mang phung po stong par ston mod kyi// ji ltar bdag med de dag mi shes te// mi shes de dag gzhan gyis brgal na yang // khro ba'i zil gyis non cing tshig rtsub smra// mi dag na zhing
30a2: lus ni sdug bsngal te/ / lo grangs mang por res 'ga' mthar pa// da ni yun ring nad kyis nyon mongs pas// nad rnams gso ba'i phyir yod sman pa btsal// yang dang yang ni de yis btsal ba dang // sman pa mkhas shing rig pa
30a3: des rnyed de/ / des kyang snying rje nye bar bzhag nas ni// sman 'di gtang bar gyis shes smras pa dang // sman mang bzang zhing phangs pa des blangs nas// nab 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i sman mi 'thung // sman pas ma lan sman gyis mnyes
30a4: te/ nad pa de nyid kyis ni nyes pa yin// de bzhin bstan pa 'di la rab byung ste// stobs dang bsam gtan dbang po kun rig nas// sgom pa la ni mngon par brtson mi byed// rigs par mi brtson ga la mya ngan 'da'// rtag tu
30a5: chos kun rang bzhin stod pa ste/ / rgyal ba'i sras rnams dngos po rnam par 'jig/ srid pa thams cad yod ye stong pa ste// nye tshe'i stong pa mu stegs can dag gi/ mkhas pa byis pa dag dang rtsod mi byed// byis pa dag
30a6: ni ri mor byas nas spong / / zhe sdang sems kyis bdag gi drung 'ong zhes// byis pa'i chos la sten par yod mi byed// byis pa dag gi rang bzhin rgyud rig nas// mkhas pa byis pa dag dang mi 'grogs te// ji srid du ni byis//
30a7: pa legs bsnyen kyang // de dag phyir yang dgra dang 'dra bar 'gyur// mkhas pa byis pa dag la yid mi rton// mkhas dang byis pa'i rang bzhin chos nyid ni// byis pa'i rang bzhin ngang tshul tha dad de// so so'i skye bo la ni mdza'
30a8: ba med/ chos dang ldan pa'i tshig tu smras na yang // yid mi ches dang zhe sdang khro ba dag/ mngon par ston pa 'di ni byis pa'i chos// don 'di rnam par rig pas yid mi rton// byis pa dang ni byis par 'thun 'byor pa// ji ltar

30b1: me gtsang ba dang mi gtsang bzhin/ / mkhas pa dag ni mkhas pa'i skye bo dang // 'thun zhing 'byor pa mar dang snying ku bzhin// 'khor ba'i nyes la so sor ma brtags te// las kyi rnam par smin la mi 'jug cing // sangs rgyas rnams/
30b2: kyi tshig la ma dad pas// byis pa de dag bcad cing gtub par 'gyur// mi 'thob rab tu rnyed dka' thob nas ni/ zo yi gnas dag la ni mkhas ma gyur// dbul por gyur cing nor yang yod med de// nga nas 'tsho ba med pas rab
30b3: 'byung / sangs rgyas bstan 'dir de dag rab byung nas// lhung bzed chos gos dag la chags par 'gyur// de dag sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs zin pas// bde bar gshegs pa'i bslab pa mi spyad de// de dag bdag gi tshul
30b4: khrims ma mthong bas/ / byis bdag ni sems gnas mi rnyed cing // nyin mtshan rnal 'byor la yang mi brtson pas// de dag sdig pa'i lam la smod mi byed// lus dang sems ni shin du mi sdom pa// de ni tshig tu mi smra ci'ang //
30b5: med/ su yis nyes pa ci byas brgal lo zhes// rtag tu gzhan gyi nyes pa tshol zhing rtog/ byis pa dag ni zas la chags gyur nas// zas la tshod rig par ni mi byed de// sangs rgyas bsod nams kyis ni zas rnyed kyang //
30b6: del byis pa byas pa gzo mi 'gyur// de dag kha zas ro zhim bsod pa dag/ rnyed nas rnal 'byor mi brtson za zhing 'thung // de dag la ni zas de gdug par 'gyur// pal glang phru gus rtsa ba ma dkyus bzhin// mkhas shing rtogs
30b7: bablo gros ldan pa ni/ / bzas bzang po gtsang ma za mod kyi// de dag la ni chags par mi 'gyur te// ma chags bzhin du za zhing rnal 'byor brjon// mkhas shing rtogs pa blo gros ldan pa dag/ byis pa gang nas legs
30b8: par 'ongs shes smra/ / de bzhin snyan pa'i tshig gis nyer bsdus nas// de dag la ni snying rje nye bar 'jog/ byis pa la ni gang phan snying brtse ba// de la gnod pa byung na byis pa dga'// de lha'i nyes phyir byis pa rnams spangs te//

31a1: ri dgas bzhin du gcig pu dgon par gnas// mkhas pas 'di 'dra'i nyes pa rig nas ni// shes rab dman bstan bdag ni mtho ris nyams// byang chub thob pa ga la 'gyur snyam ste// byis pa rnams
31a2: dang nam yang yod mi sten/ / byams pa la ni mkhas pa gnas par 'gyur// snying rje dag la gnas shing dga' spyod dang // srid pa kun la rtag tu btang snyoms pa// ting nge 'dzin bsgoms byang chub reg par 'gyur// mya
31a3: ngan med zhi byang chub des rtogs shing / / sems can na rgas gzing bar rig nas ni// de la snying rje rab tu nyer bzhag ste// don dam ldan pa'i gtam rnams ston par byed// rgyal ba'i chos nyid brjod du med pa dang // bde
31a4: par gshegs pa'i bden pa sus shes pa/ / de dag 'di lta bu yi chos thos nas// 'phags pa zang zing med pa'i bzod pa 'thob// chos zab mo la bzod pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan
31a5: 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ / gzhon nu de lta bas na nan tan snying por bya'o zhes gzhon nu khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems
31a6: dpa' chen po nan tan snying por byed pa la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang rnyed par dka' ba ma yin na ting nge 'dzin 'di lta ci smos/ / de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bla gos
31a7: phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'ang
31a8: ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sem sa da' chen po rnams la gdams pa dang / rjes su bstan pa 'di legs par bstan cing legs par bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad

31b1: bstan te/ legs par bshad pa dang legs par bkod pa bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'angam lags na mu sa u0f7f
31b2: can gzhan gyi lta ci smos/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang nan tan snying por bgyis te lus dang srog la yang mi lta bar bgyis la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su slob po// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin
31b3: gshegs pa'i rjes su slob par 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni badrang sdig can shin du
31b4: gzhig par 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang sdug bsngal thams cad las bsgral bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa bdag gi spyi bo la gzhag pa
31b5: gsol/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ nam mkha' 'dra zhing rdul bral gzugs bzad 'chang // shes rab sras po lus dang mtshan mi mnga'// yon tan rgya mtsho rab zab thugs rje can// mtshungs med phyag ni bdag gi spyi bor zhog/
31b6: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa dge ba'i rtsa ba du ma las byung ba/ mtshan sna tshogs kyis shin du brgyan pa/ lha'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bor bzhag go// bcom
31b7: l dan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bor phyag g.yas pa bzhag ma thag tu skad cig de nyid la zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la dpa' bar 'gro ba dang nam mkha' mdzod dang rdo rje lta bu dang yid ltar mgyogs pa dang gzugs
31b8: t hams cad ston pa dang sgrib pa med pa'i mtha' dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ston pa dang stong pa nyid thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba thob pa la sogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bya ba

32a1: khrag khrig brgya stong du ma brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag mngon du gyur to/ / gzungs dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo du ma mngon du gyur te// dga' ba dang bde ba gang de 'phags pas brjod pa// lha yul ba rgya che
32a2: zhing dpe med pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod yul du rig pa rab tu thob po// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dra bas mdzes 'brel bum pa lcags kyu'i mtshan mnga' zhing // dpal be'u 'khor lo rgyal
32a3: mtshan ba dan nya ris mnga'/ / bskal pa bye mang rin chen gtong la zhugs pa'i phyag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nu'i spyi bor bzhag/ de nas lha yul ba rgya che zhing dpe med pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
32a4: dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa yul du rig pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba dang ldan par gyur nas stan las langs ste bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
32a5: de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod do/ / bla med mi 'jigs sbyin pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gzhan phan sems can gnyen rtsa
32a6: khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ / stobs bcu bden pa'i rtsal mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bde gshegs mi mnyam mnyam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mgon po shin du thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal lo// dpa' bo dgra bzhi
32a7: rnam par btul la phyag 'tshal lo/ / brtson pa dam pa'i don rnams mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi sku mchog mnga' ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// snying rje byams 'od rgyal ba'i nyi ma mun sel ba// shes rab shin du
32a8: yangs pa'i nam mkha'i dkyil du shar/ / don dam shin du zab pa'i chos rnams ston mdzadapa// lha khyod la ni rtag tu bdag kyang skyabs su mchi// de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshig

32b1: su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa sar
32b2: bdag gi sdum par bshos gsol bar thugs la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ bdag gi sdum par gtsang ma'i bshos gsol bar// mi dbang sras dang bcas la gsol ba 'debs// thub pa'i dbang
32b3: po bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir/ / mgon po lha yi gtso bos gnang bar mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur te/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la thugs brtse ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /
32b4: nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i khyim du sang bshos gsol bar cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo // de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar
32b5: gyur pas gnang bar rig nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom
32b6: ldan 'das kyi drung nas song ngo / / de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las babs nas de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po'i bar du de'i bar gyi lam tham
32b7: cad legs par brgyan te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lam yangs shing che la/ rtswa dang sdong bu ma dang tsher ma dang rdo dang gyo mo dang gseg ma med par bsal te bye ma gtsang mas bdal nas/ ka
32b8: tsa lin di ka ltar 'jam zhing reg na bde ba/ / byangs dga' bar byas te/ lha'i me tog ud pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu ta dang pad ma dkar po dang dri mchog dang a ti mug ta ka dang ma li ka dang tsam ba ka dang skya nar dang kun da

33a1: dang til ka dang ke sar dang mya ngan 'tshang la sogs pa dus thams cad kyi me tog bzang pos ni kun du khebs par byas/ / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang pa dan dang rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan dang rin po che'i rta babs dang
33a2: bA re ni bres/ rin po che'i bdug spos kyi snod sna tshogs ni ngos la sbyangs/ rin po che'i bdug spos kyi snod de dag thams cad nas ni a ga ru nag pos gang ba'i dub 'phrul/ phyogs phyogs su ni bro mkhan dang gar mkhan lha'i glu
33a3: gar dang rol mo shin du 'byor cing legs par bslabs pa rnams bkod/ / skyes pa dang bud med dang khye'u dang bu mo shin du brgyan pa khar rnga dang turba ba dang pi bang rgyud gcig pa dang pi ba dang gling bu dang rdza rnga dang rnga rmu kun da dang rdzarnga
33a4: chen po thogs pa rnams bkod/ lam gyi ngos gnyis su shing ta la mthon po lha'i rin po che sna tshogs dang 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba bres shing sgra 'khrol bas brgyan pa rnams dang rin po che
33a5: sna tshogs kyi mkha' rten bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi shing sna tshogs khrun dang sboms su ldan pa sna tshogs dang dus thams cad kyi lo ma dang / me tog 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dag btsugs
33a6: so/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lam ni sna tshogs shin du legs par brgyan// bla res dang ni gdugs dang ba dan sgreng / sil snyan dag gi sgra dag rab tu 'byin// glu sgra yid du 'ong ba'ang de bzhin te// bud med mang po bro rdung gar byed
33a7: dang / gos bzang khrag khrig rnam mar sna tshogs dang // me tog phreng ba bzang zhing mdzes pa yis// lam mchog yangs pa de ni rab tu brgyan// grong mchog gtsang ma 'dir ni thugs rje can// sangs rgyas thub pa'i zla ba gshegs
33a8: so zhes/ zla 'od gzhon nus dad pa rab bskyed nas// rgya che yangs pa'i lam ni shin du brgyan// lha rdzas kyi na bye ma gtsang ma bdal// rab tu yid 'ong me tog mchog rnams bkram// rin chen rta babs dag kyang legs par btsukra/

33b1: lam ni lA yi grong khyer bzhin du mdzes// zla 'od gnon nu shin du yid dka' bas// de ltar lam rnams sna tshogs legs brgyan te// lha dang lha min klu yis de mthong nas// ngo mtshar gyur cings la la zhes su// lam hA
33b2: g.yas g.yon 'dzam bu'i chu gser gyi/ / ta la mtsho zhing bzang la rnam pa dag/ rin chen dril bu'i rlabs g.yogs shing dkris// sgra 'khrol rnam pa ru pa mang po btsugs// de bzhin rin chen sdong po khrag khrig no// des kunaN+Da
33b3: yang me tog rgyas pa btsugs/ / de yis yangs pa'i lam brgyan mdzes gyur pa// mtho ris na ni dga' ba'i tshal bu bzhin// rin po che las byas pa'i mkha' rten ni// dra ba'i chun po 'od 'bar shin du mdzes// dab med mthang
33b4: zhing che la rgyas pa dag/ lam gyi g.yas g.yon 'gram du btsugs shing bkod// sangs rgyas 'jig rten gsum dbang gang nas ni// rgyal po'i khab kyi grong du gshegs pa yi// lam chen de ni de dag rab brgyan pas// rnam
33b5: pa thams cad du'ang mdzes par gyur/ / g.yas g.yon su ni rin chen pog phor sbyangs// de dag a ga ru yang nag pos bkang // pog phor kun nas du ba sprin bzhin 'khrigs// lha yi dri zhim rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung // ji
33b6: srid grong khyer chu dron sgo bar dang / / ri rgyal bya rgod phung po ji srid par// zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas rgyal ba'i phyir// lha rdzas dpe med yangs pas brgyan pas byas// de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas lam de rin po che bkod
33b7: pa rnam pa sna tshogs du mas brgyan pa byas nas zla 'ong gzhon nur gyur pa bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las babs te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po gang na ba dang rang gi lha'i khyim mtho zhing che la yangs pa gang na yod pa de
33b8: song ste phyin nas rang gi khyim du zhugs so/ / zhugs nas bza' ba dang bca' ba dang mya ba mang zhing bzang ba g.yor bcug ste/ zhal zas ro sna brgya bskyar nas de'i mtshan mo 'das pa dang rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po

34a1: chag chag legs par btab khyi dor legs par byas nas me tog sil ma ni bkram/ bdug spos kyis ni bdugs/ bla re ni bres// dar gyi lnga ldi dang chun po ni sbyangs// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan ni bsgreng
34a2: ste/ / de ltar rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i lam srang dang grong bar du bcas pa rdo ngadagyo mo dang gseg ma med par byas/ me tog sna tshogs ni bkram/ tsan dan gyi phye mas ni gtor/ skar khung dang rta babs dang sgo gang dang
34a3: bag ma dang skar khung dra ba ris dang zla ba lam pa lta bus ni brgyan cing tsan dan gyis byug pa byas te/ de ltar rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po dpag tu med pa'i bkod pas rab tu brgyan nas/ rang gi khyim yang rgyan sna tshogs
34a4: pa dam pa duHpa brgyan te/ rin po che'i phreng ba rnam pa du ma ni rab tu sbyangs// dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i gos kyis ni brgyan cing nye 'khor yang mdzes par byas phreng ba dang lnga ldi rnam pa tha dad pa du mas ni brgyan pa byed du
34a5: bcug/ rin po che'i stan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma ni 'ding du bcug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das kyi lha rdzas kyi seng ge'i khri lha'i dang mi'i las 'das pa bshams
34a6: so/ / rin po che'i sna tshogs kyi pog phor ni phyogs bzhir spangs te/ de dag nas a ga ru 'ba' shig gi du ba 'thul bar byas so// zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas khyim mchog de yang 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs
34a7: su longs spyad pa'i phyir lha'i glu gar dang sil snyan ni bsgrags/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan ni sbreng / lha dang klu dang gnod sprin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi
34a8: dang mi ma yin pa brgya stong gis ni gang zhing rnam par bltas/ rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs rnam pa du mas ni gang bar byas so// de lo 'di skad ces bya ste/ zla 'od kyis ni khyim mchog yangs pa yang / rgya cher thams cad shin

34b1: dubargyan par byas/ / gang la 'jig rten sgron ma bzhugs pa yi// lha rdzas seng ge'i khrini dbus su btsugs// 'jig rten sgron mdzad rgyal ba gtso bo yi// dge 'dun dag ni gang la 'dug 'gyur ba// rin chen shin du rnam par bkra
34b2: pa'i bstan/ bye ba stong phrag mtha' yas legs par bting // rin chen sna tshogs kun gyi bdug spos snod// a ga ru yis shin du gang byas te// phyogs rnams thams cad du'ang rnam par sbyangs// de dag nas ni yid 'od
34b3: dri rnams 'thul/ / zla 'od kyis ni stobs bcu gshegs pa'i phyir// rin chen me tog mdzes pa sna tshogs dang // me tog dri mchog bzang po rnam mang gis// khyim gyi sa gzhi bzang po kun du bkram// gar byed glu len sil
34b4: snyan sgra dag gis/ / khyim mchog thams cad kun du sgra yis gang // gdugs dang ba dan dag kyang shing du sgreng // khyim kun lam mer mdzes pa lha yi bzhin// zla 'od gzhon nu'i khyim mchog chen po yang // skyes bun chung
34b5: tshegs kyis rgyan gyur cing / / klu dang gnod sbyin lha min mang pos gang // brgya phrag mang po'i lha yis rnam par bltas// de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po yang brgyan// bdag gi khyim
34b6: yang legs par brgyan nas de'i mtshan mo 'das pa dang / / nang par snga rab kyi dus kyi tshe sil snyan sna tshogs brgya dag ni rab tu dkrol// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bye ba du ma ni sgreng ste/ byang chub sems dpa' phye ba
34b7: khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad bcu thams cad kyang lha mi tog man ras snyam pa bkang ste/ de dag las la la ni skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe' chen po 'di lta ste/ spyan ras
34b8: g zigs dbang phyug dang mthu chen thob dang spos kyi glang po che dang rin po che'i tog dang mngon par 'byung dka' dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang dpa' bo'i sde dang lag bzang dang rin chen me tog dang mthong ba

35a1: don yod dang byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ rta dang ba lang du ma shin du brgyan cing ma zhon par khrid pa mang po dang 'dres pa/ gzhan yang yul gyi
35a2: mi dpag tu med pa'i tshogs dang bdag nyid kyang lha'i me tog maN Da ras snyim pa bkang ste byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul chen po dang / byang
35a3: chub sems dpa'i a la la zhes lha'i gzha'i sgra yid du 'thad cing yid du 'ong ba yid 'phrog pa dag sgrog cing / rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i chu dron gyi sgo nas phyir byung ste/ ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po gal ba dang /
35a4: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas lha'i mi tog san/ ras snyim pa gang bas bcom ldan 'das la
35a5: mngon par gtor te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
35a6: bskor ba byas te/ so so'i snyim pa na ma to/ ma/ rab yod pa des bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa stan las yangs te// dz+ha
35a7: phrag pa gcig du gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas gdugs tshod la bab pa/ bcom ldan 'das bshos gtsang sbyar lags te/ de de'i
35a8: dus la bar bar bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen na/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang dge slong gi dge 'dun du bcas pa dang dbang che ba/ dbang che bar grags pa rgya che zhing rlabs che ba'i lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za

35b1: d ang lha ma yin dang drang srong dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang grul bum dang yi dgas dang srul po dang mi dang mi dang mi ma yin pa dag dang yang thabs gcig tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por
35b2: gshegs shing bdag gi snyam par yang gdugs tshod gsol pa'i dus la bab po/ / bde bar gshegs pa gdugs tshod la bab po// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ bdag gis grong khyer mchog kun legs par brgyan// mgon
35b3: po bdag gi sdum pa'ang de bzhin te/ lha'i zhal zas ro brgya bshams shing sbyar// gdugs tshong bab kyis bde gshegs bzhengs su gsol// drang srong mchog gis phyag bgyis stobs bcu yon tan 'chang // sras kyi
35b4: tshogs kyis yongs su bskur cing grong du gshegs/ / snang byed nyi ma mun pa'i tshogs sel bzhengs su gsol// bcom ldan bdag gi sdum par bshos gsol gdugs chod paT// sram dang thabs gcig bdag gi snum pa
35b5: gshegs su gsol/ / 'gro ba mang po'i tshogs kyi don kyang bgyis par 'gyur// ji ltar mar me mdzad kyis khyod la lung bstan pa// de bzhin bdag kyang 'jig rten mngon bum lung ston cig/ bdag 'dir lung bstan
35b6: 'jig rten thos nas ni/ / sems kyang mchog tu rgya cher rab bskyed de// 'gro ba 'di dag thams cad sangs rgyas 'gyur// 'di na snod min sems can gang yang med// bzhengs shig bzhengs shig stobs bcu mnga' ba'i lha//
35b7: bdag la rjesu phan mdzad sdum par gshegs// ji ltar bdag gi sdum par khyod gshegs pa// de bzhin byang chub shing dbang drung bdag mchi// byang chub shing dbang de drung bdag mchis nas// mi g.yo mi 'gul b.ran
35b8: gnas bcas te/ / byams pas sder bcas bdud rnams pham bgyis nas// khyod kyis brnyes bzhin byang chub thob par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i gsol ba mkhyen nas/ zla'o/

36a1: gzhon nur gyur pa la tshigs su bcad pas slar bka' stsal pa/ longs shig zla 'od rgyal ba'i sras// longs shig sbyin dga' sems can mchog/ longs sheg snying rje tshul khrims brtan// zan la dengad ni/
36a2: khyim du 'dod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs nas sngar gdan las bzhengs te/ sham thabs gsol/ chos gos dang lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong 'bum du tshang ba'i dge slong
36a3: ga dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin du mang pos bskor cing mdun du bdang te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang drang srong dang nam mkha'
36a4: lding dang mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang grul bum dang yi dgas dang srul po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa brgyad stong du mas mchod cing mngon par bstod nas/ / sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul
36a5: chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam gyis 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni rab tu gtod/ sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni rab tu dkrol// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba/
36a6: dan bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma ni mngon par skyed// gzugs dang kha dog rags pa du ma rnam pa sna tshogs kyi dang ba dang khrung khrung dang dUr ba dang gzhad dang tsa ko ra dang rma bya dang tsa sha dang re skegs dang khu byug dang ka
36a7: la pid ka dang kun la la sogs pa bya'i khyu mang po du ma sgra snyan cing 'jam la yid du 'ong ba rnam pa du ma 'byin pas ni khar snang la lha bzhin du so so'i da ros rol mo'i sgra dbyangs 'byin/ lha'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi
36a8: b tug spos kyi snod yangs shing che ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma thams cad kyang bai dUr+ya dang an da rnyil dang shel dang spug gi yu ba can dag gnod sbyin gyi dbang po gzugs bzang dang dbang po'i tog dang rang rong can

36b1: dang ba ku la dang lngas rtsen dang shAkya 'phel la sogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag gi lag pa gnyis na gtun 'dzin pa bzhin du thogs te/ spos sbrul gyi snying po dang gor shir sha dang mri na la dang hi ri dang ma la yang
36b2: can dan dmar po dang a ga dra la sogs pas bkang ba'i du ba ni 'thul/ / phyogs so so nas lhags pa'i rgyal po dbang che ba/ dbang che bar grags pa rnams rta dang ba glang rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan cing ma zhon par khrid pa'i tshas
36b3: du ma dang shing rta dang dpung bu chung gis yongs su bskor cing phreng ba dang lnga ldi mang po dang rin po che'i phreng ba lag na thogs shing sngon logs nas rkang gis 'gro'o/ / rta dang glang po che legs par brgyan pa/ mazhon par khrid
36b4: pa dag kyang / rang gi stabs kyis dngom par 'gro zhing yid du 'od la snyan pa 'byin to// tshangs pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs nas mchod pa dang rim gro bsnyen bkur byed cing 'gro'o// g.yon phyogs nas ni
36b5: lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu dbang che ba/ dbang che bar grags pa/ rgya che zhing brlabs che ba bgrang ba las 'das pa rnams lha'i cod pan bzang po dang gdu bu rgyan can dang rna cha dang gdu bu dang me tog rna rgyan dang rin po che'i
36b6: tsang tsong dang me tog gi phreng bas lus brgyan cing / gzugs mngon par snang bas lha'i me tog man dA ra dang mdog mdzes dang ko pi da ra dang s+tha la ka dang kur ba ka dang tsam pa ka dang dong ka'i me tog dang mya ngan 'tshang dang
36b7: skya snar dang a ti mu ka ta ga dang u dpa la dang bkul dang ma la bi ka dang kun da dang ke sar dang pad ma dang ku mu ta dang pad ma dkar po dang dri mchog dang rin po che'i phreng ba dang rin po che'i a ga ru dang shing rin po che'i 'bras/ br-i can dag lag na thogs shing sil snyan sna tshogs brgya stong ni shin du dkrol/
36b8: gos bye ba ni g.yo ba cing a la la zhes gzha'i sgra dag ni 'byin/ me tog gi char chen po ni rab tu 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das la

37a1: mchod pa bya ba'i phyir nam mkha'i ngos thams cad bar mtshams med par gang bar 'khod de/ me tog dang spros dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang bye ma dang rin po che'i char rab tu 'babs shing / bcom ldan 'das
37a2: chu dron yod pa'i sgo nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gdugs tshod la gshegs so/ / de'i chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pas dus mkhyen nas// dpa'
37a3: yon tan kun gyis rab brgyan pa/ / zhing rnams bsam gyis mi khyab snang mdzad cing // bcom ldan mi yi seng ge gshegs par gyur// spyan ras gzigs dang mthu chen don yod dang // spos kyi bal glang rin chen/
37a4: lag bzung dang // rin chen tog dang 'byung dka' dpa' bo dang // de dang gzhan dag rgyal ba'i zham ring byed// g.yas phyogs na ni mi pham 'dug gyur te// de ming byams pa yon tan mtha' yas phyug/ bar du ma//
37a5: tshad sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste// bsod nams ye shes tshogs kyang rab tu rdzogs// byams dang btang snyoms dga' bas lus bsgoms shing // chos kyi bdag nyid chen po snying rjes bskyed// yon tan mtha' yas
37a6: thub dbang yon tan sems/ / bde gshegs thugs rje can gyi zham ring byed// de yi rjes la bskal pa bzang po yi// blo gros chen po ldan pa ji snyed pa'i// sangs rgyas stong du bzhis ma tshang ba dag/ de dag gis
37a7: kyang byams pa mdun du bdar/ / gang sngon rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer 'dir// bskal pa dag la rgyal ba mtha' yas mchod// zla ba mdzes pa'i 'od 'dra lha yi lus// zla 'od dpa' bo yang ni mdun na 'dug
37a8: snying rje mchog gi g.yon phyogs 'dreg pa ni/ / 'jam dpal bye ba brgya phrag mang po dang // dpa' bo rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis mngon 'phags pa// brgya phrag mtha' yas zhing du 'gro ba'o// de yi 'og tu nyan blo

37b1: dge 'dun te/ / shA ri'i bu 'og maudagal nag po dang // 'od srung rab 'byor dga' bo ka bi na// bzad ldan rgyal po de bzhin kauN+DiH/ kun dka' de bzhin gnas brtan sgra can zin// legs 'ongs kron ci gang po 'char ba po// nam gru gsus
37b2: chen nye 'khor ma 'gags pa/ / ral pa can ni stong du tshang pa dag/ nyan thos dge 'dun 'og tu thams cad kyang // dka' thub drag mchog rig byed cho ga shes// dmod pa 'dor dang pan 'dogs nus pa yi// drang srong dral ba thal sbyar
37b3: 'dud pa byed/ / zhi ba'i yid dang dul ba'i yid rnams kyis// sangs rgyas 'jig rten sgron ma mdun pa darang te// thugs rjer ldan pa'i mi yi seng ge gshegs// sems can stong rnams rab du thar bar mdzad// ston zla tha chungs zla ba
37b4: nya ba ltar/ / skar tshogs dbang po yongs su dag pa bzhin// tshangs pa stong phrag dag ni brgya mang gis// mtshungs pa med pa'i ston pa yongs su bskor// grong khyer gyi ni sgo stengs zhabs bzhag tshe// nags tshal sdug por
37b5: bcas pa'i sa yang g.yos/ / lha dang lha min lto 'phye'i tshogs rnams kyang // me tog bzang po dri mchog 'thor bar byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs g.yas pa 'khor lo rin po ches brgyan pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
37b6: dpag tu med pa bsags pa/ / sgo'i them pa la bzhag ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun du rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul kun du rab tu
37b7: 'gul/ / ldeg rab tu ldeg kun du rab tu ldeg/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs kun du rab tu 'khrugs/ che mchem rab tu che mche ma kun du rab tu che mche mkhur 'ang rab tu'u zur kun du rab tu'ang 'ur te/ shar phyogs dam/
37b8: na nub phyogs mtho/ nub phyogs dma' ni shar phyogs mtho byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho/ lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho/ mtha' dma' na dbus mtho/ bas dma' na mtha' mtho bar gyur nas 'jig rten

38a1: du snang ba chen po yang byung bar gyur to/ / ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul grangs med dpag tu med pa gzhan dag kyang sdang ngo // // 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo// bam po bzhi pa/ de'i chos nyid ni
38a2: 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// grong khyer mchog der 'dren pa gshegs pa na// sgo yi them pa la ni zhabs mchog bzhag pa'i tshe// de yi dpal gyis sa 'di rab tu g.yos// grong khyer mchog 'di'i sems can rab tu
38a3: dga'/ mi gang bkres shing skom par gyur pa dag/ de tshe de dag bkres pa med par gyur// rgyal bas sgo yi them stengs zhabs bzhag tshe// bkres shing skom pa dag dang bral bar gyur// rgyal bas sgo yi the ma steng zhabs
38a4: bzhag tshe/ dmus long gyur pa'i mi gang ci yod dang // rna bas mi thos mgon med bsod nams chung // de dag thams cad mig dang rna ba thob// rgyal bas sgo yi them snyed zhabs bzhag tshe// gshin rje'i yul gyi yi dgas
38a5: gang yod pa/ / shin du sdug bsngal dar snabs mchil maza// thams cad 'od kyis reg pas bde bar gyur// rgyal bas sgo li them snyed zhabs bzhag tshe// brag gi rtse dang ri yi rtse mo dang // shing mchog sa la dang ni dong ka
38a6: rnams/ thams cad sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i phyogs su 'dud// rgyal bas sgo yi them steng zhabs bzhag tshe// rgya mtsho mthar thug grong dang grong khyer rnams// sa kun rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos// 'dir ni gad la'ang
38a7: gnod par gyur pa med/ / lha dang mi dang grul bum srin po dang // skyes bu gnas pa dga' mgu sems rangs te// byang chub dam pa mchog la dang bskyed nas// 'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa'i gdugs kyang 'dzin// rgyal ba/
38a8: sgo yi them snyed zhabs bzhag tshe// sil snyan stong dag ma brdungs sgra 'byin te// shin du yid 'ong rol mo'i dbyangs thos pas// de tshe sems can thams cad rab tu dga'// sdong po stong phrag brgya dag 'dud par gyur//

38b1: de tshe me tog kun kyang rab tu rgyas// bar snang las ni lha rnams brgya skyong dag/ rgyal ba la yang mi min mchod pa byed// rgyal bas sgo yi them steng zhabs bzhag tse// glang po brgyad ga sems dga' sgra 'byin te//
38b2: klaglang rgyal po lus kyang bstod// ri dgas rgyal po seng ge sgra 'byin byed// sa dbang rgyal po gang su ji snyed cig/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag nas lhag pa rnams// rgyal ba'i dpal gzi de 'dra mthong nas ni//
38b3: rab tu sems dga' sa la 'dug cing 'dud// kha cig 'jig rten mgon la mngon par bstod// kha cig rgyal la me tog char 'bebs shing // kha cig sor bcu thal mo sbyar nas su// e ma rgyal ba thugs rje can
38b4: zhes smra/ kha cig mu tig do shal bzang po dang // sna tshogs rgyan mang dga' bskyed 'thor bar byed// byang chub sems mchog dpe med bskyed nas su// kha cig na bza' rin chen 'thor bar byed// kha cig gser gyi dra ba bzang
38b5: po 'thor/ / kha cig spen tog rgyan bzad 'thor bar byed// la la gser gyi rgyan ni dam pa 'thor// kha cig de bzhin gdu bu 'thor bar byed// la la gdu bu bzang po de 'thor te// kha cig rin chen spras pa'i dpung rgyan
38b6: 'thor/ kha cig bdag cag sangs rgyas gyur cig ces// sems bskyed gos phran bzang po 'thor bar byed// 'jig rten mgon po sgo na bzhugs pa'i tshe// mi dag kha cig gser gyi tsong tsod 'thor// sems dang gtsug
38b7: gi nor bu mchog kyang 'thor/ / la la rin chen dra ba 'thor bar byed// sems can shin du mi bzang sdug bsngal zhing // gtse ba rnam mad zug rngus zug pa yang // 'dren pa skyes bu gtso bo'i dpal gyis ni// thams cad
38b8: bde ba dang yang ldan par gyur/ / khu byug dang ni ri skegs rma bya dang // de bzhin khrud khrud dang ni mtsho bya dang // bya mad kun ni nam mkhar 'dug nas su// shin du yid 'od mchog gi sgra yang 'byin// de tshe bya tshogs mang po

39a1: rab dga' bas/ / 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra byung ste// gang gis snyan pa'i sgra skad de thos pa// de dag 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi// sems can bye bas dga' ba'i sgra thos nas// thams cad rjes su 'thun
39a2: pa'i bzod thob ste/ / ma 'ongs dus na rgyal bar khyed 'gyur zhes// de dag kun la bde gshegs lung yang ston// de yi dus na nyon mongs mi 'byung ste// chos kyi rgyal la thams cad ri mor bcas// de tshe 'dren pa'i sku byad mthong
39a3: nas ni/ / sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la mos bskyed de// bdag cag nam zhig 'di 'dra'i mkhyen thob snyam// bsam pa mkhyen nas rgyal ba lung ston te// bde bar gshegs pa'i ba spu khung re nas// 'od zer dag ni stong phrag
39a4: brgya yang byung / / de las lhag par gang gI'i bye snyed de// de dag gi yang mtshan ma gzung mi nus// de tshe nyi ma'i 'od kyang mi snang ste// me dang nor bu lha kun 'od kyang med// rgyal ba grong gshegs sangs rgyas rnam mdzes pa// de
39a5: tshe 'od rnams thams cad yod mi mngon/ / tshogs chen dang ni bde gshegs lam bzhud tshe// gang du stobs bcu yi ni zhabs 'jog par// sa las pad ma dag ni stong phrag brgya// mdab ma bye ba stong ldan gtsang ma
39a6: byu/ / 'dren pa grong khyer mchog tu gshegs pa'i tshe// de na nyal nyil mi gtsang med par gyur// grong khyer thams cad dri mchog bdug pa yi// spos dang yid du 'ong ba kun nas ldang // grong dang srang rnams yongs su
39a7: dag gyur te/ / rdo dang gseg ma med cing spos chus btab// stobs bcu ldan pa'i bsod nams de 'dra ste// rnam pa sna tshogs me tog sil ma bkram// gnod sbyin brgya stong gtum por sems pa dag/ sangs rgyas mi
39a8: dbang gser 'dra mthong nas ni/ / 'dren la dga' ba rgya che rab bskyed nas// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun skyabs su 'gro// lha rnams bye ba dang ni brgya phrag stong // mi dbang lta bar 'ongs pa de dag kun// bde bar gshegs/

39b1: la me tog char bab ste// me tog gtor nas nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug/ rgyal la mi yis me tog gang gtor ba// nam mkha'i ngos la me tog gdugs su gyur// lha rnams kyis ni me tog gtar ba yang // sa steng lha yi me tog gram//
39b2: par gyur/ lha dang mi dang grul bum sen po rnams// de mthong nas ni nam yang ngoms mi myong // mgon pa stobs ban ldan pa mthong nas kyang // rab tu dga' zhing sems bde rangs par gyur// namatshems bu mchog gi su mthong nas//
39b3: sems can thams cad dga' mgu rangs gyur pas// lha yi me tog la yang yid mi sems// de dag la ni ngo mtshar 'dzin pa med// stobs bcu'i g.yas phyogs na ni tshangs pa ste// de bzhin g.yon na brgya byin lha yi rgyal// nam mkha'
39b4: dkyil na lnga mangs bye 'khod de/ / skyes pa mchog la shin tu gus pa bskyed// lha dang lha min dag gis rgyal ba bskor// lha dang mi yi dpal gzi kun phrogs nas// zhabs mthil sa la ri mo 'byin bzhin du// grong khyer du ni bcom ldan spyan
39b5: drangs gshegs/ / lus dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa ni// nam mkha' skar ma dag gis gang ba bzhin// nam mkha' la ni zla ba nya ba ltar// rgyal po'i lam na sangs rgyas lam me bzhugs// nor bu rin chen rnam dag bzang po na// nyos
39b6: pa'i skyon bral rab tu snang bar byed/ / phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su'ang 'od gtsang byung // de bzhin rgyal ba 'jig rten kun snang mdzad// lha dang lha min dag gis rgyal ba bskor// mi yi gtso bo rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs// zhabs
39b7: mthilas la ri mo 'byin bzhin du/ / zla 'od gzhon nu'i khyim du sangs rgyas gshegs// grong khyer mchog ni kun du legs brgyan te// rgyal mtshan bye ba phrag stong rab tu skyed// de yis kun spos bzang rnam par blugs// yid 'ong de//
39b8: bzhin dbyar gyi me tog gtong // gang tshe bde gshegs tam rnams ston pa na// mgon po srang bzhud me la thugs brtse'i phyir// rgyal bas darang ni 'phrul pa rnam sprul te// de dag la yang sangs rgyas chos bzang stan// sog chags brgya

40a1: stong dag gis de thos nas/ / sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la smon lam 'debs// nam bdag 'di 'dra'i ye shes thob snyam ste// bsam pa mkhyen nas rgyal ba lung yang ston// gang gis rgyal ba mi dbang spyan drangs pa//
40a2: sbyin pa de ni mu mtha' mar gyur pa// rnyed mchog bsam gyis mi khyab des rnyed ces// la la dag ni de la mos pa bskyed// 'khor ba dag na shin du mthong dka' ba// skye dgu dag la phan mdzad thugs kyang brtse// thugs rje can de bdag
40a3: gis sad la yang / / sman drang snyam du la la sems kyang bskyed// la la ba gam lcog gi steng 'dug cing // lus ni shin du sdug cing mdzes par brgyan// byang chub sems mchog dam pa bskyed nas ni// stobs bcu ldan la lha yi
40a4: me tog 'thor/ / la las bla med sems mchog rab bskyed nas// me tog rtsam pa mdzes pa'i phreng ba dang // a ti mug ta de bzhin dbyar gyi spos// dar gyi lda ldi dag kyang la la 'thor// kha cig gos kyis shin du lus brgyan
40a5: te/ me tog bzang po dag kyang thogs shing 'greng // me tog sna tshogs dar gyi lda ldi thogs// rgyal ba mthu chen de yi phyogs su 'thor// la la pad ma dang ni ku mu da// ud pa la gser gyi me tog bzang po 'thor// la la rin chen me
40a6: tog der 'thor te/ / la la tsan dan phye ma 'thor bar byed// 'dren pa grong khyer mchog tu gshegs pa'i tshe// ngo mtshar dpag tu med pa rnams kyang byung // mtshungs med de dag brjod par mi nus te// sangs rgyas ye shes skye bo bye madra/
40a7: bkod/ mi tshe mi gdung bden pa mthong ba dang // gzhan yang gya nom snang dang shin du mthong // de bzhin 'og min 'dod chags bral ba rnams// thams cad mi dbang lta phyir nye bar lhags// de bzhin dge ba'i lha rnams dpag med
40a8: dang / dge chung lha gzhan dag kyang sems dga' zhing // dge rgyas khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams// 'dren pa drang srong chen po lta phyir lhags// tshad med 'od kyang de bzhin dpag med dang // 'od chung gi ni lha rnams ci yod dang //

40b1: 'odogasal ba yang khrag khrig mang po dang/ 'jig rten mgon po lta phyir de dag lhags// tshangs 'khor ba dag brgya stong mang po dang / tshangs pa'i 'dun 'don dang pa de bzhin to// changs ris kyang ni brgya phrag mdo po rnams// thams cad
40b2: 'dren pa lta phyir nye bar lhags/ / de bzhin gzhan 'phrul gyi yang lha rnams dang // gzhan yang 'phrul dga'i sems can dag pa dang // dga' ldan 'thab bral lha rnams rab dga' zhing // thams cad sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal nye ba
40b3: lcags/ brgya byin lha rgyal sum bcu rtsa gsum pa// lha yi bu mo bye ba brgya dag lhags// 'dir ni me tog char kyang rab 'bebs shing // sangs rgyas thub dbang lta phyir nye bar lhags// phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po yang //
40b4: rnam thos bu dang klu dbang mig mi bzad// yul 'khor srung dang 'phags skyes sems dga' ste// de kun mi dbang bstod cing nye bar lhags// gnod sbyin rgyal po mthu ldan i ra bir yang // dga' ba skyes shing gnod sbyin brgyas
40b5: bskor te/ nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug cing sems dga' nas// me tog sna tshogs du ma'i char kyang 'bebs// rtag tu myos dang phreng 'dzin lha rnams kyang // spos dang phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs thogs// 'khor dang bcas pa thams
40b6: cad sems dga' zhing / / de nas skyes bu mchog la mchod pa byed// gnod sbyin lag na gzhong thogs mang po yang // gnod sbyin bu mo de dag rab brgyan te// gnod sbyin rol mo rab tu snyan pa dang // shin du yid 'ong brgyas ni sangs
40b7: rgyas mchod/ gla dbyangs sil snyan 'jam zhing snyan pa la// mkhas pa mi 'am ci yi bu mo stong // mi 'am ci yi rgyal po ljon pa yang // rgyal mchog mchod par spros dang ldang las lhags// bde mchog stobs ldan sgra gcan
40b8: thags bzang ris/ / lha min bu mo stong gi 'khor bcas dang // lha min rdzu 'phrul chen po gzhan mang yang // rin po che yi char phab nye bar lhags// srin po khrag khrig brgya phrag mtha' yas kyang // srin po bye ba brgya yis bsnyen

41a1: bkur zhing me tog sil ma sna tshogs mang po yang / / skyes bu mchog la gus par rab tu 'thor// klu yi rgyal po ri bo legs pa yang // 'khor mang de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du lhags// rin chen me tog rnam
41a2: mang mchog thogs te/ / bde gshegs zhabs gnyis la ni ratu 'dud// klu dbang pad ma dang ni pad ma che// de bzhin nor yod mtha' yas gdengs ka can// de dag khyu mchog drung du nyer lhags te// bde bar gshegs la
41a3: gus pas rab tu 'dud/ / klu yi rgyal po nor bu yid dga' zhing // khyu mchog zhabs kyi drung du nye bar 'ongs// klu yi me tog dri zhim mchog thogs te// ha cang mi ring bde gshegs spyan sngar 'dug/ de bzhin ma dros klu yi rgyal po
41a4: yang klu yi bu mo shin du bslabs pa'i mchog/ rnga dang sil snyan stong phrag brgya rdung zhing // 'jig rten mgon po mchod phyir nye bar lhags// ma dros pa yi bu pho lnga brgya dag/ ye shes yangs pa bla med tshol ba'i phyir// ga
41a5: mang ba dag gis bskor cing dgar gyur nas/ / rang gis radabyung mchod phyir nye bar lhags// de bzhin klu yi rgyal po sog med kyang // skyes bu mchog la thal sbyar rab btud nas// klu yi me tog mdzes shing bzang ba thogs
41a6: mkha' la 'dug nas thub rgyal mchod pa byed/ / de bzhin klu yi rgyal po btang bzung yang // rab tu yid bde dga' mgu skyes nas ni// rin chen mu tig sna tshogs thogs nas su// der 'ongs 'dren pa la yang mngon par
41a7: 'bor nga de bzhin klu yi rgyal po dus can yang / / de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du nyer 'ongs te// dga' zhing rin chen phreng ba mdzes mchog thogs// skyes bu dam pa la yang mchod rab byas// de yang bde gshegs yon
41a8: tan rjes dran zhing / / gus pa chen po shin du bskyed nas ni// gnyen mang bklu mang dag gis de bskor cing // 'dren pa'i bsngags pa rnam pa mang po brjod// de bzhin klu dbang dga' bo nye dga' dang // de bzhin 'jog po

41b1: 'go'u tam nag po yang / / rgyal ba lta zhing der ni nye bar 'ongs// bde bar gshegs pa'i zhabs la 'dud pa byed// klu yi rgyal po e la'i mdab ma yang // thub mchog rgyal ba 'od srung dran pa dang / bdag nyid mi khom
41b2: skyes pa mthong nas ni/ / klu brgyas yongs su bskor te ngu zhing 'ongs// kye ma bdag sngon the tshom byung gyur te// bdag gis e la'i 'dab kyang sngon bcad pas// des ni mi khom par yang bdag skyes te// rgyal ba'i chos ni
41b3: rig par sla ba min/ / shin du smad pa'i skye bo'i lus 'di dang // klu yi skye gnas bdag gis rab spangs la// chos gang byang chub snying por skyes mchog gis// rtogs pa bsil ba bdag gis rtogs par bya// klu yi rgyal
41b4: po rgya mtsho 'khor los bskur/ / bye ba gsum snyed klu yi 'khor gyis bskor// chu lha gzi can rin chen do shal thogs// bcom ldan 'das la mchod phyir nye bar 'ongs// rgyal ba la ni rdo 'phangs des bzung ste// de
41b5: nam mkha' la'ang 'dug gyur pa/ / rgyal po'i khab kyi gnod sbyin ci zhig 'dzin// bde bar gshegs pa'i spyan sngar gus par 'dug/ lca lo can gyi rgyal po'i gnas kun kyang // skrong bar gyur cing gnod sbyin gang
41b6: yang med thams cad kyis kyang phan tshun dam bcas te/ / 'jig rten mgon po lta bar thams cad lhags// de bzhin po rna dang ni khab cu dang // gnod sbyin 'brog gnas 'jigs byed de bzhin te// gangs gnas
41b7: ring 'dug gnod sbyin bong bu dag/ rgyal ba rang byung drung du nye bar lhags// dbang po'i tog dang gzugs bzang rang rong can// ba ku la dang dus 'phel lnga po dang // gnod sbyin dbang po gzhan yang stong rnams
41b8: ni/ 'dug spos snod rnams thogs shing nye bar lhags// lus dbyibs ma legs mi sdug mang po rnams// gzugs kyi rnam pa mang zhing rgyan por ba// de yi dus na brgya stong mang po dag/ gnod sbyin gyi ni me

42a1: tog thogs te lhags/ / gau ta ma ri byi phur bu rgyal byed dang // kau shi ka dang 'od srung mar ka na da// thams cad bshes dad par sha gar ga dang // thams cad sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal nye bar lhags// mi sbyin yang ni de bzhin dga'
42a2: mgu ste/ drang srong rgyas pa kud tsa ar 'gir// shed can ngan spong pad tsa ga nas 'jog rnams// de dag sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal nye bar lhags// 'dza' man bA man po'i sham bA ya dang // 'dza' mag nI dang grog mkhar drang srong mchog/
42a3: dkar bar gnas dang mi'u thung spen pa rnams// 'dren pa lta zhing grong khyer mchog tu lhags// drang srong mthong nas de tshe drang srong dga'// thub rgyal zhabs mchog la ni phyag 'tshal zhing // 'jig rten sgron la phyag byas mngon bstod
42a4: de/ thal mo sbyang nas dpa' bo'i spyan sngar 'greng // 'jig rten ci yod drang srong mar po kun// de dag mi dbang lta bar nyer lhags te// mthong nas mchod pa rgya cher byas nas kyang // sangs rgyas spyan sngar thal mo rab sbyar 'dug/
42a5: rgya mtsho dag na gnas pa'i nam mkha' lding // bram ze'i cha byad du'ang sprul byas nas// cod pa na sna tshogs blta na sdug pa thogs// bde bar gshegs la phyag 'tshal nam mkhar 'khod// grong brgya dang ni 'dzam gling nags tshal na/
42a6: gnas shing rten pa'i lha rnams gang yod dang // grong gi lha mo ma lus thams cad kyang // nye bar lhags shing gtso bo mchod par byed// nags tshal gyi yang lha rnams mtha' yas dang // ri yi lha rnams thams cad nye bar 'ongs//
42a7: 'bab chu'i lha kun mtha' dag de bzhin du// 'dren pa mchod pa byed cing nye bar lhags// mya ngam dgon pa'i lha mo brgya rnams dang // ri rtse'i lha mo ji snyed ma lus dang // mtsho dang chu mig rdzing gi lha rnams dang // rgya mtsho'i lha
42a8: yang sangs rgyas drung du lhags/ / lha dang lha min klu dang gnod sbyin tshogs// mi 'am ci dang grul bum nam mkha' lding // de bzhin yi dgas srul po mdo bo dag/ skyes bu mchog la ri mor bya ba byed// 'dren pa grong khyer mchog der

42b1: gshegs pa na/ / rgyal ba mchog la de dag mchod pa byed// lha dang lha min klu dang gnod sbyin rgyal// lta bas rtag tu chog par yod mi 'gyur// sngon gyi srid par 'jig rten mgon po yis// sngon gyi rgyal ba dag la mchod mchog
42b2: byas/ bsod nams 'bras bu smin pa de 'dra ste// skyes bu me dbang lta bas ngoms mi myang // rgyal bas sangs rgyas zhing du 'ong btang tshe// ldan po de bzhin rab lhun khor yug ri// kha ba can gyi ri dang spos dang ldang// de dag
42b3: rgyal ba'i 'od la sgrib pa med/ / sangs rgyas zhing 'di'i rgya mtsho ci yod pa// de dag de tshes dang 'dra bar gyur// sangs rgyas zhing 'di thams cad kun du yang // me tog dag gis gtor cing mnyam par gyur// 'od zer ba rgya
42b4: stong dpag tu med pa dag/ chos kyi rgyal po'i zhabs kyi mthil nas byung // sems can dmyal ba thams cad bsil bar gyur// sdug bsngal med par byas nas bde ba myong // der ni stobs bcu ldan pas chos bshad pas//
42b5: lha dang mi yi mig kyang rnam par dag/ srog chags brgya stong dpag tu med pa rnams// thams cad sangs rgyas ye shes nges par gyur// 'dren pa grong khyer mchog tu gshegs pa na// bde gshegs cho 'phrul mang po dag gi
42b6: ni/ bskal pa bye bar brjod du mi sla ste// rgyal ba bde gshegs 'gro ba thams cad dga'// bde gshegs yon tan de dag dpag med de// mi mchog yon tan rab kyi pha rol phyin// yon tan khyad par kun gyi pha rol son// sa dra
42b7: rgyas bsod nams zhing la mgos phyag 'tshal/ / grong khyer du gshegs pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das blo 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i khyim gyi srad du byu de ste// zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i khyim du
42b8: gshegs so/ / gshegs nas gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun kyang so sor gar 'os pa'i stan la 'khod do// de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan

43a1: 'das byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang dge slong gi dge 'dun bzhugs par rig nas mchod yon chen po rims kyis gsol te/ zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa bzang zhing mang ba'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang bldag
43a2: pa dang bzhib pa dang btung ba rnams bdag nyid kyis gsol ceng ba dang te/ bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol nas lhung zed bzhag ste phyag bcabs par rig nas ras bcos bu phrugs bye ba stong phrag brgya ri ba bcom ldan 'das
43a3: kyi sku la gsol to/ / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la yang so sor chos gos sum phrugs phul nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog
43a4: man dAras gtor te/ mchod cing mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod do// skyes pa med
43a5: cing 'gags med pa/ / sku lus mi mnga' bsam mi khyab// gzugs dang mtshan ni phun sum tshogs// yon tan rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal lo// dpa' bo shes rab mchog gis bskyed// thabs dang stobs kyi rtsal kyang mnga'//
43a6: sangs rgyas nam mkha' 'dra ba ste// bzod mthar phyin la phyag 'tshal lo// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhugs pa'i spyod yul te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzims mal rab tu dga' dang bde// btung bar ting nge 'dzin te
43a7: bshos su bsam gtan mchog/ stong nyid dgon par gnas pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal bzugs rje bsnyen pos na// gzugs kyi sku yang ston par mdzad// sems can dag la thugs bci'i phyir// btud dang bgro
43a8: kyang gsol bar gda'/ / e ma sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab// 'jig rten kun gyi 'dren pa ste// 'jig rten 'di ni khyod mchod nas// mya ngan 'das pa mchog tu mchi// mi mnyam mnyam pa'i mgon gcig po la de skad

43b1: bstod/ / gzhon nu yid kyang rab tu dgar gyur tshig smras pa// sangs rgyas mtshungs med bsam yas sku mnga' bshos gsol pas// lha yi lha khyod bzhin du bdag kyang sangs rgyas gyur// de ltar zla 'od bzhon nur gyur pas bcom
43b2: ldan 'das la lha'i zhal zas ro brgya pa ni zhes par gsol/ / lha'i na bza' rin thang med pa phrugs kyis ni sku la gsol/ lha'i me tog man dA ras ni bcom ldan 'das la mchod/ tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pas ni mngon
43b3: par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis tshigs su bcad pas zhu ba zhus pa// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pas ci spyad na// rtag tu chos rnams rang bzhin rab tu
43b4: 'tshal/ mkhas pa bgyi ba dag la ji ltar 'jug/ bgyi bar 'jug pa 'dren pas bstan du gsol// 'dren pa skye ba dran par ji ltar 'gyur// ji ltar mngal dag tu yang yod mi skye// ji lta bur na 'khor rnams mi byed 'gyur// 'di la
43b5: ji ltar spobs pa mtha' yas 'gyur/ / sems can kun gyi spyod pa rab tu mkhyen// chos rnams kun la mngon par mkhyen pa 'jug/ rkang gnyis gtso bo zil gyis mi non pa// zhu bzhu yis bdag la lung ston cig/ chos kyi
43b6: rang bzhin dngos med rab mkhyen la/ / brjod du med pa tshig tu brjod par mdzad// seng ges wa rnams ji ltar pha ma bgyis pa// mu stegs gzhan la'ang sangs rgyas de bzhin te// sems can kun gyi spyod pa rab mkhyen cing //
43b7: chos rnams kun la'ang ye shes rjes su 'jug/ ye shes chags med spyod yul yongs su dag/ chos kyi mnga' bdag bdag la de lung ston// 'das pa mkhyen cing ma 'ongs de bzhin te// da ltar 'di na ci mchis pa
43b8: yang mkhyen/ dus gsum la ni ye shes thogs med 'jug/ de phyir bdag zhu shAkya se ge la// dus gsum ldan pa'i rgyal ba'i chos nyid ni// chos kyi rgyal pos chos nyid rab tu mkhyen// ra byung chos kyi ngo bo nyid la

44a1: mkhas/ / de phyir bdag zhu ye shes rgya mtsho la// khyed la 'khrul pa'i chos ni ci yang med// de bas khyod kyi sems pa ma lus spangs// mdud spangs thab gti mug rab tu bcad// mi dbang bdag la byang chub spyod pa ston// chos kyi
44a2: mtshan nyid ci 'drang rgyal bas mkhyen/ / chos kyi mtshan nyid de 'dra ba dag la ston// bdag gis mtshan nyid de 'dra'i chos rtogs nas// mtshan nyid de 'dra'i byang chub spyod pa spyad// sems can spyod pa mi mthun mtha' yas pa// ji ltar spyod pa/
44a3: spyad par 'jug pa lags// gang thos sems can spyod pa 'tshal 'gyur ba// spyod la 'jug pa bdag la bshad du gsol// mtshan nyid mi mthun chos kyi rang bzhin mtshan// ngo bo nyid stod rang bzhin rnam dag pa// byang chub sems dpas ji
44a4: ltar mngon sum 'gyur/ / chos kyi tshul rnams bdag la bstan du gsol// 'di la chos rnams kun gyi pha rol phyin// bstan pa'i tshig kun la yang shin du mkhas// the tshom mi mnga' nem nur the tshom med// bdag la sangs rgyas byang chub
44a5: bstan du gsol/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis mkhyen nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa// gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gcig
44a6: dang ldan na yon tan 'di dag rab tu 'thob ste/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// chos gcig po gang zhe na/ gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/
44a7: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pa yin no// gzhon nu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes zhe na/ gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad
44a8: ming med cing ming dang bral bar rab tu shes so/ / chos thams cad sgra med pa/ tshig gi lam dang bral ba/ yi ge dang bral ba/ skye ba dang bral ba/ 'gog pa dang bral ba/ rgyu dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa/ rkyen dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa// dben

44b1: pa'i mtshan nyid 'di lta ste/ mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa/ mtshan nyid dang bral ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bsam pa dang bral ba/ yid dang bral bar rab tu shes so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad
44b2: pa 'di dag gsungs so/ / chos rnams bstan pa gcig po ni// chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med// yang dag ji bzhin rab mkhyen pas// shes rab mchog gis bshad pa yin// de lta bung ni chos bstan rnams// byang chubs pa/
44b3: dpa' lus shes pa// mdo sde byeb bston kyang // de la byang chub rgyun 'chad med// dren pas byin gyis brlabs pas na// yang dag nyid kyi mtha' yang shes// yang dag mtha' darab shes na// de la ci yang bshad pa med// gci
44b4: gis kyang ni thams cad shes/ / gcig gis kyang ni thams cad mthong // ji snyed mang por bshad na yang // de la dregs paskye ba med// chos rnams thams cad bdag med par// de ltar sems kyis nges brtags shing // ming du bstan pa
44b5: bslabs pas na/ yang dag nyid du tshig kyang swa/ sgra dbyangs gang dag ci thos pa/ de yi sngon gyi mtha' shes te// sgra yi sngon gyi mtha' shes nas// sgra dag gis ni demi 'phrogs// sgra yi sngon mtha' byir ston na// chos rnams mtshan nyid
44b6: de bzhin te/ / chos rnams de ltar rab shes na// mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// chos rnams thams cad mi skye zhing // 'byung ba med par rab tu shes// bstan pa 'di ni rab shes na// rtag du skye ba dran par 'gyur// nam zhig skye ba dran
44b7: gyur na/ / de tshe bya ba dag la 'jug/ bya ba dag la zhugs pa yi// 'khor rnams shin du mi phyed 'gyur// de ltar chos rnams stong par ni// byang chub sems dpa' sus shes pa// des ni gang yang me shes med// 'de ni tse'ang med
44b8: pa'i mtha'/ / ci'ang med pa'i mtha' la yang // byis pa dag gis ci dag brtags// bskal pa bye bar de dag des// yang dang yang du 'khor bar 'gyur// ji ltar 'dren pas mkhyen pa bzhin// gal te de dag rtog rig na// de las

45a1: sdug bsngal mi skye ste/ / ngan 'gro rnams su'ang de mi 'gro// so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis// de ltar tshul 'di ma shes pas// gang du chos rnams 'gag pa yi// 'di 'dra'i chos rnams spong bar byed// chos kun rnyed pa med
45a2: par ni/ chos kyi 'du shes gang byung ba// de lta bu yi 'du shes te// 'du shes de ltar rig par gyis// rnam par shes dang 'du shes su// byis pa dag gis 'di brtags te// brtags pa yi ni chos rnams la// mkhas pa 'dir
45a3: ni rmongs mi 'gyur/ / stong pa rnyog pa med pa'i chos// 'di ni mkhas pa'i sa yin te// 'di la byis pa'i spyod yul med// sangs rgyas sras kyi spyod yul lo// zhi ba stong par rab bstan pa// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa// 'di
45a4: ni sangs rgyas sras spyod pa/ / sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyan yin no// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dag/ bog chags rab tu spangs gyur pa// de dag gzugs kyis mi 'phrogs te// sangs rgyas rigs la de dag gnas// chos
45a5: rnams thams cad gnas med de/ / de dag la ni gnas yod min// gang gis de ltar gnas shes pa// de la byang chub rnyed mi dka'// sbyin dang tshul khrims thos dang bzod// bshes gnyen bzang po bsten byas nas// bya ba 'di dag rnam rig na//
45a6: byang chub myur dre de 'tshang rgya// de la lha klu rtag tu bkur bsti byed// gnod sbyin lha min lto 'phya dri za dang // nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po thams cad dang // mi 'am ci dang srin po mchod pa byed// sangs rgyas bye ba de yi snyan pa brjod//
45a7: bskal pa bye ba mang por mi 'chang bar// chos bshad pa yi bsngags pa brjod na yang // de yi mu mtha' zad par nus mi 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' gang gis stong shes pa// de ni srog chags bye ba'i don mang byed// shin du
45a8: des pas 'khor la chos ston te/ / thos nas dga' zhing ri mor byed pa skyed// de dag gis ni ye shes yangs pa 'byung // de phyir rgyal ba mi mchog mthong bar 'gyur// zhing rnams na yang bkod pa bzang po mthong // 'jig rten mgon po

45b1: de la chos rnams ston/ / chos kun sgyu ma lta bur shes par gyis// ji ltar bar snang rang bzhin stong pa ltar// de dag gi yang rang bzhin de 'drar shes// de ltar spyod pa ci la 'ang chags mi 'gyur// ye shes chags pa med pas don
45b2: byed cing / / 'jig rten na yang byang chub spyad mchog spyod// shes pas chos kun la'angar ba brtags te// de dag zhing rnams gzhan du'ang sprul pa 'gyed// sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas don byas nas// ji ltar chos nyid bzhin du rang bzhin
45b3: 'gyur byang chub sems la mi gang gnas pa rnams/ / bsam pa ji bzhin don rnams rnyed par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rigs ni gnas par gang brtson po// de ni rtag tu sangs rgyas byas pa gtso// rnam par 'bang ba'i lus dang rab ldan
45b4: zhing / mtshan bzang sum bcu rtsa gnyis de la 'byung // ban yon gzhan yang mang po mtha' yas pa// ting 'dzin mchog la spyod pas thob par 'gyur// rtag tu mi skul stobs kyang che bar 'gyur// de yi gzi brjid rgyal pos mi bzod de/
45b5: mkhas pa su dag sangs rgyas chos spyod pa// byad bzhin bzang zhing shin du mdzes par 'gyur// bsod nams gzi brjid dpal gyis mngon 'phags te// lhas kyang de yi gzi brjid bzod mi 'gyur// su dag byang chub sems
45b6: la brtan gnas pa/ / de ni rtag tu srog chags kun gyi bshes// sangs rgyas byang chub 'di ni rab ston pa// de la nam yang mun pa med par 'gyur// sgra dang tshig gi lam bral brjod du med// nam mkha' ji bzhin chos kyi rang
45b7: bzhin te/ 'di lta bu yi tshul mchog rnam rig na// de yi spobs pa dag kyang mi zad 'gyur// mdo sde dag ni brgya stong rab bshad kyang // sngon gyi mtha' ma phra zhi ba rab tu shes// chos kyi rang bzhin shin tu phra shes pas// mkhas
45b8: pa'i tshig ni rtag tu thogs pa med/ / rtag par tshul brgya dag la mkhas gyur cing // sgra dang des tshig rnam pa mngal mkhas// las dang 'bras bu rnam smin des pa ste// khyad par 'phags pa'i bye brag de 'drar 'gyur// mkhas pa
