46a1: bdag nyid chen po stobs bcu'i sras/ / ma tshad med pa'i stobs kyis shugs 'chang zhing // shin du phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas// de yi dran pa rtag par yongs su dag/ shin du phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes
46a2: pas/ yid du mi 'od sgra ni thos mi 'gyur// rtag tu snyan cing yid 'ong sgra yang thos// de yi tshig ni rtag tu yid 'ong 'gyur// shin du phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas// dran dang blo gros shes rab rtogs dang ldan// de bzhin
46a3: sems kyang rnyog med dang bar 'gyur/ / mdo sde brgya phrag du ma rab tu 'chad// yon tan 'di 'dra'i rang bzhin chos shes pas// yi ge dang ni tshig rnams 'byed la mkhas// tha dad pa yi sgra mang du ma shes// don dang tshig 'brul
46a4: yang mkhas par 'gyur/ / shin du phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas// lha dang mi dab klu 'brug srin po dang // lha min lto 'phye mi 'am ci la yang // rtag tu sdug cing yid du 'ong bar 'gyur// shin du phra ba'i rang bzhin chos
46a5: shes pas/ 'byung po yi dgas srin po'i tshogs rnams ni// sha la za ba shin du mi zad pa// de dag nam yang de la 'jigs mi byed// mkhas pa de dag yangs pa'i gtam thos nas// shin du dga' zhing ba spa zing
46a6: zhes byed/ sangs rgyas la yang dga' ba rgya cher bskyed// de dag bsam gyis mi khyab don chen 'thob// bde bar gshegs pa'i chos mdzod 'di bzung ba'i// bskal pa stong mang de yi bsod nams stobs// rab tu brjod
46a7: kyang rdzogs par mi nus te/ / dpag tu med cing mtha' yas tshad med do// ting 'dzin zhi ba'i mchog 'di bzung ba yis// 'das pa'i rgyal ba dpag med thams cad dang // sangs rgyas ma byon pa dang phyogs bcu na//
46a8: sangs rgyas gang bzhugs de dag de yis mchod// skyes bul la bsod nams 'dod pas 'dir// stobs bcu ldan pa'i thugs rje can dag la// dga' ba dpag tu med pa bskyed nas ni// bskal pa mtha' yas dpag

46b1: mngarim gro byas/ / skyes bu gnyis pa bsod nams 'dod pa yis// don dam tshul 'di las ni tshogs bcad gcig/ phyi ma'i dus su gyur tshe 'dzin pa ni// de la snga ma'i bsod nams char mi pod// 'di ni sangs rgyas mchod pa rab
46b2: mchog ste/ / phyi ma mi zad dus su gyur pa'i tshe// 'di las tshig bzhi'i tshogs bcad gcig thos nas// 'dzin pa des ni sangs rgyas thams cad mchod// de dag rtag tu red mchog legs par rnyed// de dag grong gi zas mchog legs par
46b3: zos/ / stobs bcu'i sras kyi thu bo dam pa ste// de yis rgyal ba mang po yun ring mchod// bya nod phung po'i ri 'di dang yang mthong // de dag sangs rgyas mkhyen la ngas lung bstan// mya ngand 'das nas ni byams pa yang // de tshod la lung
46b4: yang ston par 'gyur/ / de bzhin sangs rgyas tshe dpag med pa yang // nga yi bde ba can du kun 'dod zhes// phan yon rnam pa du ma de la 'chad// mngon dga' der song sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs mthong // bskal pa brgya stong dpag tu med//
46b5: bapar yang / log par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa yod mi 'byung // byang chub spyad pa mchog 'di spyod pa ni// rtag tu yid rab bde ba myong bar 'gyur// de phyir bye brag 'di 'phags de 'dra ste// 'di ni rab tu bshad pa phan yon mchog/ so so'i
46b6: tshig la ra yi rjes slobs la/ / phyi ma'i dus la mdo sde 'di zung shig/ mdo sde 'dzin pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / gzhon nu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid
46b7: shes pa de'i yon tan dang pan yon de lta bur 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang bsngags pa yang dag par smra'o// de bzhin gsheg pa la yang dag pa ma yin pa dang med pas mi skur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos
46b8: gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu dbye ba'i chos nyid de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes shing / / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mtha' yas par rab tu shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ni mtha'

47a1: yas te/ bsam gyis mi khyab cing bsam pa dang bral bas na/ de dag bsam pa'am dpag par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu sems kyi ngo bo nyid ni gzugs med pa bstan du med pa ste/ gzhon nu de ltar sems
47a2: kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi ngo bo nyid kyang de yin no/ / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang de yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa chos
47a3: thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyang de yin te/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar yon tan thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid don gcig tu bstan pa/ yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du rab tu shes pa de ni gzhon nu byang
47a4: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid kyis nges par brtags pa zhes bya ste/ 'byung ba la mkhas shing khams gsum las 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// ji lta ba bzhin du lta zhing log par mi smra
47a5: rnam pa gzhan du mi smra/ / ji skad smra ba de bzhin byed// khams gsum la ma chags shing khams gsum las yang dag par 'das te/ 'dod pa'i sa dang gzugs kyis dang gzugs med pa'i sa dang nyon mongs pa'i sa dang / ming
47a6: gis dang sgra'i sa las 'das shing yi gi dang chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa/ / ye shes mi zad par bsgoms pa/ brjod du med pa'i chos rtogs pa/ yi ge shes pa/ yi ge la mkhas pa/ yi ge dang tshig rab tu dbye ba shes pa sa
47a7: mkhas pa/ yi ge dang tshig rab tu dbye ba rgyas pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba rgyas pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa la
47a8: mkhas pa yin te/ gtan la dbab pa'i blo dang ldan zhing / bdud sdig can dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis zil gyis mi non to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe lha dang mi'i skye dgu sngon yongs su sbyang ba byas pa khrag khrig

47b1: p hrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad kyis bye ba brgya stong 'khyil ba'i gzungs dang sgrib pa med pa'i mtha' dang chos rnam par mthong ba'i bzod pa sa sar thob nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag thams cad la bskal pa grangs med pa brgya stong phrag pani
47b2: bcu rtsa brgyad na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste thams cad kyang ming ni tha dad / tshe'i tshad ni gcig par sangs rgyas kyi zhing so sor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
47b3: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes lung bstan to/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' blo dang ldan pa gang // bla na med pa'i byang chub rab tshol zhing // chos dang de bzhin don la mkhas pa de// chos kyi ngo bo nyid la spyod
47b4: pa yin/ yang dag ma yin pa yi tshig mi smra// sangs rgyas yon tan bye phrag ci 'dra ba// rgyal ba rnams kyi chos ni de yin te// dpa' bo the tsom bral bas shin du rig/ chos kun don gcig par ni rab shes te// mgo gcig tu
47b5: ni stong pa nyid yin pas/ / de dag yi ni tha dad gyur pa med// don gcig la ni shin tu bslabs pa yin// rtog pa med cing rnam rtog med pa dang // dmigs pa med par blo gros ldan pas shes// zad pa dang ni mi zad 'du shes kyang //
47b6: ma lus par ni thams cad rab tu spangs// de ni chos sku mi yi seng ge la// stobs bcu ldan pa gzugs su mi lta zhing // de ni phyin ci log kun rab spangs pas// mtshan rnams su yang lta bar yong mi 'gyur// chos rnams
47b7: 'di dag bsam mi khyab/ / bsam dang bral zhing rang bzhin zhi// de lta bur ni rab shes nas// rkang gnyis gtso bo sangs rgyas mthong // ji ltar bdag gi 'du shes rig/ de bzhin kun du blo yang gtong // chos kun de yi rang bzhin tu
47b8: rnam par dag pa nam mkha' bzhin/ / yid la nams kyang 'byung ba med// chos rnams thams cad shes pas na// khams gsum las ni rnam par grol// de la smon lam 'debs pa med// yang dag ji bzhin du ni mthong gyur/

48a1: cing / ma log tshig smra rnam pa gzhan mi smra// de yi tshig dang brjod pa thams cad kyang // rgyal ba dag gi mthu yis 'byung bar 'gyur// 'dod pa'i sa dang nyon mongs sa rnams dang // gzugs dang gzugs med las kyang
48a2: shin du 'da'/ / chos rnams la ni yid kyang ma chags shing // rab tu dga' bas 'gro la phan phar spyod// ming gis las 'das shing sgra yang shes// ngo bo nyid kyis gsog tu gyur pa ste// ji srid tsam du yun ring brjod na yang //
48a3: de la gnas par byed pa yod ma yin// 'du shes rab tu rgyu ba med// lta ba log pa kun nas zad// blo yang shin tu gtan la bab// brtan pa nam mkha' 'dra bar spyod// gal te 'dud bye khrag khrig rnams// de yi sems dkrug
48a4: phyir 'ongs kyang / / bdud rnams thams cad zil mnan te// de yi dbang du 'gro mi 'gyur// bdud kyi rgya mo rnam spangs te// tshul khrims yongs dag gdung ba med// bsam gtan dag gi bde la mos// 'jig rten stong par rab
48a5: tu shes/ / 'jig rten phung por smras pa yang // de dag stong par rab tu rig/ skye ba med cing 'gag med pas// chos rnams thams cad nam mkha' bzhin// de dag bdag nyid gtong byed kyi// stobs bcu'i tshul khrims thos mi gtong //
48a6: de ni tshul khrims pha rol phyin// gang smon par yang skye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing du rnam par 'gro// sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po mthong // mtho ris dag ni mi 'dod de// smon lam rnams ni yongs mi gtong // chos nyid
48a7: dag ni de spyod tshe/ / skad cig brtson 'grus nyams mi byed// phyogs bcu yi ni sangs rgyas kyis// de ni shin tu bstod pa yin// de phyir gzhon nu ting 'dzin las/ chos 'di dag ni rab thob nas// shes kyi khe ni rnam spongs la// /
48a8: skye bo mdo la chos rab ston// sangs rgyas yon tan mang ldan pa// rang 'byung 'gyur bar gang 'dod pas// dge ba 'di la rab bslabs na// stobs bcu 'chang ba sangs rgyas 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin la rjes su slob pa'i

48b1: le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa// de lta bas na gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
48b2: pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa la mkhas par bya'o/ / gzhon nu de la ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa gang zhe na// gang chos thams cad kyi ji lta ba bzhin
48b3: nyid dang mnyam pa nyid mi mnyam pa med pa dang mi rtog pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa/ rnam par ma bsgrubs pa/ kun nas slong ba med pa/ skye ba med pa/ 'gag pa med pa/ rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang kun nas rtog pa yongs su chad pa/ sems kyi dmigs
48b4: pa med pa/ yid la byed pa med pa/ rnam par rig pa yongs su chad pa/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug yongs su chad pa/ mtha' med pa/ mthar yid la byed pa dang bral ba/ yid la byed pa yongs su chad pa/ phung po dang khams dang skye
48b5: mched kyi ngo bo nyid shes pa/ dran pa dang blo gros dang rtogs pa dang khrel yod pa dang brtan pa dang cho ga dang spyod yul dang nan tan gyi gnas su gyur pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i sa// zhi ba'i sa/ spros pa thams cad yongs su chad pa byang chub
48b6: sems dpa' thams cad kyi bslab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul/ yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa 'di ni gzhon nu ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
48b7: ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa 'di la gnas pa ni ting nge 'dzin dang ma bral ba yin/ sems 'khrul ba med pa yin/ snying rje chen po dang ldan zhing sems can dpag tu med pa'i don byed pa yin no// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis
48b8: tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ / ting 'dzin mnyam pa med pa'i sa// shin du mthong dka' phra zhing ni// 'du shes thams cad bcom pa ste/ de phyir ting nge 'dzin ces bya// rtog pa med cing rnam rtog med// gzung ba med cing bstan du med//

49a1: sems kyang dmigs pa med pa ste// de phyir ting nge 'dzin ces bya// nam zhig mnyam par gzhag gyur te// chos kun la ni rlom sems med// rlom sems med pa ji bzhin pa// de ni ting nge 'dzin ces bsgrags// chos ni rdul tsam yod
49a2: med de/ rdul ces bya ba'ang yod ma yin// chos rnams dmigs su med pa ste// de phyir ting nge 'dzin ces bya// sems kyi dmigs pa med pa yang // de ni rnam par rtog ces bya// chos de rnam par ma brtags pa// de ltar ting 'dzin shes
49a3: par gyis/ sgra yis don rnams rab bstan te// sgra de nyid kyang dngos po med// sgra ni brag cha lta bu ste// bar snang dag gi rnam mkha' bzhin// chos 'di rnams ni mi gnas te// 'di dag la ni gnas mi dmigs// mi gnas pa ni gan
49a4: kyi sgra/ / ngo bo nyid kyis mi rnyed do// 'gro zhing 'chi 'phor brjod pa yi// de lta bu yi 'gro ba med// 'gro ba med pa 'gro ba'i sgras// ting nge 'dzin du de phyir gsungs// mnyam gzhag ma yin de ni rlom sems brjod// mnyam gzhag 'di
49a5: yang rlom sems gnyis pa ste/ / rlom sems med par byang chub rim par spyod// dran pa rlom sems med pa byang chub mchog/ mnyam dang mi mnyam zhi ba sangs rgyas sa// zhi gnas lhag mthong mtshan med 'di yin te// zhi ba
49a6: sangs rgyas sa 'di bsten byas na/ / ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di la de brtson yin// don gyi rnam par rig pa 'jug pa la// yi ge dag gis 'jug par mi nus te// sgra dbyangs thams cad rnam par spangs nas ni// mnyam par gzhag 'gyur
49a7: de la rlom sems med/ / byang chub sems dpa' gang dag ting 'dzin 'di// de ltar bshad bzhin gnas shing brtson byed na// gal te zhing 'di bskal bas tshig gyur kyang // ri mchog dbus su zhugs pasems mi tshig/ bskal pa
49a8: brgya phrag mang por rab bsregs kyang / / nam mkha' sngon chad nam yang mi 'tshig bzhin// chos rnams nam mkha' mtshungs par rnam rig pas// de ni ma yi nang du yod mi 'tshig/ gal te sangs rgyas zhing rnams 'bar gyur la//

49b1: 'bar ba 'di dag ma lus ni shig ces// ting 'dzin gnas nas smon lam 'di btab na// sa rnams zhig kyang de la 'gyur ba med// de ni rdzu 'phrul stobs kyang mtha' yas 'gyur// nam mkha' la yang thogs pa med par 'gro//
49b2: rjes su bstan bzhin ting 'dzin gnas pa ni// byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan 'di dag myong // skye zhing 'chi 'bor de 'gyur yang // skye ba med cing 'chi 'pho med// gang gis de ltar rnam rig pa// de la ting 'dzin rnyed mi dka'//
49b3: 'chi 'pho skye ba med par ni// 'jig rten mgon pos rab tu bshad// de ltar 'jig rten mgon rig nas// de phyir ting nge 'dzin kyang rig/ 'jig rten gyis ni ma gos shing // 'jig rten chos la mi chags te// lus ni thogs pa med//
49b4: par ni// sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro bar byed// zhing dag na ni 'jig rten 'dren/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtag tu mthong // sangs rgyas ngag gi zhing bshad pa// chos rnams de dag der yang nyan// de la mi shes yod med de// chos kyi//
49b5: dbyings kyang rab tu 'chad// chos kyi rnam pa rtag tu rig/ de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul// bskal pa bye bar 'chad ston kyang // de yi spobs pa mi zad 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' gzhan mang po// mkhas pa dag kyang sprul par bye ba/
49b6: byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa ni// pad ma mdab ma stong dag la// dkyil mo dkrung bcas 'dug pa dag/ zhing nas zhing du 'gro bar byed// ting 'dzin zhi ba bsgoms nas ni// gzungs dang mdo sde bzang po dang // mdo sde gzhan yang
49b7: bye ba dang / / sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu ston// sems can mang po bsam mi khyab// phyir mi ldog la 'god par byed// sangs rgyas byang chub pa ston kyang // spobs pa dag ni zad mi 'gyur// rin chen rnam par brgyan pa yi// rang pa
49b8: brtsegs zhugs de 'gro ste/ / dri dang ldan pa'i me tog gis// 'dren pa la yang mngon par 'thor// dri dang ldan pa'i phye mas kyang // 'dren pa la ni rab tu 'thor// de dag thams cad byang chub phyir// rgya che ba yi mchod pa byed// byang

50a1: chub sems dpa' skyob pa yi/ / yon tan dpag med de dag ni// nam zhig nyon mongs med gyur pa// de tshe rdzu 'phrul de dag 'thob// nyon mongs dag ni mi skye zhing // dag pa dang ba 'od gsal ba// mi 'khrugs 'dus ma byas pa/
50a2: ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul lo// rab tu zhi zhing nye bar zhi// nyon mongs med cing mya ngan bral// spros med rnam par ma spros pa// spros pa dag las shin du 'das// yi ge'i spyod pa med pa ni// chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid de//
50a3: dbyangs kyis rig par dka' bas na// de phyir ting nge 'dzin ces bya// zad mi shes shing nye bar zhi// lhun gyis 'grub cing bstan med pa// rnyog med yang dag nyid kyi mtha'// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul lo// 'od dang 'gro ba med pad//
50a4: spros med lhun gyis grub pa yi// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis bslab pa ste// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di bslabs nas// yon tan dag gi pha rol phyin// tshu rol dang ni pha rol med// sngon mtha' rnam par ma
50a5: brtags te/ de phyir sangs rgyas de dag kun// yon tan dag gi pha rol phyin// 'od dang 'gro ba med pa dang // spros med lhun gyis grub pa yi// chos kyi rang bzhin mkhyen nas ni// de dag de las pha rol phyin// ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan
50a6: pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o/ / // 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo// bam po lnga pa// de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa bstan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas
50a7: pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
50a8: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bslab pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa legs par bshad pa ni ngo mtshar to/ / 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis

50b1: yun ring por bslab pa 'di la bslabs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa ni bcom ldan 'das bdag spobs so/ / bde bar gshegs pa bdag spobs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
50b2: stsal pa/ gzhon nu de'i dus la dbab par shes na khyod spobs par gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la skabs phye nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon sum du tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa
50b3: 'di dag gis bstod do/ / 'dod dang khro bas rtag tu zil non cing // sdug bsngal gtses pa'i sems can gzigs nas ni// skye dgu par byed sangs rgyas gyur cig ces// byang chub phyir ni khyod kyis sems kyang bskyed// dpa' bos
50b4: bskal pa bye ba mang spyad de/ / sbyin dang dul dang legs sdom rtag tu gnas// bzod dang tshul khrims de bzhin brtson 'grus des// sbyin pa dag kyang mtha' yas rgya cher byin// rkang lag dang ni srog kyang rab gtong zhing // khyod kyi
50b5: yid la nam yang skyo mod de/ / gsar dngul de bzhin bu dang chung ma dang // chags med gyur nas rgyal po'i srid kyang gtong // khyod kyi tshul khrims dri med rnam dag ste// bdag nyid gtong zhing tshul khrims yod mi 'dral// lus dang //
50b6: ngag dang yid kyang rab tu bsdams// bde gshegs sems dul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bzod la dgyes shing bzod pa'i lam la gnas// lus ni dum bur byas kyang 'khrug med de// byams pa bsgoms pas de las 'o ma
50b7: zags/ bde gshegs ro mtshar khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// stobs bcu dag gi stobs dang ldan gyur cing // chags med ye shes gnas pas chos kun rtogs// thugs rjes 'jig rten phan mdzad chos kyi rje// skye dgu 'di yi don
50b8: bzher thugs brtse ba/ / stong par mkhyen cing 'di na sems can med// de bzhin 'jig rten lam stor gzigs nas ni// de dag rang bzhin bdag med chos rtogs bgyis// rnam grol skyes kyang gang na'ang rnam grol med// so sor//

51a1: brtags te bag med thams cad spangs// bdud sde mtha' yas stobs dang ldan pa bcom// ye shes mtha' yas byang chub rgya cher mkhyen// mchog tu rnam dag zhi ba'i chos kyang ston// zla ba skar mar bcas pa gnam ldu
51a2: shing / ri dang grong du bcas pa'i sa shigs la// nam mkha'i khams ni rnam pa gzhan gyur kyang // khyod ni mi bden pa yi tshig mi gsung // skye dgu dmigs pa dag la dga' ba dang // sems can sdug bsngal khyod kyis gzigs nas ni/
51a3: stong pa nyid dang zab cing zhi ba yi// dmigs pa med pa dag ni ston par mdzad// bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su// mi dmigs pa yi bsrab pa la// dpa' bo chen pos bslabs pas na// khyod la 'khrul pa yod mi mda'// ji lta bu yi
51a4: chos bslabs pa/ / de lta bu yi chos ston te// mu stegs gzhan dag ji snyed dang // byis pa dag gis sa 'di min// bdag tu 'du shes gang gnas pa// mi mkhas de dag 'khrul par 'gyur// chos rnams bdag med rig pas na// khyod la
51a5: 'khrul pa yod mi mnga'/ / dpa' bo chen po yang dag gsung // yang dag chos la rab tu gnas// mgon po yang dag bden gnas te// yang dag tshig ni rab tu gsung // khyod kyi smon lam btab pa bzhin// khyod kyi yang dag spyod pa byung / yang
51a6: dag de yi rgyu 'dra bas/ / yang dag tshig ni rab tu gsung // yang dag spyod pa phun sum tshogs// yang dag mtha' la shin du bslabs// yang dag bsam pa yang dag spyod// yang dag mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyi shes rab mnyam
51a7: pa med/ / ye shes gsung ba 'od mdzad pa// ye shes khyad par rab brnyes shing // ye shes gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyis byams pa rab bsgoms te// sems can kun gyi bshes gnyen khyod// ri rab bzhin du mi skul te// pi
51a8: g.yo rab tu gnas pa'o/ / ston pa'i 'khor tshogs rgya che yang // tshogs med dag kyang sdud par mdzad// shes rab zab mo bde bar gshegs// 'khor gyi nang gshegs sgra yang sgrog/ sangs rgyas seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shing // seng ge'i

51b1: stabs su rnam par gshegs/ / khyod kyis mu stegs kun btul ba// seng ge yis ni wa rnams bzhin// dpa' bo ma dul rul mdzad pa// ma dul ba dag khyod kyis btul// de dag mdza' sdug brtan gyur te// dbyer mi phyed cing legs par
51b2: gnas/ / lta ba sna tshogs gnas pa yi// sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas ni// sdug dang mi sdug med pa yi// bdag med chos ni khyod ston te// ma bslabs pa yi byis pa dag/ log pa'i lam la spyod pa rnams// 'dren pa gang nas
51b3: gshegs pa yi/ / lam la rab tu khyod kyis bstan// bdag tu 'dzin la su gnas pa// de dag sdug bsngal nyid la gnas// gang la sdug bsngal med pa yi// bdag med de dag mi shes so// 'khrul pa med pa'i chos tshig khyod ston te// khyod
51b4: la 'khrul pa mi rnyed 'jig rten mgon/ / khyod ni ma log pa yi tshig gsung ste// sdug bsngal mar thar mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// lha klu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig phrag/ brgya stong mang po mkha' la 'khod pa rnams// bcom
51b5: ldan 'das kyi don ldan gsung thos nas/ / thams cad 'dren la rab tu dga' ba bskyed// tshig ni rab tu snyan cing bzang la 'thad// mnyen zhing 'jam la yid 'od dras dad 'byor// gsung gi yan lag dpag tu med dang ldan// phan byed sku
51b6: bo mang po thar byed pa/ / sil snyan brgya stong dpag tu med pa dang // lha yi dbyangs sgra dga' bar 'gyur ba'i mchog/ shin du snyan pa dus gcig 'byor gyur kyang // bde gshegs gsung gcig gis ni zil gyis non// bu
51b7: byug bya mar 'jam pa'i sgra 'byin dang / / kun la shin du yid 'thad dbyangs snyan dag/ bya tshogs mang po thams cad sgra 'byin pa// sangs rgyas gsung gi char yang des mi pod// lha yi bu mo sgra dbyangs snyan pa dang // sil snyan rol
51b8: mo glu dbyangs 'jam pa dang / / bi bang rdza rnga rnga chen rung gi sgra// de dag sangs rgyas gsung gi char mi phod// khu byug ne tso ri skegs sgra rnams dang // khrung khrung rma bya mi 'am ci yi sgra// sgra dbyangs yid 'od snyan pa ci yod pa// de dag sangs

52a1: rgyas gsung gi char mi phor/ / snyan cing mnyen la yid 'ong dga' ba dang // shin du mnyen la rab bsngags zhi ba'i tshig/ dbyangs rnams thams cad dus gcig bsgrags pa bas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung mchog dgar
52a2: 'gyur yin/ / lha mi mi dbang lha ma yin rnams dang // srid gsum sems can mtha' dag ci yod pa// 'od byed rnams kyi 'od snang de dag ni// bde gshegs 'od zer gcig gis zil gyis non// bde gshegs sku ni me tog rgyas pa
52a3: bzhin/ mtshan rnams kun gyis sna tshogs spras shing brgyan// bsod nams brgyas grub dag cing rnam par dang // rgyal ba'i sku ni 'jig rten kun du lhan// dung gi sgra dang kha ra rnga sgra snyan dang // rnga yi sgra dang de bzhin kis pa la
52a4: sgra/ rab tu 'jam zhing 'thad pa'i sgra de kun// sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi brgya yi char mi phod// sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig stong ga sgra// sgra skad gsal zhing mnyen pa lha yi 'dra// lha dang lha mo'i sgra dbyangs dgar 'gyur ba/
52a5: sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi brgya yi char mi phod// khrung khrud rma bya ngur ba khu zug dang // dad pa kun la rnam mar bya yi tshogs// de dag sgra snyan dus gcig tshogs pas kyang // sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi brgya yi char mi phod// klu dang
52a6: gnod sbyin lha min lto 'phye dang / / lha dbang tshangs pa lha yi bdag po'i sgra// srid gsum yid 'od 'thad pa ci yod pa// de dag sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi char mi phod// tshangs pa'i 'od dang lha yi dbang po dang // nyi ma dang ni nor bu rin
52a7: chen 'od/ kun gyi 'od ni rnam pa dus dang / 'od kun rgyal ba'i 'od kyis zil gyis non// lus dang ngag dang yid kyang shin du rnam par dag/ ye shes dag pa srid pa gsum na gos pa med// mi dbang yon tan dbyig tshogs yon tan
52a8: rin chen mnga'/ / rang 'byung yon tan thams cad kyis ni mnyam med mnyam// de ltar stobs bcu bden pa gsung la bstod nas ni// gzhon nu yid kyang rab tu dga' bas tshig smras pa// sangs rgyas gzhal med dpag yas la ni

52b1: mchod pa yis/ / shAkya thu ba bzhin bdag kyang sangs rgyas gyur cig smra// bde bar gshegs pas de yi spyod pa mchog mkhyen nas// mi dbang chags med ye shes mda' 'ab 'dzum pa mdzad// stobs bcu sras kyi thub byams pas na pa
52b2: 'dren pas gang gi slang du 'di ltar badzum pa mdzad/ / sa 'di dag kyang rnam pa drug tu yongs su g.yos// lha dang klanams mkha' la 'dug cing rab dga' ste// shin du sems rangs mgulas sangs rgyas lha zhing mchis// de gagags
52b3: zil gyis ma non de dag lung bstan gsol/ / skyes bu mchog gi ye shes gang la zhugs pa ni// bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dag gis ma lags// rgyal ba khyod kyis gang gi slad du 'dzum mdzad pa// ye shes nas dag dpe mad ya rtse
52b4: ma lus gsungs/ / shAkya'i seng ge spobs bcu mnga' zhing rnam 'dren pa// rkang gnyis gtso bo ye shes kyi'ang pha rol byin// 'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang thab gti mug sel// rab tu 'od sdang mdzad pa khyod la zhu ba lags// byang chub
52b5: dam pa mchog 'di rab tu tshol ba'i phyir/ / 'dren pa khyod kyis bskal pa gang gA'i bye snyad dang // de las lhag par yang ni spyod pa rab tu sbyad// gang gi don du 'dzum pa 'di mdzad bstan du gsol// ye shes dam pa mchog 'di rab tu
52b6: tshol ba'i phyir/ / ston pas phyag dang zhabs kyang yongs su btang ba mdzad// sras dang btsun mo mnyen gshes rtsa lag phangs pa btang // thub pa 'dzum pa bstan pa 'di yi rgyu gang lags// rta dang baglang dang ni shing rta rkang thang dang // than
52b7: dang nor bu dngul dang mu tig khyod kyis btang / / spyod pa mchog spyod tshe ni khyod kyis ma btang ba// rin po che dang nor rdzas dag ni gang yang med// srid pa gsum na ye shes dag ni mchog tu gyur// sems can thams cad kyi ni spyod par
52b8: tu mkhyen/ sems dang khams dang mos pa dag la'ang mkhas shing rig/ gang gi don du 'dzum pa 'di dag bstan pa mdzad// mi yi gtso bo la ni gang gis mchod// gang gi don ni rgya che yangs par 'gyur// spyod pa 'di yang su dag rab

53a1: tu 'dzir/ thub pa gang gi don du 'dzum 'di bstan// sa yang rnam pa drag tu rab tu g.yos// pad ma bye ba mdab ma bye bar ldan// gser gyi pad ma shin du 'od gsal ba// mdzes shing yid du 'thad pas las byung // byang chub sem
53a2: dpa' rdza 'phrul rab che ba/ / rgyal ba'i thugs kyi sras po de la mchis// chos smra ba yang mang po 'dir mchis te// 'dren pa la ni de yi slad du zhu// rnga dang dung dang khar rnga sgra chen dang // sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brdungs pa yi// de dag skra
53a3: ni nam mkha' 'di las gda'/ / bde bar gshegs pa'i dbyangs ni bsam mo khyab// khrung khrung dang pa ka la bing ka dang // khu byug bya tshogs mdo po 'dus pa yi// sgra dbyangs rab tu snyan pa phyung ba yang // de dag sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi
53a4: chang mi phod/ / gang gis sbyin dang dul dang legs sdom rnams// sngon gyi bskal pa mang por bsnyen par bgyis// gang gis mi yi gtso bo rab mchod na// su yi slad du 'dzum pa 'di dag bstan// ri mo gus pa mchog kyang bskyed nas
53a5: ni/ sangs rgyas byang chub ji ltar thob 'gyur zhes// gang gis rkang gnyis gtso la sngon chad zhus// su yi slad du 'dzum pa 'di dag bstan// stobs bcu ldan pa ji snyed 'das pa dang // da ltar byung dang ma byon bde gshegs dang //
53a6: mi yi gtso bo thams cad rab tu mkhyen// de phyir skye dgu'i don du zhu ba lags// srog chags kun gyi spyod yul mtha' yas dang // mi rnams gang gi bsam pa ji 'dra dang // skye dgu'i sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu mkhyen// de phyir
53a7: mi yi gtse la zhu ba lags/ / chu dang rigs pa 'dul la mkhas pa dag/ sangs rgyas ye shes ji ltar thob snyam pa// spyod pa mchog la su dag spyod pa rnams// de phyir bdag ni rkang gnyis gtse la zhu// gang gis phra zhing shin du blta
53a8: dka'i chos/ stong pa zhi ba mtshungs med bsam mi khyab// stobs bcu ldan pa'i spyod yul bsgoms pa rnams// de dag slad du 'dren pa bdag zhu'o// srog chags 'gro ba bsam yas kun gyi phyir// gang gis byams pa snying rje rab

53b1: bsgoms shing / gang la sems cad 'du shes med pa dag/ de phyir rkang gnyis gtso la bdag zhu'o// gang dag ye shes mtshungs med bsam mi khyab// de gas ni gzung ba yongs med de// sems dang spyod yul dag gi pha rol phyin// de phyir
53b2: mgon po la ni bdag zhu'o/ / tshul khrims ye shes yon tan pha rol phyin// dus gsum la ni ye shes mtshungs med 'jug/ khyod la 'khrul pa dag ni mi mnga' na// su yi slad du 'dzum pa 'di dag bstan// shA ri'i bu dang ma 'gags
53b3: maud gal bu/ / bde gshegs nyan thos gzhan gang su mchis pa// 'di la de dag ye shes mi 'jug ste// 'di ni sangs rgyas spyod yul bla na med// chos rnams kun la dbang bapo'i pha rol phyin// bslab pa'i spyod pa kun gyis mngon
53b4: bar 'phags/ 'dren pa thugs rje dag kyang rab bskyed la// don dam mkhyen pa gsung sgrar dbyung bar gsol// sngon gang bskal pa bye ba mang por yang // skyabs dang dpung gnyen mchog tu gyur snya ma ste// de 'dra'i sems kyis rkang
53b5: gnyis gtso dris pa/ / 'dren pas de yi 'bras bu dad gsungs shig/ gang zag chen pos lung bstan mnyan pa'i phyir// gnod sbyin srin po grul bum gsang ba bo// rkang gnyis gtso bo la ni rab rtog cing // thams cad thal mo sbyar
53b6: te gus par 'khod/ / sangs rgyas zhing ni bye ba mang po nas// byang chub sems dpa' 'phrul ldan mang po mchis// bde gshegs sras kyi gtso bo thugs las skyes// thams cad thal mo sbyar cing gus pas 'khod// shAkya se ge mi
53b7: mchog dri ba'i phyir/ / mi 'khrugs zhing phyogs 'jig rten rnam grags pa// shar phyogs nas ni spos kyi glang po yang // byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig mdun bdar mchis// shAkya seng ge mi mchog dri ba'i phyir// bde ba can gyi
53b8: 'jig rten khams mchog nas/ / mthu chen thob dang spyan ras gzigs dbang yang // byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig lhan cig mchis// gang dag sngon chad bskal pa bye mang snyed// ye shes dam pa mchog 'di tshol ba'i phyir//

54a1: rgya mtsho kun gyi bye ma mnyam pa yi// bde gshegs dpag tu med pa bsnyen bkur bgyis// sangs rgyas kun gyis bstod cing rab bsngags pa// chos rnams kun gyi yon tan pha rol phyin// 'jig rten phyogs rnams kun du
54a2: rab grags pa/ / 'jam dbyangs legs par thal mo sbyar te mchis// sangs rgyas zhing du khrag khrig spyad bgyis kyang // 'di 'dra rnams ni mthong ba rnyed dka' ste// legs bslabs sangs rgyas sras po yon tan can// thams
54a3: cad thal mo rab sbyar gus par 'khod/ / ston pa kun gyi chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa// mkhas pa 'dir mchis ci 'dra de lta bu// snod du gyur pa 'di na gzhan ma mchis// 'dren pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs su brjod pa gsungs// rgyal ba
54a4: rnam 'dren gleng gzhi ma mchis par/ / gang zag dam pa 'dzum pa mi ston na// gang gi slad du 'dzum pa 'di bstan pa// rnga mchog sgra ldan gsung dbyangs dbyung du gsol// ngang pa khu byug rma byas ras// 'brug gi sgra skad khyu mchog
54a5: sgra 'byin bzhin/ / lha yi rol mo snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa// sems can grol mdzad gsung gis lung ston cig/ byams pa bskyed cing dga' ba 'phel bar bgyid// ye shes ston cing ma rig sel ba ste// don la rtog cing shes
54a6: rab 'phel bgyid cing / / bskal pa khrag khrig bye bar rnam sbyong ba// rtogs pas des bgyis dngos po rnam par bshig/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i tshig don nges par ston// mu stegs kun gyi smra ba rnam par 'jom// stong pa/
54a7: srog med sems can med pa sgom// bsod nams stong phrag brgya yis legs par brgyan// sangs rgyas stong phrag brgya yis 'dir sprad de// lha rnams stong phrag brgya yis rab tu bstod// tshangs pa stong phrag brgya yis phyag
54a8: kyang bgyis/ / gnod sbyin srin po grul bum dang bgyid de// klu dang lto 'phye 'dab bzangs grol bar bgyid// rtag tu ma chags shin du ldang ba ste// las dge'i 'bras bus 'phags pa gsung phyung shig/ rgyal ba ji snyed mya ngan 'das

54b1: pa dang / gang dag ma byon pa dang bzhugs pa rnams// thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen cing thogs mi mda'// 'dren pa yon tan kun gyis shin du 'phags// 'byung po 'dzin pa ri dang rgya mtshor bcas// sa 'di thams cad rnam pa
54b2: drug tu g.yos/ / lha yi tshogs rnams mkha' las me tog 'thor// lha yi spos dang yid du 'ong ba lnga pa// 'dod chags zhe sdang rab rib ma lus bsal// tshul khrims yongs dag yid kyang yongs su dag/ mtshan med rab
54b3: tu zhi ba'i snod la dgyes/ / seng ge'i sgra skad sgrogs shig thugs rje can// spobs dang ldan zhing shin du snyan pa yangs// rgyal ba'i shes rab rdzogs shing ye shes rdzogs// thugs rje ldan pa khyod 'dra 'jig rten med// gang gi don du
54b4: 'dzum pa 'di bstan gsungs/ / rma bya khu byu ga ka la bing ka'i sgra// shang shang te'u'i sgra yang yid 'ong ba// dga' 'gyur skad kun dus gcig tshogs pas kyang // bde gshegs gsung gi char ni des mi phod// rnga dang rdza rnga khar rnga de bzhin te/
54b5: dung dang gling bu de bzhin pi bang dang // sil snyan stong gi sgra rnams gcig tu 'dus// de dag bde gshegs sgra yi char mi pod// lha yi sil snyan dam pa stong gi sgra// lha yi bu mo glu dbyangs snyan pa dang // rol mo'i sgra rnams dga' ba
54b6: bskyed bgyid pa/ / de dag bde gshegs gsung gi char mi phong // 'jig rten phan pa khyod kyi gsung gcig las// mos pa thad da bzhin du sgra 'byung ste// rgyal ba bdag la ston snyam so so sems// gang gi slad du khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad
54b7: bstan/ / lha yi sgra dang de bzhin klu yi skad// mi 'am ci yi sgra snyan ci mchis pa// de dag nam yang nyon mongs zhi mi bgyid// sangs rgyas gsung ni rtag tu nyon mongs sel// dga' ba bskyed cing 'dod chags dga' ma lags// byams/
54b8: pa skyed cing zhe sdang blo ma lags// shes rab skud cing gti mug blo ma lags// sangs rgyas gsung gis dri ma thams cad sel/ 'khor las slad rol tu ni sgra mi 'byung // thams cad kyi yang nem nur brgya mang gcod// mtho ba ma lags

55a1: dma' ba ma lags pa/ / thub pa'i gsung ni snyoms shing bde ba ston// ri dang nags bcas sa 'di gas gyur cing // rgya mtsho'i chu dag de bzhin pas gyur la// zla ba nyi ma sa la lhung gyur kyang // rgyal bas bshad pa rnam pa
55a2: gzhan mi 'gyur/ / tshig gi yan lag thams cad dag pa'i gsung // seng ge'i sgra skad 'jam zhing mnyen pa'i dbyangs// tshangs pa'i dbyangs mnga' bde gshegs thugs rje can// gang gi slad du 'dzum mdzad bstan du gsol//
55a3: 'das dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi// 'jig rten sems can ji snyed kun gyi yang // sems dang spyod pa kun la rab tu mkhas// gang gi slad du 'dzum bstan bshad du gsol// rgyal ba ji snyed su dag thugs rje can// dbang dang
55a4: ye shes kun gyi pha rol phyin/ / dri med zla zhal rgyal ba de dag ni// rtag tu rgyu med 'dzum pa mi mdzad do// bskal pa bye bar brjod kyang mtshungs med pa// gang gA'i bye snyed yon tan brjod bgyis kyang // yon tan dag gi tshad brjod mi nus//
55a5: pa/ gang gi slad du 'dzum bstan bshad du gsol// 'dzum pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis/
55a6: slar bka' stsal pa// zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid kyis// mtshungs pa med pa'i dga' bas sangs rgyas bstod// sangs rgyas yon tan bye brag 'phags brjod pa// rtag tu khor mor shin du bsngags par 'gyur// sngon lnga
55a7: rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer 'dir/ / sangs rgyas dag kyang bye ba phrag stong mthong // rgyal ba de dag kun gyi drung du 'dis// ting 'dzin ni mchog 'di yang rab tu dris// byang chub spyod pa mchog 'di spyad pa na// 'di ni kun du ngo yi brang gyur/
55a8: te/ thams cad du yang spobs dang ldan par gyur// kun du rtag par tshangs par spyod pa spyad// de ni phyi dus 'jigs pa chen po la// 'di la ma pham khyod nyid de yi dbang // rtag tu tshangs spyod gtsang la gnas nas ni// ting nge 'dzin 'di

55b1: shin du rgyas byed 'gyur/ / ting 'dzin dam pa 'di ni rab tshol zhing // lam 'dir zhugs pas byang chub des thob 'gyur// sangs rgyas bye ba mang pos yongs bzung ste// 'dren pa rnams la mchod pa mchog byed 'gyur// da ni
55b2: ye shes la yang rab gnas te/ / zla 'od spyod pa byang zhugs lung bstan cing // 'di yi srog dang tshangs par spyod pa dag/ phyi ma'i dus la bar chad med par bya// lag mthil sgra ru 'bru lnga bkod pa bzhin// ma 'ongs pa na gang
55b3: la mchod 'gyur ba/ / sangs rgyas bye ba dag ni phrag stong dang // de las lhag par gang gA'i bye snyed shes// lha dang klu rnams bye ba brgyad bcu dang // gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag bdun bcu dag/ phyi ma'i dus la brtson pa byed par
55b4: 'gyur/ rkang gnyis gtso bo la yang mchod pa byed// rkang gnyis gtso la mchod pa mchog byas te// ye shes bla med 'di ni rab bsgrubs nas// phyi dus lus la de ni 'jig rten mgon// rgyal ba dri med 'od ces bya bar 'gyur// zla 'ong/
55b5: gzhon nur gyur pas bdag nyid kyi// lung bstan 'di thos dga' bas rgyas gyur te// ta la bdun sred du ni mngon 'phags nas// mkha' la 'dug ste ched du brjod pa brjod// e ma rgyal ba chos mchog ston mdzad pa// rnam grong
55b6: ye shes bdag po stobs la gnas/ shin du nges pa'i ye shes mchog gnas pa// pha rol rgol ba dag gis zil mi non// chags pa spangs shing rnam par grol la reg/ dngos po rnam bshig srid par chags mi/
55b7: mdzad// khyod la spros pa mtha' dag kun mi mda'// srid pa gsum la chags med ye shes 'jug/ spros pa thams cad kyis kyang mi gos shing // lta ba spros pa mtha' dag rab tu spangs// lam yang shin du bsgoms/
55b8: shing gnas med pa// zil gyis ma non sra dang mi 'phrod med// khyod ni khams gsum dag la gnas med de// chu bo dang ni mdud pa thams cad spangs// srid pa'i 'khri shing 'ching ba mtha' dag bcad // srid pa spangs shing

56a1: srid par mtshams sbyor med/ / chos kyi rang bzhin dngos med rab mkhyen cing // brjod du med pa'i tshig kyang thugs su chud// mu stegs phyin ci log la gnas pa dag/ mi mkhas de bzhin seng ges wa bzhin bshig/ bde bar
56a2: gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos kyi gter / / gter mchog dam pa bdag gis deng thob ste// ngan 'gro log par ltung ba thams cad spangs// 'dren par mi 'gyur snyam ni the tshom med// gser gyi kha dog mdzes shing 'od gsal ba// phyag
56a3: brkyang de yi mgo la rab bzhag nas/ / lhar bcas 'jig rten dag kyang dbang bkod de// mi yi khyu mchog byang chub dbang bskur mdzad// 'dzum pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcwa lnga pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
56a4: kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ / gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad srid pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad las thar par bya bar 'dod pa dang // ting nge 'dzin
56a5: gyi dga' zhing bde ba bla na med pa 'phags pa 'di la sems can rnams rab tu dgod par 'dod pas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya//
56a6: kun chub par bya/ bcad par bya/ klag par bya/ rab tu 'don par bya/ lung mnod par bya/ kha ton du bya/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i bsgom pas bsgom par bya// mang du bya/ gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu
56a7: bstan par bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di ni ngan song thams cad las 'da' bar byed pa/ nad thams cad las rab tu
56a8: thar par byed pa yin te/ gzhon nu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di thos shing bzung ste bsgoms par

56b1: gyur pa de'i tshe/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad srid pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad las thar par byas shing ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' ba'i bde ba bla na med pa 'phags pa la sems
56b2: can rnams rab tu 'god de ting nge 'dzin 'di yang myur du 'thob bo/ / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la don 'a
56b3: nyid bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis sngon byung ba'i gtam bstan pa 'di yang dag par rab tu bshad do/ / sngon chad spyod pa spyad pa dran pa ni// bde gshegs seng ge rgyal mtshan bstan pa la// dge slong mkhas pa chos
56b4: spu byung ba yang / / de yi ming ni tshangs pas byin zhes bya// da ni blo gros zhes bya rgyal po'i bu// na bar gyur te mi bzang sdug bsngal tshor// de tshe tshangs pas byin pa chos smra ba// nga yi slob dpon du ni gyur pa yin// da ni sman pa lnga brgya ma nyung
56b5: pa/ brtson pa'i yid kyis nad dpyad gso bar byed// nga yi nad ni gso bar ma nus nas// da yi gnyen pa shes kun kyang sdug bsngal gyur// da yang na bar dge slong des thos nas// nad dri bar ni nga yi drung du 'ongs// tshangs byin nga la brtse
56b6: ba rab bskrad nas/ / ting 'dzin mchog 'di de tshe bshad par gyur// da ni ting 'dzin dam pa 'di thos nas// 'phags pa'i dga' ba zang zing med pa skyes// chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyang rab shes pas// nga yang de yi dus na nad las sos//
56b7: mar me mdzad na sprin pa spyod pa na// dge slong chos spra mkhas par gyur pa yin// nga ni blo gros rgyal po'i bur gyur te// ting 'dzin ye shes kyis ni nad las thar// de bas gzhon nu khyod kyis phyi dus na// yongs su nyams pa 'di dag
56b8: rjes dran zhing / / byis pas nyes par brjod pa'i tshig bzod kyis// ting 'dzin 'di yang zung la legs par rtogs// phyi ma'i dus la dge slong mang po dag/ brkam zhing gtum lam bsdams 'byung bar 'gyur// sdig la dga' zhing

57a1: lhung bzed chos gos chags/ / ting 'dzin 'di ni rab tu spong bar 'gyur// rgod cing dbang po g.yengs pa phrag dog can// grong la chags shing rnyed pa 'dod pa dag/ sbyor ba byed pa'i skabs la rtag tu gnas// ting 'dzin
57a2: 'di ni rab tu spong bar 'gyur/ / lag pa dang ni rkang pa rnam par rdob// rtse 'jo rgod la rtag par rab tu zhugs// gcig la gcig ni mgul 'khyud lag kyang spel// grong du spyod lam gzhan du sbyar bar byed// mi rigs sbyong
57a3: ba'i mtshan nyid 'di dag ste/ / gzhan gyi bu mo la yang rtag tu chags// gzugs kyi rgyugs shing 'dun pa bor ba yin// grong dang grong khyer yul 'khor kun du rgyu// de dag bza' dang btung la rab tu zhugs// gla dang bro gang de/
57a4: bzhin rol mo dang // nyo 'tsheng lhag par byed cing rtag tu brtson// btung ba dag la chags shing ngo tsha bor// mi rigs brtson pa sprid yig bskur bar byed// tshul khrims de bzhin lam dag btang nas ni// khyim pa dag dang bsten
57a5: cing khrims dral nas/ / de dag tshul zhig log par shin du gnas// las gang sangs rgyas kyis ni rtag smad pa// srang dang tshad la g.yo sgyu byed par zhugs// de 'dra'i sdig pa nyon mongs las byas pas// las ngan byed pa de
57a6: ngag ngan song 'gro/ / dung dang gser dang nor bu nor mang dang // khyim dang gnyen bshes rnam spangs rab byung ste// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di la rab byung nas// sdig pa'i las rnams shin spyod par byed// nor dang 'bru la snying por
57a7: 'dra shes shing / / bzhon dang ba lang shing rta rnams la chags// gang la bslab pa'i nan tan med pa rnams// de dag gis kyang ci phyir mgo bo bregs// ngas ni sngon tshe spyod pa spyad pa na// bskal pa stong du shin du dka' spyad de//
57a8: nga yis ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di btsal na/ de dag de tshe 'di thos gad mos 'debs// de dag yun ring brdzun smra tshangs mi spyod// rtag tu rnyed la dga' zhing ngan song gzhol// tshangs par spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan thogs nas ni// tshul

57b1: khrims 'chal ba de ni chos min smra/ / de dag phan tshun dbye ba'i phyir 'jug ste// rigs pa ma yin pas ni rnyed pa tshol// gcig la gcig ni mi snyan rab brjod de// shi 'phos nas ni ngan song mar yang 'gro// de dag brgya dang stong
57b2: gnang na yang / / de che bzod pa'i stobs ldan shin du dkon// de phyir 'thab la brtson pa mang po 'byung // bzod pa spangs nas rab tu spros pa byed// byang chub sems dpa' nged yin tshig tu smra// de yi sgra yang phyogs dang phyogs su
57b3: 'gro/ mi bden sgra yi dregs pas de rgyags te// tshul khrims nyams pas byang chub ga la yod// gang la bsam pa rnam par dag med cing // chos 'di la yang bzod pa med pa dang // chos rnams spong byed byang chub 'di thob pa/
57b4: ngas ni ma thos nam yang yod ma mthong // de dag 'jigs shing skrag nas khyim spangs te// rab tu byung nas shin du dam du 'dzin// skyes bu dam pa'i theg pa spang byas nas// bye brag lhag par 'dod pa brlab par 'gyur// shes
57b5: rab dman zhing yon tan rnam spangs pa/ / theg pa mchog gi nyes pa rtag tu brjod// gang gi skyabs su de dag rab zhugs pa// de nyid la yang nyes pa brgya dag brjod// 'tsho ba med pa mang po rab byung ste// sangs rgyas byang chub rnam pa
57b6: kun mi 'dod/ / byis pa de dag bdag tu lta la gnas// stong pa nyid ni thos nas skrag par 'gyur// phan tshun du'ang rtsod pa byas nas ni// gnod sems khong khro thab rab tu skyed// phan tshun du yang skur ba mngon 'debs shing //
57b7: sdig pa byas nas shin du dga' ba rnyed// gang dag tshul khrims gnas shing yon tan ldan// byams la gnas shing rtag tu bzod rtogs pa/ mnyes zhing nges la shin du bsdams pa rnams/ de dag de tshe yongs su brnyes par
57b8: 'gyur/ gang la shin tu gtum sems ldan 'byung dang // mi bzad ma rungs ngan pa'i las byed pa// chos ma yin pa spyod cing 'thab la dga'// de dag de yi dus na mchod par 'gyur// bsgo bar bya zhing rab tug par bya// gzhon nu

58a1: dad pa'i phyir 'brang na/ / bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa 'di dran nas// de dag la ni nam yang yid me rton// de dag 'dod chags che zhing zhe sdang che// gti mug che zhing nga rgyal dregs pas rgyags// bus kyang mdul dag
58a2: kyang ma dul zhing / / sems kyang ma dul ngan song gzhol ba yin// nga ni yon tan dag gi bsngags brjod na// dge slong yon tan dag la mi spyod de// tshig tsam gyis ni byang chub thob mi 'gyur// nan tan lhur byed byang chub rnyed
58a3: mi dka'/ sngon byung ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas gtam 'di mthar phyin par gyur pa dang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa de ltar 'dug bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la
58a4: yid kyis tshigs su bcad pas zhus pa/ re yi rgyal po bya rgod phung po ste// rtag tu sangs rgyas gnas par bde gshegs bzhud// 'jig rten sgron ma der yang gshegs nas ni// khyod la bsam gyis mi khyab mchod pa bgyi//
58a5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la yid kyis tshigs su bcad pas/
58a6: btang ba/ ri'i rgyal por rgyal ba mngon gnas par// ma pham bdud rnams pham byas khyod song shig/ der ni 'gro ba kun gyi don chen yang // bla na med pa myur du grub par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
58a7: chen po byams pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yid kyis tshigs su bcad pas btang ba dang / / bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis phyag 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'khor de nas byungs
58a8: sangs rgyas mu med pa rgya mtsho'i bye ma snyed kyi gnas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po mchod rten chen po gang na yod pa der song ste/ phyin nas 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir de'i mod la ri'i

58b1: rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po mnyam zhing yangs pa rgya che ba/ sdong dum dang tsher ma dang rdo dang gseg ma dang gyo mo med cing khor khor yug kun rin po che sna bdun du byin gyis brlabs te/ sa gzhi rin po che an da rnyil 'bar/
58b2: babasam gyis mi khyab la dpe med pa'i lha'i rgyan thams cad dang rin po ches brgyan pa/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs grangs med pa du ma'i bkod pas rab tu smras pa// dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i na bzas khyim gyi nyen
58b3: 'khor brgyan cing snang de/ bdug spos kyi snod sna tshogs nas ni bdug pa 'brul bar byas/ phreng ba dang lnga ldis ni brgyan/ me tog sna tshogs ni bkra ma/ lha'i rol mo'i sgra dbyangs ni bsgrags// rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang lhab
58b4: lbub bsgreng bas ni gang / / rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du na blar bres/ 'khor gyi khyams kyi dbus su ni rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i lha'i seng ge'i khri mngon par sprul te rgyu spun las ma byas pa'i gos ne ting// na tsa yin de ltar 'jam
58b5: zhing reg na bde ba dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i na bzas ni g.yogs/ steng du snying po beg tsher ni bting / snam rten mtha' gnyis dmar po ni bshams/ chu zheng dang 'phang du dpag tshad tsam yod pa btsugs te/ zhabs rten ni lha dang mi'i las 'dra
58b6: par 'jam bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa/ mu tig gi drabs g.yogs pa/ ras rin po che bcos bus g.yogs pa/ seng ge'i khri la btegs pa'i lha'i rin po che'i dril bu las ni sgra 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba gsal bar 'byung / phyog
58b7: kun du ni nor bu rin po che chen pos snang bar gyur/ rin po che'i gdugs chen po rtsa ba ni bedUn dri ma med pa'i rin po che chen po las byas par mngon par sprul to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas ri re/
58b8: rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po khor yug dang bcas pa thams cad rin po che sna tshogs du ma'i bkod pa'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pas brgyan pa mngon par sprul nas skad cig de nyid la zla'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i khyim du zhugs par

59a1: gyur to/ / zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bstan la 'dug go// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ri yang lha rdzas yangs shing rgya che ba// rin chen rdzo
59a2: stengs bzang zhing dga' ba dang / / bsam gyis mi khyab lha rdzas yid kyi byams// dbus su rin chen seng ge'i khri yang btsugs// lha rdzas gdugs las yid 'ong sgra 'byung zhing // phyog su nor bu rin chen 'od cher 'byung // rtsa ba yid du
59a3: 'thad pa'i bai dUr+ya/ / pa pa ma rgyal ba'i sras pos de ltar sprul// ri yang rin chen sna tshogs rnam par bkra// rin chen gdan mchog rgyang grags tshad tsam du// byams pa dpa' bos de dag rab sprul nas// skad cig de nyid la ni khyim du
59a4: zhugs/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor chen po rgya mtsho lta bu la chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan te/ yang dag par gzeng bstod// yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas// yang dag par btsud de gdan las bzhengs nas gshegs
59a5: so/ / de lta bu yi sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i chu dron gyi sgor byung nas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po gang na yod pa der gshegs te byon pa dang byams pas sprul pa'i khyams gang na yod pa
59a6: der gshegs te byon nas byams pas mngon par sprul pa'i seng ge'i khri chen po la bzhugs te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis ni yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis ni mdun gyis bltas/ lha dang klu
59a7: dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang drang srong dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lho 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pas ni phyag byas te 'khor rgya mtsho lta bu'i nang na chos ston to/ / de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa
59a8: srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong thams cad lhags par gyur pa rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khrag khrig mang po dang lhan cig tu me tog dang /

59b1: bdug spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa thogs nas rol mo ni byed/ theg ni rdog gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang lha'i ba dan ni bsgreng / phreng ba chen po dbul ba ni thogs nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rgyal po'i khab
59b2: kyi grong khyer chen po zhi ba'i sgo nas byung ste/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri gang na yod pa dang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
59b3: bsor ba byas nas me tog dang bdag pa dang spos dang phred pa dang byug pa dang bye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang sil snyan dang pheg rdob pas mchod pa chen po byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / gus pa dang
59b4: ldan ri mo dang ldan par chos dri ba'i phyir phyogs cig tu 'dug pa dang zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la
59b5: 'di skad ces gsol to/ / gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag la skabs phye na bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// /
59b6: de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu khyod la skabs phyes/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
59b7: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal te go skabs phye nas bcom ldan 'das la zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
59b8: sems dpa' chen po chos dus dang ldan na chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces

60a1: bka' stsal to/ / gzhon nu chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ gzhon
60a2: nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shing 'grogs na bde ba yin/ / dul zhing dul ba'i sa thob pa yin te// de pha rol gyis bshes sam/ spros pa'i tshig nyes par smra zhing / nyes par brjod pa'i tshig gi lam
60a3: bzod cing mi mjed pa'i rang bzhin can yin/ las la lta zhing nga rgyal bcom pa dang chos 'dod pa yin te/ gzhon nu chos dang po 'di dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur/
60a4: ro// gzhan yang gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ tshul khrims yongs su dag cing tshul khrims ma zhig pa dang tshul khrims la skyon med pa dang tshul khrims 'dren ma ma
60a5: y in pa ngang tshul khrims sra srer ma gyur pa dang tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang tshul khrims mi gnas pa dang tshul khrims ma 'phags pa dang tshul khrims mi dmigs pa dang 'phags pas bstod pa'i tshul khrims dang mkhas pas
60a6: bstod pa'i tshul khrims pa yin te/ gzhon nu chos gnyis po 'di dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
60a7: c hen po khams gsum la sems skrag pa dang sems spangs pa dang skyo ba dang don du mi gnyer cing mngon par mi dga' ba dang ma chags ma zhen pa dang khams gsum la yid skyo bas khams gsum las gzhan du sems can
60a8: sdug bsngal ba rnams thar bar bya'o zhes brtson zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par sgrub pa yin to/ / gzhon nu chos gsum po 'di dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/

60b1: ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dad cing chos yongs su tshol bas mi ngoms pa yin/ mang du thos shing 'jigs pa med pa yin/ chos 'dod cing chos lhur
60b2: byed pa yin te/ rnyed pa dang bkur ba ste lhar byed pa ma yin/ shes kyi khe ltar byed pa ma yin/ phan pa'i dngos po sngon du 'gro ba'i sems kyis chos ji skad du thos pa dang / ji ltar khong du chud pa gzhan la rgya cher 'chad cing
60b3: rab tu ston pa yin te/ shes kyi khe 'dod pas ni ma yin gyi ci nas sems can 'di rnams chos 'di dag thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur snyam pa ste/ gzhon nu chos
60b4: bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ro/ / gzhon nu chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad
60b5: kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gzhon nu rnam grangs 'dis ting nge 'dzin
60b6: 'di 'di ltar sangs rgyas mang pos bshad pa sangs rgyas mang pos bsngags pa/ sangs rgyas mang pos yang dag par rab tu bstan pa/ sangs rgyas mang pos rab tu bstod pa yin te/ gzhon nu sangs rgyas bcom ldan
60b7: 'das mang po'i drung ngung rab tu byung nas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di rgya cher mnyan te bzung ngo / / dris shing bcangs so// blags so bton to/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i bsgom
60b8: pas bsgoms shing mang du byas so/ / gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas mang po nges par brjod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sngon byung ba'i gtam bstan pa 'di de'i tshe zla 'od

61a1: gzhon nur gyur pa la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pa/ dran pa bskal pa gzhal med dpag yas na/ rgyal ba dbyangs kyi yan lag sgra byung ste// bde gshegs dbyangs kyi yan
61a2: lag sgra de yi/ / tshe tshad lo yang brgya phrag drug bcur gyur// de yi pha rol sangs rgyas gzhan byung ba// mi mchog mtshan ni ye shes dbang phyug ste// rkang gnyis gtso bo ye shes dbang phyug gi/ tshe tshad lo grangs stong
61a3: phrag bcu gnyis so/ / ye shes dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni// gzi brjid dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung // rkang gnyis gtso bo gzi brjid dbang po yi// tshe tshad lo ni stong phrag drug bcu badran// gzi brjid dbang phyug pha rol sangs
61a4: rgyas ni/ blo gros dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung // rkang gnyis gtso bo blo gros dbang phyug gi/ tshe yi tshad ni lo grangs bye bar tshad// blo gros dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni// tshangs pa'i dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung // rkang gnyis gtse ba
61a5: tshangs pa'i dbang phyug gi/ tshe yi tshad ni lo khri bzhi stong gyur// tshangs pa'i dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni// me yi dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung // rkang gnyis gtse bi me yi dbang phyug gi/ tshe tshad lo grangs bdun khri drug stong gyur
61a6: me yi dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni/ / tshangs pa'i zhal zhes bya ba rgyal ba byung // rkang gnyis gtso bo tshangs pa'i zhal de yi// tshe yi tshad ni nyan zhag bdun du gyur// tshangs pa'i zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni// tshogs kyi dbang
61a7: phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung / / rkang gnyis gtse bo tshogs kyi dbang phyug gi/ tshe yi tshad ni lo grangs bye bar tshad// tshogs kyi dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni// dbyangs kyi dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung // rkang gnyis gtso bo dbyangs kyi
61a8: dbang phyug gi/ tshe tshad le grangs bye ba phrag dgur tshad// dbyangs kyi dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni// dbyangs kyi zhal zhes bya ba rgyal ba byung // rkang gnyis gtso bo dbyangs kyi zhal gyi yang // tshe tshad le grangs bye ba phrag bcur tshad//

61b1: dbyangs kyi zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni// zla ba'i zhal zhes bya ba'i rgyal ba byung // rkang gnyis gtso bo zla ba'i zhal gyi ni// tshe yi tshad kyang nyin zhag gcig tu gyur// zla ba'i zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni// nyi ma'i zhal zhes bya ba rgyal/
61b2: bzung / rkang gnyis gtso bo nyi ma'i zhal gyi yang // tshe tshad lo ni steng phrag bcwa brgyad de// nyi ma'i zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni// tshangs pa'i zhal zhes bya ba'i rgyal ba byung // rkang gnyis gtso bo tshangs pa'i zhal gyi yang //
61b3: tshe tshad le ni steng phrag nyi shu'o// tshangs pa'i zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni// tshangs pa'i snyan pa zhes bya rgyal ba byung // rkang gnyis gtso bo tshangs pa'i snyan pa yi// tshe tshad le grangs stong phrag bcwa brgyad gyur// bskal bcig la
61b4: sangs rgyas 'di dag dang / / 'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa nyis brgya byung // zil gyis mnon de bzhin gshegs pa yi// mtshan rnams 'dir yang brjod kyis mnyan par gyis// mtha' yas dbyangs dang rnam par grags pa'i
61b5: dbyangs/ rnam par bsgrags pa'i gzi brjid rnam grags sgra// sgra skad rnam grags sgra dbyangs mchod pa dang // dbyangs kyi yan lag dpa' dang dbyangs dag dang // ye shes stobs dang ye shes bye brag 'gro// zil gyis mnon
61b6: ye shes yang dag 'phags/ / ye shes 'od 'phro ye shes mngon par 'phags// ye shes rnam grogs de bzhin ye shes dpa'// tshangs pa'i stobs dang tshangs nor tshangs pa'i mchog/ tshangs pa'i lhar bcas de bzhin
61b7: tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ / tshangs pa'i dbang phyug tshangs pa'i mi dbang sman// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs yan lag tshangs pas byin// gzi brjid stobs dang gzi ldan gzi brjid mchog/ gzi brjid dbang phyug gzi brjid mngon
61b8: par 'phags/ / gzi brjid khyab dang gzi brjid shin du des// gzi brjid sgo dbyangs shin du rnam grags gzi// 'jigs btsan stobs dang 'jigs btsan blo gros dang // shin du 'jigs bcan 'jigs zhal 'jigs bcan

62a1: 'phags/ 'jigs btsan 'od 'phro 'jigs mchog 'jigs pa'i dbangs// 'jig rten rnam 'dren rgyal ba 'di dag byung // sgra dbyangs zab mo dang ni dpal 'dzin dang // rnam dag sgra yi dbang phyug tshangs pa'i dbyangs/
62a2: mtha' yas dbyangs dang shin du rnam grol dbyangs// bdud kyi stobs dang bdud rnam skrag byed dang // spyan bzangs dang ni zhal gtsang spyan dag dang // rnam par dag pa'i spyan dang mtha' yas spyan// kun nas spyan dang rnam par
62a3: grags pa'i spyan/ / spyan gyis zil gyis gnon dang ma smad spyan// dul mchog dul dang shin du dul ba'i sems// dul rab zhi ba'i dbang po zhi ba'i yid// zhi ba'i bla ma ni dpal rab tu zhi// zhi ba'i pha rol phyin dang zhi bar dpa'/
62a4: bla mar gnas pa zhi ba dul bar sems// shin du dul dang zhi dbang zhi ba'i yid// zhi ba'i bla ma zhi ba'i dpal 'bar ba// zhi ba rab zhi dbang phyug zhi bar dpa'// tshogs dbang tshogs gtso chags kyi dbang phyug dang // tshogs
62a5: rnams zil gnon tshogs bzang ye shes gtsang / / tshogs kyi dbang chen tshogs dbang dpa' bo dang // gzhan yang tshogs bzang rab tu rnam par 'byed// chos kyi rgyal mtshan de bzhin chos kyi tog/ chos kyi bla ma chos
62a6: kyi rang bzhin 'phags/ / chos kyi stobs ldan chos bzang dpa' bo dang // rang bzhin chos kyi bla ma nges pa byung // rang bzhin chos kyi bla ma nges par ni// mtshan gcig pa yang bye phrag brgyad bcu ste// bskal pa gnyis la
62a7: 'dren pa 'di dag byung / / byang chub phyir ni 'di dag ngas mchod de// rang bzhin chos kyi bla ma nges pa yi// rgyal ba'i mtshan rnams gang dag nyan byed cing / thos nas rnam par grags pa'i mtshan 'dzin na// de dag myur du
62a8: ting 'dzin 'di thob 'gyur/ / // 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo// bam po drug pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas mang po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sngon byung ba'i le'u 'di zla 'od gzhon nur

62b1: grur pa la rgya cher rgyas par rab tu bstan to/ / sangs rgyas 'di dag gi yang pha rol na// bskal pa bsam yas dpag tu med pa'i tshe// lha mis mchod pa sangs rgyas gzhan zhig byung // de yi mtshan ni mi dbang dbyangs
62b2: shes bya/ / de bzhin gshegs pa mi dbang dbyangs kyi ni// tshe tshad lo grangs bdun khri drug stong ste// nyan thos dag ni bye ba brgya phrag gsum// de yi 'dus pa dang por gyur pa yin// mngon shes drug ldan gsum rig dbang
62b3: po thul/ / mthu yang che zhing rdzu 'phrul chen po ste// zag pa zad pa tha ma'i lus 'dzin pa// 'od mdzad kyi ni dge 'dun de tshe byung // bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgyad bcu yi// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs byung ste// blo gas
62b4: zab cing grags pa shin du che/ / mthu yang che zhing rdzu 'phrul che bar gyur// mngon par shes pa thob cing spobs par ldan// stong pa thams cad rtogs par khong du chud// zhing ni bye bar de lam lhag par yang // gang gA'i bye ma snyed du 'phrul gyis
62b5: 'gro/ rkang gnyis gtso la dri ba dris nas ni// phyir yang rgyal ba de'i drung du 'od// mdo sde bsgrub pa nges pa'i tshig la mkhas// snang bar gyur pa sa yi steng na rgyu// sems can don phyir smad pa rnam spyod de// bde bar gshegs pa'i sras
62b6: po mthu chen ni/ / 'dod pa'i rkyen gyis sdig pa mi byed de// de dag la ni lha yang smon pa bskyed// srid pa'i 'gro bar mi gnas don mi gnyer// mnyam bzhag bsam gtan gnas pa'i spyod yul cano// rnam par nges pa'i don ldan 'jigs
62b7: med pa/ dri ma med par rtag tu rangs par spyod// tshig kyang rgyun me 'chad cing spobs par ldan// des tshig ston pa'i tshig gi don la mkhas// sangs rgyas sras po kun du yang dag ston// dge ba'i las rnams kyis kyang yongs su
62b8: bzung / bskal pa mtha' yas par ni spyod pas 'phags// 'dren pa dag gis rtag tu bstod cing bsngags// rnam par thar dang don tshig yang dag ston// tshul khrims shin du dag cing nyon mongs med// chu yis pad ma bzhin du mi

63a1: 6/ / chags ste/ khams gsum las ni rnam grol bag yod pa// 'jig rten chos brgyad dag gis mi gos shing // lus kyang rnam dag las kyang yongs su dag/ 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes mthu yang che// chags pa med cing
63a2: sangs rgyas yon tan gnas/ / sems can kun gyi rten dang dpung gnyen te// tshig tsam ma yin nan tan snying por byed// gang la gnas pa de nyid gzhan la ston// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang yongs su bzung // rgyal ba rnam
63a3: kyi mdzod 'dzin thugs brtan pa/ / khams gsum thams cad la yang skrag pa'i yid// rab tu sems zhi rtag tu dgon par spyad// 'jig rten 'dren pa rnams kyis byin brlabs pas// mdo sde bye ba phrag stong 'chad par byed/
63a4: 'chad pa de yang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags// 'jig rten dag gi tshig kun rnam spangs te// stong pa nyid la mos shing don dmo ston// bsngags pa mtha' yas yon tan rgya mtsho zhing // mang du thos shing mkhas pa shes rab
63a5: ldan/ / gzhon nu bskal pa bye ba mang por ni// rgyun chad med par bsngags pa rab brjod kyang // da ni cung zad tsam zhig brjod par 'gyur// rgya mtsho las ni chu thigs gcig po bzhin// de tshe mi yi dbang po'i dbyangs de ni// ting 'dzin
63a6: zhi ba mthong dka' 'di ston te/ / stong gsum chen po'i 'jig rten khams 'di yang // lha dang klu rnams kyis ni gang bar gyur// de yis ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad tshe// sa yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos// lha dang mi rnams
63a7: gang gA'i bye ma snyed/ / sangs rgyas ye shes la ni mi ldog gnas// der yang mi dbang rgyal po byung ba ni// dpal gyi stobs shes bya ba mthu che ba// de la bu yang brgya phrag lnga yod de// byad bzhin bzang zhing mdzes la bltan sdug/ rgyal po de
63a8: yi btsun mo'i 'khor kyang ni/ / bud med bye ba brgya phrag brgyad bcu yod// sa bdag rgyal po de yi bu mo yang // bye ba stong phrag bcu bzhir tshang ba byung // de yang ston zla tha chungs nya ba la// yan lag brgyad ldan gso sbyong bzung nas ni// bye

63b1: ba khrag khrig brgyad bcu lhan cig tu/ / 'jig rten gtso bo'i drung du nye bar 'ongs// rkang gnyis gtso bo'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te// rgyal ba de yi spyan sngar rgyal po 'dug/ rgyal po de yi lhag pa'i bsam mkhyen nas/ ting
63b2: 'dzin 'di ni rkang gnyis dbang pos bshad/ / ting 'dzin 'di ni rgyal po des thos nas// rgyal srid mchil ma bzhin du kun spangs te// gnyen dang rtsa lag sdug pa yongs btang nas// rgyal ba de yi drung du rab tu byung // bu yang brgya phrag lnga dag
63b3: rab byung ste/ / de bzhin btsun mo'i 'khor dang sras mo dang // gnyen bshes rtsa lag mang po gzhan dag kyang // bye ba khrag khrig bdun bcu rtsa drug byung // bu dang chung mar bcas par bzung nas// kha zas bsgrub pa'i sa yang bor nas ni// rgyud ma
63b4: chad par lo brgyad par du bcags/ / 'chag cing 'greng bzhin 'chi ba'i dus kyang byas// rgyal po'i glang po ting 'dzin sems dpa' de// rtag par rab tu mnyam bzhag dus byas pas// de 'ang rgyal po'i pho brang der skyes te// mngal gyi dri mas/
63b5: ma gos brdzus te byung // de yi pha ni brtan pa'i stobs shes bya// blo gros che zhes bya ba mar gyur te// gzhon nu bcas ma thag tu tshig smra ba// 'jig rten mgon po de nyid bzhugs sam gi/ 'jig rten mgon pos bdag gi sems
63b6: mkhyen nas/ de phyir bdag la zhi ba'i ting 'dzin bshad// rkyen rnams med cing rkyen dang bral ba yang // srid pa'i 'gro ba rnams ni gcig tu bstan// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin phyag rgya gang // mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig byung ba dag
63b7: byang chub sems dpa'i nor ni bla med pa/ / ting 'dzin 'di ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// lus kyang gtsang zhing de bzhin dag gtsang ba// sems gtsang de bzhin lta ba gtsang ma dang // dmigs pa rnams las yang dag 'da' ba yi//
63b8: ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// chud mi za ba'i 'bras bu chos bstan pa// lam mchog yan lag brgyad ldan sgom pa ste// de bzhin gshegs dang phrad cing shes rab rno// bden la 'jug dang rtag tu chos shes pa// phung po yongs

64a1: shes khams rnams mnyam pa nyid/ / skye mched rnam pa kun du bsal ba ste// skye ba med pa mngon sum 'jug pa dag/ ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// so so yang dag rig pa bzhi la 'jug/ yi ge thams cad dbye//
64a2: ba'i ye shes dang // dngos por 'jug pa las ni 'da' ba yi// ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// dbyangs rnams yongs su shes shing dga' ba thob// bde gshegs bsngags pa la'ang dgar gyur cing // 'phags pa dag gi/
64a3: tshul 'jam drang po yi// ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// nges pa nam yang khro gnyer mi byed cing // mnyen zhing 'jam pa bzhin yang 'dzum pa ste// sems can mthong nas sngon du smra ba yi// ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas
64a4: bshad mdzad dam/ / le lo med cing bla ma'i ri mo byed// sri zhu che bas phyag 'tshal sdug par lta// skye ba dag gis chog shes dkar ba yi// ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// 'tsho ba dag cing de bzhin dgon gnas dang // sbyangs//
64a5: pa dag la gnas shing dran mi nyams// phung po dang ni khams la mkhas pa yi// ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// skye mched mkhas shing mngon shes ye shes dang // nyon mongs bsal ba dul ba'i sa rnams dang // gsang
64a6: sngags mang po thams cad 'chad pa yi/ / ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// srid pa'i 'gro ba kun las 'da' ba da // skye ba dran zhing chos la nem nur med// chos la sems shing thos pa tshol ba yi// ting 'dzin de ni rgyal
64a7: bas bshad mdzad dam/ / khyad par 'gro zhing rtag tu sgom la 'jug/ ltung ba dag la mkhas shing 'byung bar gnas// de la gnas pas bag la nyal ba sel// ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// gang las ye shes rno ba'i
64a8: mchog 'byung ba/ / mi g.yo ri bo bzhin du mi skul ba// phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan dang gzungs kyi sgo// ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// rtag tu dkar po'i chos rnams yongs tshol zhing // sdig pa'i chos rnams khor mor rnam

64b1: par spong/ rtag tu nyon mongs phyogs rnams rgyu ba med// ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// bslab pa kun la rtogs par khong du chud// mkhas pa ting 'dzin gnas pa rtogs par rig/ sems can dag gi bsam pa shes
64b2: pas bskul/ sangs rgyas byang chub mchog tu chos kyang ston// khyad par shes pa skye ba shes pa dang // mtha' yas shes pa shin du rdzogs par shes// 'gro ba kun du mtshams spor shes pa yi// ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad
64b3: mdzad dam/ khyim gyi gnas spangs rab tu 'byung ba'i sems// khams gsum la yod mi dga' mi 'dzin cing // sems rnams rab tu 'dzin cing dga' byed pa// chos rnams rkang gnyis gtso bo ston mdzad pa// skyob pa chos rnams
64b4: la yang ma chags shing / / rtag tu chos kyi mchog kyang yongs su 'dzin// las kyi rnam par smin la brtan mos pa// chos rnams rkang gnyis gtso bo ston pa mdzad// 'dul ba la yang mkhas shing rnam smin shes// de bzhin 'thab
64b5: cing rtsod pa nye bar zhi/ / 'thab pa med cing rtsod pa med pa'i sa// chos rnams rkang gnyis gtso bo ston pa mdzad// bzod pa yang dag 'dzin cing khro med gnas// chos la rnam par nges shing rtag tu mkhas// tshig rnams rab tu 'byed
64b6: la ye shes mthong / / thugs rje bskyed nas chos rnams ston pa mdzad// sngon gyi mtha' shes phyi ma'i mtha' shes te// bde gshegs bstan la dus gsum mnyam pa nyid// 'khor gsum dag ni yongs su chad par gsungs//
64b7: rgyal ba chos kyi bdag po de skad ston// sems kyang rab tu gnas shing rtse gcig dang // lus kyang rnam par gnas dang 'phags pa'i sa// spyod lam dag kyang rtag tu bsrung ba yi// chos ni skyes bu khyu mchog thub pa ston// khrel
64b8: yid ngo tsha shes shing mdzes pa dang / / 'jig rten shes pa rigs pa'i tshig rnams gsung // chos rnams 'byung ba srog chags rang bzhin dang // byang chub dam pa mchog gi chos kyang ston// rjes su phan gdags pa dang khrel yod

65a1: dang / mi dge ba yi sems la smod pa dang // sbyangs pa rjes su mi gtong bsod snyoms spyod// chos rnams rkang gnyis gtso bo ston pa mdzad// khrel yod do tsha shes pa rtag tu spyod// bla ma la yang gus sma ldang ba dang // thog ma
65a2: nyid nas nga rgyal tshar bcad par/ / chos rnams rgyal ba chos rje de ltar ston// sems ni ldang ba nas kyang sems dge ste// ye shes khong du chud cing rtogs par byed// mi shes phyogs rnams rtag tu rnam par spong // byang chub mchog gi tshe
65a3: rnams ston pa mdzad/ / sems la 'jug pa dang ni sgra shes pa// nges pa'i tshig la 'jug cing don rtogs dang // gnod pa thams cad rtag tu rnam spang bar// rgyal ba chos kyi bdag po de ltar ston// skyes bu dam pa rtag tu yang dag
65a4: bsten/ / skyes bu ngan pa dag ni rnam par spang // rgyal ba la yang rtag tu dad cing dga'// chos mchog rgyal ba de ltar ston pa mdzad// btags pa dang ni brda dang tha snyad dang // 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams ni rtag par spang // rnyed dang ma rnyed pa la
65a5: zhum pa med/ / chos kyi dam pa rgyal bas de ltar bstan// bkur sti rnyed kyang mtshar du mi bzung zhing // bkur ba ste ma byas na yang btang snyoms bzhag/ yang dag bsngags pas nam yang rlom sems med// 'jig rten phan pa'i bstan pa
65a6: 'di 'dra'o/ / gshe zhing smod pa thams cad bzod par bya// khyim pa kun dang lhan cig mi bsten cing // rab tu byung ba dang yang 'grogs mi bya// rgyal ba chos kyi bdag po de skad ston// spyod yul ma yin thams cad rnam spangs nas// sangs
65a7: rgyas spyod yul la ni rab tu gnas/ / spyod pa phun sum tshogs shing dul ba'i sems// chos kyi tshul 'di bde bar gshegs pas bshad// byis pa'i chos rnams rtag tu rnam par spang // rigs sun pa yang thams cad spang bar bya// sangs
65a8: rgyas bstan pa rtag par yongs su bsrung / / chos kyi bdag po rgyal ba de skad ston// smra ba nyung zhing rab tu 'brel la snyan// gzhan dag la yang tshig 'jam dge bar smra// phas kyi rgol ba chos dang ldan pas 'dul// rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa/

65b1: 'di 'dra'o// dus su 'gro ste dus la ma bab min// so so'i skye bo kun la yid mi brtan// sdug bsngal rig kyang yi mug med par bya// rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// dbul po mthong na nor dang ldan par bya// tshul khrims 'tshal
65b2: pa mthang na brtse ba bskyed/ / phan pa'i dngos la rtag tu gdams par bya// rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// chos kyis sems can rnams la phan gdags shing // 'jig rten zang zing rtag du gtang bar bya// bsags par
65b3: bya spung bar mi bya ste/ / rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// tshul khrims bsngags shing tshul khrims 'chal pa smad// g.yo sgyu med cing tshul khrims ldan la sten// nor la mi gnas bdog pa thams cad gtong // rgyal ba'i rjes su
65b4: bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ / lhag pa'i bsam pas bla ma gnyer ba dang // ji skad smras pa de bzhin thams cad bya// chos smra ba yang ma chad bsnyen par bya// rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// ri mor bcas shing rtag tu yid dgar bya// zhi
65b5: ba'i lta bas khor mor gnas par bya/ / sngon spyod rnams la rtag par shin du nges// rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// dge ba'i spyod par rtag tu sngon du 'gro// 'du shes bzlog dang dngos po'i mtshan nyid dang // mtshan
65b6: ma spa ba la yang thabs mkhas pa/ / rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// mdo sde bsgrub pa'i tshig la mkhas pa dang // bden pa bstan pa'i tshig la gdon mi za// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mngon du byed// rgyal ba'i rjes su
65b7: bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/ / mgo gcig tu ni tshig rnams brjod pa bya// ji lta bzhin du mthong zhing rtogs par mkhas// rtag tu tshig la the tshom med par bya// rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// stong pa nyid kyi chos kyang rtag tu
65b8: bstan/ 'jigs pa med cing tshul khrims stobs la gnas// ting 'dzin gnas kyis mnyam par 'jug par bya// rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// shes kyi khe 'dod phyir ni yod mi bstan// sems kyang gya gyu can du mi

66a1: byeste/ lta bar byas pa thams cad rnam par srung // rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// ngas pa mchog dang gzugs kya dam pa ste// ye shes snang ba pha rol mtha' ma med// gsang grags byin dpas rigs par rdzogs pa ni//
66a2: rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// lam 'di sgom pa dag ni tshul gyito/ rtan pa 'di la spyad nas nan tan dang // tshul dang gdams pa rjes su bstan pa bzang // rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa sangs rgyas
66a3: bsngags/ zod la gnas pas nyes pa rnam par spang // ye shes la yang gnas nas mi shes srung // rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'a drag// yo shes rten yin bzhin rnal 'byorangs// byang chub zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor gang phyug ste/
66a4: skyes bu dam pa rtag par snyan pa ni// rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// mi rigs brtson pa khor mor rnam par spang // sangs rgyas sa ni de bzhin gshegs pas bshad// mkhas pa kun gyis rjes su yi rang ba// rgyal ba'i rjes su y-i/
66a5: po 'di 'dog / khyis pa mi shes pas ni spangs pa ste// di ni nyan thos mang po'i sa ma yin// byang chub sems dpa' dag gis rtag tu bzung // rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su 'bang // lha rnams
66a6: kyis kyang mchod cing ri mor byas/ / tshangs pa bye ba phrag stong yi rang ba// ting 'dzin de ni rgyal ba ston mdzad dam// nam mkha' lding dang gnod sbyin mi 'am ci// klu yang stong gis rtag tu phyag byas pa// byang chub dam pa rgyal bas gsungs pa
66a7: gi ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/ / shin du mkhas pas rtag tu yongs thob ste// nor mchog dam pa yang ni legs par rnyeng // zang zing med pa'i ye shes gsob mchog/ ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad da/
66a8: ye shes mdzod yin spobs pa mi zad pa// 'di ni mdo sde bye bar 'jug pa ste// khams gsum yongs shes yang dag shes pa yi// ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// gang la ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad pa// 'di ni param

66b1: 'gro ba'i gzings su bstan/ / di ni chu bo rgyal ba'i grwa yin te// 'di ni snyan grags bsngags phreng 'phel bar byed// gang gis ting 'dzin zhib 'di bshad pa// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bstod pa yin// skyes bu khyu mchog la yang
66b2: bsngags pa ste/ / byang chub sems dpa' mi zad yon tan tshul// gang dag la ni ting 'dzin 'di bshad pa// 'di ni zhe sdang zhi bar byams pa bstan// 'di ni snying rje can gyi btang snyoms so// 'di ni grags pa chen po'i dbugs 'byin pa/
66b3: seng ge'i sgra sgrogs rnams kyi nan tan te// 'di las sangs rgyas ye shes mchog kyang 'byung // chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin phyag rgya ste// ting 'dzin 'di ni 'dren pa dag gis bshad// ting 'dzin zhi ba rgyal bas bshad pa 'di// thams
66b4: cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par byed/ / 'di ni byang chub ra bzhugs spyod pa ste// bdud kyi snga rnams shin tu skrag par byed// rgyal bas ting 'dzin zhi ba'i di bshad pa// skyob pa chos la gnas pa'i rigs sngags 'di// dgra yi nang dus
66b5: bdam pa ste/ / phas kyi rgol ba chos kyis tshar gcod pa// ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di la bstan byas na// 'di ni spobs pa'i sar yang rab tu bstan// stobs dang rnamathar de bzhin dbang po dang // sangs rgyas chos rnams pas brgyad bye brag pa/
66b6: stobs bcu rnams kyang yongs su tshol ba ste// sangs rgyas ye shes kyi yang snga ltas so// skyes mchog 'jig rten phan zhing thugs brtse bas// sangs rgyas chos rnams rab tu bstan pa'ang yin// sangs rgyas dag gi sras kyis 'di
66b7: bzung ste/ 'di ni rnam thar 'dod pa'i lam bstan// ting 'dzin zhi ba mthong dka' 'di thos nos// de la zed gshegs sras po dga' bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa
66b8: tshol ba 'di/ / rnam dag sems gcad nyon mongs med pa yis// ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di la bsten par gyis// rgyal ba bzhin du de yi lus ngag ste// rnam par thar dang ye shes rnam grol mthong // 'dod chags 'ching bas rtag tu nyon mi

67a1: mongs/ / ting 'dzin bzang po 'di la brten par gyis// zhe sdangs min gti mug bral ba ste// bde ba 'dod pa'i ye shes 'byung ba yin// rig pa skye zhing ma rig 'jig pa ste// ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di la bstan par gyis// rnam grol snying
67a2: por byed pa ngoms par bshad/ / bsam gtan pa la ting 'dzin zhi 'di bstan// sangs rgyas ma smad pa'i spyan yin te// ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di la bsnyen par gyis// 'di ni zhing mdo ston pa'i mngon par shes// sangs rgyas mtha' yas
67a3: ston pa'i rdzu 'phrul te/ / ting 'dzin 'di nyid sgom par byed pa la// gzungs de rnams kyang rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur// byang chub phyir ni dbang po zhi ba'i gnas// 'di ni byin rlabs mtha' yas ston pa ste// ting 'dzin 'di ni bsnyen
67a4: par byed pa yi/ / ye shes phra zhing yangs pa rnam par dag/ gang gis ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di ma thos// mi rigs brtson pas 'di ni rtogs mi 'gyur// yi ge thams cad rnam par bzlog pa ste// dbyangs kyis rnam par go bar nus
67a5: ma yin/ / byang chub sems dpa' rig pas 'di shes te// chos kyi bdag pos ji ltar gang bshad pa// ting 'dzin 'di la sten par byed pa yi// zhi ba dag dang smad pa med pas rtogs// brtson 'grus brtsams pas rab tu 'di bzung
67a6: ste/ / bsnyen bkur byas shing rtag tu legs par bcangs// ting 'dzin 'di la bsnyen par byed pa ni// sdug bsngal zad cing skye ba 'gog pa shes// chos rnams kun gyi skye ba med pa bstan// de ltar srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad na// sangs
67a7: rgyas grags chen dag gi ye shes mchog/ ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// gzhon nu de yis tshigs bcad 'di thos nas// khrag khrig stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa brgyad rnams// dbyangs kyi rjes 'gro bzod pa der thob ste/
67a8: sangs rgyas ye shes pas ni mi ldog gnas// brtan pa'i stobs kyis gzhon nu de la smras// da dung 'jig rten mgon po de bzhugs so// khye'u khyod la don 'di dri bar bya// ting 'dzin 'di ni khyod kyis su las thos// gzhon nus smras pa

67b1: rgyal po gsan du gsol/ / bdag gis bskal pa gcig la sangs rgyas ni// bye ba khrag khrig mthong ste ri mor bgyis// ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di yang bdag gis dris// gzhan yang bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang // bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
67b2: phrag stong du/ / de dang der bdag skye ba dran par gyur// nam yang ma ngal du skyes par ma gyur te// de nas bdag gis ting 'dzin 'di bsgoms te// rgyal ba de dag 'chad pa dag par thos// thos nas bshad pa la yang mos bskyed de//
