134a1: bdag la skabs phye'o/ / bde bar gshegs pa bdag la skabs phye'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba dang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar stan la 'dug nas bco
134a2: ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das gang gi rgyu gang gi rkyen gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' yas pa spyod pa dag lag pa bcad pa
134a3: pa dang / rkang pa bcad pa dang rna ba bcad pa dang sna bcad pa dang / mig dbyung ba dang mgo bcad pa dang lus bcad pa dang yan lag bcad par gyur/ sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang myong bar gyur cing /
134a4: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
134a5: 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / kun dga' bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di yang dag par sgrub pa na/ ngas sdug bsngal ji snyed myong bar gyur pa khyod kyis shes shing de dag dran na ci'i phyir
134a6: de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems/ kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na 'di la skyes bu la la zhig rkang pa nas spyi bo'i bar du 'bar bar gyur te/ rab tu 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur pa de la skyes bu
134a7: la la zheg der nye bar 'ongs te/ 'di skad du kye skyes bu chur shag/ lus la me 'bar ba ma zhi bar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang phrad cing ldan par rtsas shig/ dga' bar gyis shig yongs su spyod cig ces za na/ kun dga'
134a8: bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de lus la me 'bar ba ma zhi bar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang phrad cing ldan par gyur te rtse ba dang dga' ba dang yongs su spyod par byed dam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lasra/

134b1: so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ skyes bu de lus la me 'bar ba ma zhi bar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang phrad cing ldan par gyur te rtse ba dang dga' ba dang /
134b2: yongs su spyod pa byed du zin kyang de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na sems can rnams ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal bar gyur cing dbul ba dag mthong nas yid bde ba 'am
134b3: sems dga' ba ma byung ngo / / kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sngon spyad pa spyod pa na tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang tshul khrims ma zhig pa dang tshul khrims 'dren ma ma yin pa dang /
134b4: tshul khrims sra srer ma gyur pa dang / tshul khrims ma 'phags pa dang tshul khrims ma g.yos pa dang tshul khrims ma glongs pa dang / tshul khrims ma 'khrugs pa dang tshul khrims mi yang ba dang tshul khrims gzhan
134b5: la ston pa ma yin pa dang tshul khrims mi slu ba dang tshul khrims drang ba dang tshul khrims dam bcas pa bzhin du byed pa dang / tshul khrims sems can rnams la phan 'degs pa yin te// de lta bu'i tshul khrims dang ldan
134b6: par 'gyur ro/ / kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyad pa mtha' yas pa spyod pa de dag ni lag pa bcad pas yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur// rkang pa bcad pas yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur
134b7: rna ba bcad pa dang sna bcad pas yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur/ mig phyung ba dang mgo bcad pas yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba lus dang yan lag bcad pas yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te/ sdug bsngal sna
134b8: tshogs kyang mi myong la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / // 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/ bam po bcu gnyis pa/ kun dga'

135a1: rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ kun dga' bo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang ces grangs med pa/ tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gzhal du med pa/
135a2: mtshungs pa med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'jal
135a3: ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i pad ma'i zla ba rnam par dag pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // yang de'i tshe de'i
135a4: g an po che'i pad ma'i zla ba rnam par dag par mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgung
135a5: gyur to/ / nyi ma thams cad la nyin re zhing yang sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dgu sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod do// rab tu bkod cing yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas
135a6: sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams zag pazad pa dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod do/ / rab tu bkod cing yongs su mya ngan las 'das na sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag zan med pa yang dag par rdzog
135a7: pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod de yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur to/ / kun dga' bo de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i pad ma'i zla ba rnam par dag pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po de
135a8: b zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus kyi tshe dam pa'i chos rab tu 'jig

135b1: par 'gyur ba na/ kun dga' bo rgyal po dpa' bas byin zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ rgyal po dpa' bas byin de la btsun mo'i 'khor ni bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do// bu ni stong yod do// bu mo ni lnga brgya yong
135b2: do/ / de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dpa' bas byin gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ran chen ldan zhes bya ba yangs shing rgya chel sgo bzhi yod pa// sngags bu dang sgo gang dang rtababs dang skar khud dang bu thung dang
135b3: ba dang khang brtsegs pa dang / bskyed mos tshal gyis brgyan cing rnam par bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ lha'i gnas bzhin snang ba/ sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa'i gnas su gyur pa zhig yod do// kun
135b4: dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na mdo sde 'di lta bu dag ni skye bo mang pos smad cing skye bo mang pos spangs te/ skye bo mang po dang mi 'phrod cing skye bo mang pos bor bar gyur te/ 'jigs pa chen po mi bzad pa'i dus su
135b5: gyur pa/ gtse ba mang zhing char ches pa'i dus kyi tshe char mi 'bab pa'i dus kyi tshe/ dus ma yin par char 'bab pa'i dus kyi tshe/ sbrul 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe/ lce 'bab pa'i dus kyi tshe/ mu ge 'byung ba'i dus
135b6: kye tshe/ log par lta ba'i dus kyi tshe/ yang dag pa ma yin par lta ba'i dus kyi tshe/ mu stegs can gyi gsang sngags yongs su tshol ba'i dus kyi tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rab tu 'jig par 'gyur ba'i dus kyi tshe/
135b7: chub sems dpa' bdun stong grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'bor dang ljongs nas bskrad nas de dag chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes dang lhan cig kun du bzang po zhes bya ba'i nags khrod
135b8: der rten cing gnas te dge slong de dag la gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston to/ / kun dga' bo nags khrod de yang dus thams cad du snang ba'i me tog sna tshogs dang / snye ma dang 'bri shing dang 'bras bu dag dang ldan pa/ dpag bsam

136a1: gri shing dang 'dra ba/ shing sna tshogs kyis gang zhing sa'i gzhi yang gzugs dang kha dog du ma dang sa bon dang myu gu thams cad kyis brgyan pa// brag dang rdo ba sna tshogs mdzes shing dri ma med pa/ yangs shing
136a2: mtho ba dang gser gyi ri dag gi mdzes par byas shing sdug pa/ grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang dang dri za'am skyes bu 'am drang srong dang mi 'am ci dag gnas pa/ bya gzugs dang kha dog che zhing rnam pa sna tshogs mang po
136a3: gnas pa/ / sangs rgyas du ma bzhugs bzhugs pa/ dga' tshal dang 'dra ba kun du bzang zhing rnal 'byor dang 'thun pa'i nags tshal dam pa kun du bzang po de ni byang chub sems dpa' de dag rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson
136a4: zhing gnas par gyur to/ / yang kun dga' bo chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes de gcig pu dben par song nas/ nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs te/ lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas bltas na/ byang chub sems
136a5: dpa' khrag khrig mang po dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dir skyes te/ de dag gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grang 'di mnyan pa rnyed na ni bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir/
136a6: mi ldog par 'gyur// gal te gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa ma rnyed na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog pa dag mthong ngo // de nas chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes dran zhing shes bzhin du
136a7: ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po ga la yod pa der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de la 'di skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu dag kho bo ni 'gro'o// grong dang grong khyer dang
136a8: grong 'dab dang ljongs dang yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du song la sems can rnams la chos bstan par bya'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de dag gis chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes la 'di skad ces

136b1: smras so/ / khyod nags thong 'didas grong dang grong khyer dang grod mad ba dang ljongs dang yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'gro ba ni kho bo cag 'dod pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge
136b2: bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma lhag pa'i nga rgyal can mang po dam pa'i chos spong ba dag byung ba'i dus la bab kyis/ de dag tshe dang ldan pa'i srog gcod par gyur nam legs so// tshe dang ldan pa ni shin du mdzes shing byang
136b3: bzhin bzang ba blta na sdug ste/ dang po'i lang tsho dang ldan zhing / na tshod dar la bab ste/ mdog ni gser bcom bzang po 'dra// dpral ba ni drang dang zla ba dang me tog kun da'i kha dog lta bu'i mdzod spus brgyan// sgra dang
136b4: gtsug tor ni mthon thing la ltung bar 'khyil ba yin pas rgyal po'im rgyal ba'i blon po'am/ / de dang 'dra ba gzhan dag kyang phrag dog dang 'jungs pas non pa'i sems kyis khyod kyi srog gcad na ma legs so// de nas chos smra ba
136b5: m e tog zla mdzes kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de la 'di skad du gal te kho bos bdag nyid bsrung ba byas na kho bos 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa
136b6: bsrung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes zer nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bdag tu 'du shes 'di la gnas nas su// bstan pa 'di la srung bar yod mi nus// mi bzad phyi dus bde bar gshegs pa yi// byang
136b7: chub bstan pa bkod pa chen po yin/ / gang gis bdag tu 'du shes kun spangs shing // sems can 'di dang gang zag smra gnas dang // gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro rnams dang // reg bya spong ba de ni bstan pa
136b8: bsrung / / bskal pa bye ba gang gA'i bye snyed du// dad pa'i sems kyis zas dang skom rnams dang // gdugs dang ba dan mar me'i phreng ba'i yis// sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig rim gro byas// gang gis dam chos

137a1: rab tu 'jig pa dang / / bde gshegs bstan pa 'gag par 'gyur ba'i tshe// nyin mtshan du ni bslab pa gcig spyod pa// bsod nams 'di ni de bas bye brag 'phags// skyes bu khyu mchog gi ni dam pa'i
137a2: chos/ / 'jig par 'gyur tshe gang dag btang snyoms sgom// de yis rgyal ba bkur sti byas ma yin// 'dren pa dag la ri mor des ma byas// khyed bde rang gi don gyi sa la// bdag nyid rab tu bsrung bar gyis// khyed
137a3: ni rtag tu byams gnas shing / / 'dul ba 'di la bag yod gyis// ma 'dres dag gtsang dri med pa// tshul khrims dang por bsrung bar gyis// gang gis tshul khrims dri ma med// sangs rgyas bsngags pa
137a4: bsrungs pa ni/ / de yis ji snyed sngon byung ba// bde gshegs thams cad ri mor byas// de yis thams cad bskyabs pa yin// skye bo'i tshogs rnams byang chub bkod// sngon gyi sangs rgyas dag gis
137a5: bstod pa yi/ / tshul khrims dri ma med pa sus bsrungs pa// de dag gis ni sems can mang po yang // sems can dmyal ba dang ni sdig las drangs// chos mchog rin chen sbyin pa sbyin par gyis/ bzod
137a6: ba dag kyang rtag tu bsru gyis la/ / dgon par gnas shing ting 'dzin mkhas pa dang // 'jam zhing mnyen pa dag kyang bsgom par gyis// rnam pa kun du rtsod pa ma byed par// spyad pa zhi mchog 'di la rnam par spyod//
137a7: bdag ni sems can rnams kyang bskyabs pa'i phyir// grong dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'gro bar bya// blo gros che 'char sems can dam pa'i mchog/ drang srong de ni 'gro bar byas pa dang // kha cig rkang pa la yang 'ju bar byed// snying
137a8: rje bar yang ngu zhing mche ma zag/ mkhas pa blo gros chen po ma bzhud par// sgra 'jam yid du 'ong zhing mdzes pa yi// shing 'di rnams la gzigs shing rtog pa mdzod// bdag nyid bsrung ba mdzod lam bzhud cig/ sngon gyi

137b1: stobs bcu 'dren pa de dag kyang / / dbang bzhi zhing shin du nges pa rnams// nags tshal brag dang ri yi rtser gshegs nas// byang chub dam pa dag ni thugs su chud// byang chub rgyur yang spyod pa dam pa spyad// de dag bsad
137b2: nams ye shes mchog dang ldan/ / de dag rjes slobs nags khrod gnas par mdzod// brtul zhugs bzang po 'di nas ma bzhud cig/ lus ni shin du mdzes pa'i mtshan gyis brgyan// khyod kyi sgra yang mthon 'theng
137b3: dog ste/ gser gyi kha dog dang 'dra 'od byed pa/ sa 'di kun kyang rab tu snang bar gyur// khyod kyi mdzod spu bzhin gyi smin mtshams na// shin du mdzes pa dud dang 'dra ba'i 'od// rgyal po dag kyang de bzhin sred kyi phyir// phrag dog
137b4: bskyed na khyod kyi lus bshig 'gyur/ / de nas chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de la tshigs su bcad pas smras pa// ji snyed sngon gyi bde gshegs byung ba ni// thams cad mkhyen//
137b5: cing zag pa zad pa rnams// de dag thams cad 'jig rten don mdzad de// srid pa gsum du byang chub dam pa rtogs// spyad pa'i dam pa byang chub rgyu spyad de// de dag bsod nams ye shes mchog dang ldan// de yi rjes bslab
137b6: byang chub sems dpa' yang / / sems can khrag khrig rnams kyi skyabs byed 'dod// drang srong mkhas la kun gyis bskor byas te// rkang pa la yang phyag 'tshal shugs byung nas// mi bzad snying rje bar ni sgra 'byin cing //
137b7: nyam thag mi bde tshe des 'bebs par byed// kha cig rab tu 'gyel cing brgyal nas su// sa la lhung bstsal ba bcad 'gyel bzhin// 'on kyang drang srong sems can don 'dod pa// bsod nams bsags pas de la phyir ma log/
137b8: drang srong chos gos lhung bzed thogs nas chas// ji ltar seng ge ral pa can dag bzhin// de ni chos kyi rang bzhin gnas pas na// de la yon tan nyes par bya ba med// 'jig rten 'dir ni nags khrod bdag gnas pas/ sems

138a1: can ngan sor song na ma legs shes/ / de ni sems can bsgrub pa'i don gyi phyir// grong byer pho brang mchog tu song par gyur// de nas chos smrab me tog zla mdzes grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang ljongs
138a2: dang yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs nas sems can rnams la chos bstan te/ de'i snga dro der 'ongs nas srog chags khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgra blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
138a3: phyir mi ldog pa la bkod do/ / da dung rgyal po'i pho brang der ma phyin pas de mthar gyis rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan pa der phyin pa dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan pa der nye bar song ste/ shing blab
138a4: sha dang sa la'i drung du 'dug go/ de de'i nub mo 'das pa dang / rgyal po'i pho brangad 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs par gyur te/ zhugs nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag sum bcu rtsa drug sangs rgyas kyi chos las
138a5: phyir mi ldog par bkod kyang da dud zas kyi bya ba ma byas so/ / de zas gcad pa bcad nas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song ste
138a6: 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so/ / de de'i nub mo 'das nas de snga dro gnyis pa la rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs nas srog chags bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa gsum sangs rgyas kyi
138a7: chos las phyir mi ldog par bkod de da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so/ / de zas gnyis pa bcad pa bcad nas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste// bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na
138a8: yod pa der song ste/ 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so// de de'i nub mo 'das nas de snga dro gsum pa la rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs nas srog chags bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa

138b1: dgu sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog par bkod de da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so/ / de zas gsum pa gcad pa bcad nas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das
138b2: kye sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song nas 'grang bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so/ / de de'i nub mo 'das nas de snga dro bzhi pa la rgyal po'i pho brang lo 'di chen ldan du zhugs nas srog chags bye
138b3: ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bkod de da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so/ / de zas bzhi pa gcad pa bcad nas rgyal po'i bro brang
138b4: 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gdan yod pa der song nas 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so// de de'i nub mo 'das nas de snga dro lnga pa la btsun ma'i
138b5: 'khor gyi nang du song nas bud med brgyad bri bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bkod do/ / grong khyer de nas kyang sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag bla na
138b6: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bkod de da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so/ / de nyi ma lnga zas gcad pa bcad nas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das
138b7: kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song nas 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so/ / de de'i nub mo 'das nas de snga dro drug pa la rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs nas rgyal po'i bu
138b8: stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bkod de da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so/ / de nyi ma drug zas gcad pa bcad nas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/

139a1: bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song nas 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so// de de'i nub mo 'das nas de snga dro bdun pa la rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du
139a2: zhugs pa dang rgyal po dpa' bas byin bskyed mos tshal du 'gro ba mthong ste/ gser gyi shing rta la dos ni dngul mda' ni sbrul gyi snying po'i tsan dan/ 'khor lo ni bai dUr+ya/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgrer ba dang
139a3: rin po che'i shing rta sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ shing rta'i mda' la dar gyis bkris shing ras bcos bu phrugs kyis g.yogs pa de bu mo gzhon nu brgyad brgyas rin po che'i tha gus btags shing 'dren te/ de dag byang
139a4: bzhin bzang zhing mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa/ byis pa rnams dga' bar byed cing tshim par byed pa ste/ mkhas pa rnams la ni ma yin no// rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta
139a5: bu brgyad khri bzhi stong yang zham ring mthon dman du 'gro'o/ / bram ze shing sa la chen po lta bu brgyad khri ba ni stong yang zham ring mthon dman du 'gro'o// khyim bdag shing sA la chen po lta bu brgyad khri bzhi stor yang zham
139a6: ring mthon dman du 'gro'o/ / rgyal po'i bu mo lnga brgya yang rin po che'i khyogs kyi nang du zhugs nas mdun thog thag tu 'gro ste/ de dag gis dge slong de mthong ma thag tu bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
139a7: las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ / btsun mo'i 'khor brgya stong phrag drug bcu rtsa brgyad kyang dge slong de mthong ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// skye bo'i tshogs chen
139a8: po de dag kyang nor bu dang gdu bu rnams bkrol te lham rnams bzhag nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ dge slong de ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag

139b1: 'tshal zhing 'khod do/ / de nas bu mo gzhon nu de dag kyang sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsab dag gis bskul bas khyogs de dag las babs nas nor bu dang gdu bu dag bkrol te lham rnams bzhag nas bla gos phrag pa gcig
139b2: tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas dge slong de ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ / dge slong 'di na byon pa'i tshe// nyi ma lta bur thams cad du// 'di
139b3: dag rab tu snang bar bgyis/ / skye do'i tshogs kyang 'dun par gyur// 'dod chags zhe sdang rgyun bcad cing // gti mug dag kyang bsal bar gyur// de tshe zhe sdang khro ba dang // phrag dog thams cad bcad par gyur// rgyal po
139b4: dpa' bas byin pa yi/ / zham ring sras la sogs pa yang // su yang rgyal po mi lta ste// su yang zham ring mi bgyid do// ji ltar zla ba nya pa ni// skar ma dag gis bskor ba bzhin// rgyal po'i bu yis mdun bdar bas
139b5: dge slong 'di yang mdzes par gyur/ / ji ltar gser gzugs ri mo dag/ mkhas pas ri mor bris pa dang // sA la'i rgyal po rgyas pa ltar// de bzhin dge slong mdzes par gyur// mthu chen brgya byin lha yi dbang po ni//
139b6: grong khrir 'jig pa bdag po mig stong ldan// ri rab spyil sum bcu rtsa gsum dbang // de bzhin dge slong byon pa de yang mdzes// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten tshangs pa gnas pa 'dra// rab 'phral lha yi bu ni lha dbang bzhin
139b7: 'dod khams 'thab bral mchog gi lha bzhin du/ / dge slong byon pa 'di yang de bzhin mdzes// nyi ma bzhin du bar snang ldan ner bgyis// 'od zer stong ldan mun nag rab tu sel// phyogs rnams kun du snang bar bgyid pa ltar/
139b8: de bzhin dge slong byon pa mdzes par gyur// bskal pa mtha' yas rgya cher sbyin pa byin// tshul khrims ma 'dres rtag tu bsrung ba bgyis// bzod pa mtshungs med 'jig rten kun du bsgoms// de ni mtshan gyis brgyan

140a1: cir 'di gar mdzes/ / 'phags pa'i skye bos rab bstod brtson 'grus bskyed// bsam gtan bzhi yang zhum med sems kyis bsnyen// nyon mongs dra ba bsal cing shes rab bskyed// dbyar dag slong
140a2: 'jig rten kur du gda'/ / sangs rgyas bstan pa mtshungs med sems can snying po ste/ dpa' bo 'das pas chos mchog dag kyang rab tu shad // ma 'ongs su de bzhin ltar byung ba yi/ chos kyi rgyal po dbang
140a3: brnyes rnams kyi sras de lags/ / dge slong khyod ni mi rtag nam yang ma gyur cig/ gzugs ni 'di ltar 'jig rten kun na rab tu lhan// gzi brjid che zhing dbyangs sgra shin du snyan par gda'// rgyal po'i
140a4: gzi brjid shin du lham me snang mi bgyid/ / chos 'di ji ltar khyod bdag nyid kyis rab rtogs shing // sangs rgyas dag gis bka' stsal 'jig rten kun du rgyu// de bzhin bdag cag bud med dengs
140a5: po kun spangs te/ / bdag cag thams cad dge slong 'di bzhin 'gyur bar bgyi// de dag thams cad sor bcu thal mo sbyar byas nas// tshigs bcad 'di dag smras tegs rnams 'thor bar byed// gser kye
140a6: phreng ba dang ni rin chen do shal dang / / rna ba'i rgyan dang mgul gyi rgyan dag rnam mang 'thor// ji ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dag/ stobs ldan sa 'di kun la rnams par lta// sras su 'du shes dag ni nye bar 'jog
140a7: gling rnams bzhi po 'di dag kun du 'gro/ / rgyal rigs dang ni tshong dpon bram ze dang // khyim bdag mkhar gyi rgyal po dag gi mi// de dag gcig la lhag par sdug pa med// thams cad la yang byams pa mnyam par
140a8: bskyed/ / de bzhin dge slong nges pa 'di yang ni// gzungs dang dbang rnams la ni shin du bslabs// byang chub yan lag stobs dang dbang po dang // yan lag brgyad ldan lam yang rnam par 'byed// mtshan mo zla ba skar tshogs

140b1: dbus na yang / / ji ltar rab tu mdzes par snang ba bzhin// ji ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba'i tshe// gzi brjid ldan zhing rnam par snang bgyid bzhin// dbang po zhi zhing stobs bcu ldan pa yi// sangs rgyas nges pa kun la
140b2: phyag 'tshal lo/ / de dag gis ni bsngags pa bskal pa brgyas// zad par byed nus skyes bu su yang med// bskal pa bye ba stong phrag med por ni// yon tan brjod kyang zad pa yod med de// 'jig rten rab mchog gi ni spu
140b3: gcig kyang / bsngags pa dag ni zad par mi 'gyur ro// des ni mtshungs med 'khor lo rab tu bskor// ye shes dag gi gnas kyang shin du bstan// zhib cing rdul bral chos rnams bshad pa mdzad// de ni gang na'ang snang bar
140b4: 'gyur ba med/ / dge sbyong dang ni bram ze lha dang klu// lha min bdud dang tshangs par bcas la sogs// sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan gyis// rgya mtsho dag ni zad par yod mi nus// gang gis thugs sras 'di 'dra
140b5: mnga' ba yi/ / sman rgyal mtshungs med rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// tshigs bcad 'di dag smras nas de yi tshe// rgyal po'i bu mo gzhon nu thams cad dga'// gser dang gser phye dag kyang 'thor bar byed// gos rnams kyang ni
140b6: rab tu 'ding par byed/ / gtsug gi nor bu dol shal mdzes pa dag/ rin thang bye ba phrag ni brgya ri bas// dge slong de la mngon par g.yogs nas ni// dga' nas byang chub phyir yang rab tu zhugs// de nas rgyal po dpa' bas
140b7: byin 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma btsun mo'i 'khor 'di dag ni log par zhugs te skye bo'i tshogs kyang log go snya mo// skye bo de dag kyang nor bu dang gdu bu bkrol lham bzhag nas gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te// pus mo
140b8: g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas dge slong de ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo/ / dge slong de byad gzugs bzang ba tsam du rgyal po dpa' bas byin byad bzhin mi bzang / de tsam du blta na sdug

141a1: ba ma yin/ de tsam du mdzes pa ma yin te/ de rgyal po'i srad kyi phyir shin du spangs par gyur to// dge slong de'i gzugs kyi lus yongs su rdzogs pa mthong nas shin du khros so// dge slong de rgyal po'i
141a2: lam na 'dug pa'i mig tu rdul song ba dang de 'di snyam du sems te/ dge slong 'dis chags pa'i sems kyis nga'i btsun mo'i 'khor la bltas te/ 'dis mig gis kyang brda byas so// de 'di snyam du
141a3: sems te/ de dge slong 'di la srog gcod par byed pa su yod snyam mo// de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin gyi zham ring du bu stong 'brang ba de dag bos nas gzhon nu dag dge slong 'di srog dang grol cig ces
141a4: byas nas/ gzhon nu de dag rgyal po dpa' bas byin la slar zlog go/ dge slong de'i phyir de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu dag kyang bka' mi nyan te// bdag gcig pu gnyis su med par bzhag na dge slong
141a5: 'di srog dang bral bar byed pa su yod snyam mo/ / de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin la gsod pa'i gshed ma dga' byed ces bya bar dum po bcom pa med pa ma rungs pa zhig yod pa de rgyal po lam na rgyal
141a6: po dpa' bas byin dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na 'dug go/ / rgyal po dpa' bas byin gyis de mthong nas dga' mgu yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' ba dang mos pa dang yid bde ba skyes nas de sems 'di snyam du
141a7: sems te/ dga' byed 'dis dge slong 'di srog dang dbral bar byed snyam mo// de nas gsod pa'i gshed ma dga' byed rgyal po dpa' bas byin gang na 'dug pa der 'ongs pa dang dga' byed la 'di skad ces sbas
141a8: so/ / khyod bya dga' cher sbyin na dga' byed khyod dge slong 'di srog dang bral bar byed nus sam/ dga' byed kyis smras pa/ lha shin du rdo thog go/ bka' bzhin 'tshal/ de dge slong 'di srog dang dbral bar 'tshal/

141b1: lo/ rgyal pos spras pa/ dga' byed de'i phyir de'i dus la bab par shes na mtshan non po thogs la dge slong 'di'i lag pa dang rkang batshad cig/ na ba dang / thA yang chod cig/ 'dis chags pa'i sems
141b2: kyis de'i btsun mo'i 'khor la bltas kyis de'i phyir 'di'i mig kyang skam pas phyung shig ces byas so/ / de nas gsod pa'i gshed ma dga' byed kyis de'i tshe ral gri rnon po thogs nas dge slong de'i lag pa dang
141b3: rkang pa bcad do/ / rna ba dang sna yang bcad do// mig gnyis kyang phyung ngo // de nas dge slong de'i mgo dang rna ba dang rkang lag bcad pa las 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma yang b+ha / 'o ma'i rgyun du ma yang byung
141b4: ste/ phyogs bcur bskor nas slar yang dge slong de'i lus kyi nang du nub po// bcad cing gtubs pa'i 'phro nas dpal be'u dang bkra shis dang 'khor lo la sogs pa nang nas byung ste/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum
141b5: bcu rtsa gnyis kun du snang ngo / / de nas rgyal po de skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang dong nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po des dge slong de la ma na bcad gtubs shing 'dug pa mthong nas/ de dag sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste// ngo man
141b6: du gyur nas ngu zhing cho des btab ste smre sngags bton nas phyir yang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan par song ngo / / de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin zhag bdun 'das pa dang bskyed mos tshal mchog na 'dug pa mi dga'
141b7: mi rtse yongs su mi spyod do/ / bskyed mos tshal nas de log nas zhag bdun 'das pa dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs pa dang des dge slong de rgyal po'i lam du bor ba shi nas zhag bdun lon yang
141b8: lus kyi mdog ma gyur pa mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ dge slong 'di'i lus kyi mdog ma gyur pa las bltas na dge slong 'di ni gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin//

142a1: te/ bdag gis sems can dmyal ba chen por skye bar 'gyur ba'i sdug pa'i las byas kyis bdag ni myur du sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro nas de de ltar sems pa na/ steng ga bar snang las lha'i dra/
142a2: brgyad khris sgra skad dbyangs gcig tu smras pa/ rgyal po chen po 'di ni de bzhin te// khyod ji skad zer ba ltar dge slong 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin no zhes zer ro// bar snang las
142a3: lha dag gi sgra thos nas de shin du 'jigs shing skrag nas pag cha nyid spu zing zhes byed de 'gyod par gyur to/ / de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste 'gyod par gyur pas de'i tshe chongs cher ba banas
142a4: 'di skad zer ro/ / rgyal po'i sred dang rgyal po'i pho brang dang / nor bu rin chen matig gser byug spang // bdag nyid mtshan thogs bdag nyid 'chi bar bya// bdag ni bris pa'i tho can las ngan ldan/ dge slong ma
142a5: tog zla mdzes 'dir byung ba/ / sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go bgos te// snang bar byed cing rgyal po'i pho brang 'ongs// zla ba nya tshe skar ma'i rgyal po bzhin// 'dod pa'i longs spyod ngan pas bdag dkrugs te// rab tu dga' ba
142a6: bud me tshogs rnams dang / / shing rta'i nang du zhugs nyi de nas dang // rgyal rigs rnams kyis yongs su 'khor bar bskor// dge slong dri mchog mig bca gad ni// dir byo dge slong de'ang mthogs sa// ma
142a7: tshogs rnams rab tu dgar gyur cing / / mos pa skyes nas gsar kyi phreng ba kor// thams cad sor brgya'i thal mo sbyar byas nas// tshigs bcad dbyangs kyis dge slong de la brjod// rgyal po yin dus
142a8: dbyangs sgra rnams/ / de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur// de yang shing rta'i nang du zhugs nas ni// rgyal rigs rnams kyis yongs su bskor bar gyur// bde bar gshegs pa'i sras mchog mthu che ba// ga /

142b1: dri mchog mig bzang 'dir byod na// bdag gi sems ni rab tu ngan gyur te// dge slong rgyal po'i pho brang 'jug pa'i tshe// bud med tshogs chen dga' bar lha mthong nas// rmongs pas de la phrag dog khro ba bskyed// phyogs pa'i
142b2: kun du snang bar bgyis pa ni/ / zla ba sgra gcan zin thar mdzes pa bzhin// dge slong rgyal po'i pho brang 'jug mthong nas// bud med tshogs rnams dga' zhing sgra yang 'byin// bdag gis der ni gtum pa'i tshig smras
142b3: te/ / bu stong dag la de nyid khyod song la// dge slong 'di ni dum bu dum bur gyis// 'di ni nga yi dgra mchog ma rungs pa// gzhon nu thams cad mnyen zheng tshul ldan te// bdag la pan sems dge slong de la 'dud/
142b4: rgyal po 'di 'dra'i bka' bzhin bgyir mi rung // de tshe bdag ni mya ngan non par gyur// dge slong shin du tshul khrims mchog ldan pa// byams ldan pa bzhin zhugs pa mthong nas ni// shin du gtum pa'i sems kyis
142b5: gsong du btang / / byi ngas bdag ni lhung nas mnar med sreg/ dga' byed de ni rgyal po'i lam 'dir gnas// ma rungs las bgyid mi la sdug bsngal skyed// bdag gis bka' bzhin de 'drar des bgyis te// me tog
142b6: phreng ba rgyus 'dra ba'i dge slong gtubs/ / nags mchog kun du bzang po dga' ba na// bya yis gang zhig me tog dri zhim rgyas// de na dge slong tshogs gzhan rab mang ba// bu gcig pa ni ma dang bral ba bzhin// dge slong
142b7: bzhengs la nags su gnas par mdzod/ / me yi don kyang shin du rgya cher bgyis// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 'dir byon pa'i tshe// dge slong shin du snying rjer ngu zhing tshol// lag pa g.yas pas me tog rgyal mtshan thogs/
142b8: g.yon pa yis kyang blta stug mdzes pa gzhan// lam yang sbyangs shing gos kyis khebs par g.yogs// dge slong bzhengs la chos mchog bshad pa mdzod// rgyal po'i khab 'dir khyod zhugs ring lon kyang // dge slong

143a1: rab tu snying rjer ngu zhing tshol/ / rgyal ba mchog gi bstan pa 'jig pa'i tshe// khyod kyi srog gi bar chad 'gyur du dogs// ji ltar skyes bu mthu chen la la dag/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rtag tu sgra
143a2: grags pa/ / srid gsum 'di kun thams cad zil mnan nas// g.yang sa chen por mchongs te sar lhung ltar// de bzhin dge slong mtshan mchog rab brgyan pa// byed bzhin bzang pos 'dir 'gyel bar
143a3: gyur/ me tog zla mdzes zhe sdang gtum med pa// bdag gis sdig pa'i sems kyis dum bur blags// me tog zla mdzes bkrongs nas sar lhung ba// chos smra 'di ni mthed nas myung bar yang // dge slong
143a4: thams cad sdug bsngal gzir gyur te/ / mi dga' skyes 'gyur de bzhin sems mi bde// me tog zla mdzes ri yi rgyal po ltar// sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go bgos te// phreng ba brgyus pa bud med
143a5: thogs pa 'dra/ / 'dir ni dum bu dum bur rnam par bcad// bdag gis dngos sdig shin du mi bzad bgyis// mgon med mnar med gshin rje'i yul du 'chi// 'dir yang dge slong dum bur blags pa
143a6: yis/ bdag mi sangs rgyas rnams dang ring bas ring // bdag gis shin du las ngan bgyis pas na// bu dang gnyen bshes tshogs rnams skyabs mi 'gyur// blon po dang ni zham ring bkrabs pa yang // de dag dmyal
143a7: bar bdag sod skabs mi 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas 'das dang de bzhin ma byon dang // phyogs bcu dgan gang su bzhugs pa yi// ded dpon stobs bcu nyon mongs med pa rnams// rdo rje stug sra sku mnga'i skyabs su mchi// der ni
143a8: dge slong dum bur byas mthong nas/ / lha rnams rab tu snying rje tshe nges 'debs// de dag deng song dge 'dun go bar byas// me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad// chos smra ba ni mkhas shing rtogs pa de// mthu chen phyogs

143b1: dang phyogs mtshams rab tu grags/ / byang chub sems dpa' gzugs la gnas pa de// me tog zla ma rjes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad// bskal pa mtha' yas sbyin pa sna tshogs byin// tshul khrims mi g.yo skyon med
143b2: gang srung zhing / / 'jig rten kun du mtshungs med bzod sgom pa// me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad// bskal pa mtha' yas rtag tu brtson ldan zhing // 'u ma med sems kyis bsam gtan bzhi la sgom/
143b3: nyon mongs 'joms pa'i shes rab gang bsten pa// me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad// lus la phangs pa thams cad rab spangs shing // de bzhin srog lam chags gyur nas ni// kun du bzang po'i
143b4: nags nas babs nas su/ / me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad// lha yi tshe de'i snying rje thos nas ni// dge slong de kun shin du sdug bsngal nas// me tog zla mdzes nyes med bsad pa la// lta ba'i phyir yang
143b5: thams cad grong du lhags/ / des pa de dag rgyal po'i khab 'ongs nas// dge slong dum bu dum bur byas mthong ste// nyam thag skad kyis mi bzad tshe nges 'debs// de dag thams cad brgyal nas sa la 'gyel/
143b6: dge slong dge 'dun rgyal po de la smra// tshul khrims skyon med shin du bsdams pa yi// dge slong 'dis ni nyes pa ci zhig byas// 'di ni sngon gyi skye babasam yas dran// 'di ni ye shes gzungs dbang pha rol byin/
143b7: 'di ni 'dus byas 'di dag stong par shes// 'di ni 'gro ba dag la mtshan med ston// 'di ni smon lam 'du shes thams cad spangs// 'di ni yid lo bstan pa'i sgra dbyangs 'byin// 'ad ni nges shing dbang po rab tuni/ (
143b8: ni sngon gyi gnas kyi pha rol phyin/ / 'jig rten thams cad las kyang mngon par 'phags// 'di ni sangs rgyas rang byung ye shes kyis// khyu mchog gyur cing 'jig rten ri mo byas// dag cing rab rib med pa'i mig

144a1: gis lta/ byams pa dang ni snying rje shin du che// 'dod pa ngan cing bcog la sdug bsngal bskyed// mtho ris rnam par ma rung byed pa ste// 'dod pa bsnyen na rna ba med par 'gyur// mi dag shes rab dang yang
144a2: bral bar 'gyur/ / mi rnams 'dod pa dag ni bsnyen byas na// long bar 'gyur zhing pha dang ma yang gsod// 'dod pa bsnyen byas tshul khrims ldan pa gsod// de bas mi yis 'dod pa rnam par spang // rgyal pos 'dod pa
144a3: dag ni bsnyen byas na/ / sa bdag dam pa 'byor pa 'di bor nas// mi bzang sdug bsngal rtsub byed sems dmyal nas// sems can dmyal ba 'jigs pa chen por 'gro// 'di 'dra'i dge slong mkhas pa gsod byed de// sdig
144a4: pa'i las rnams rtag tu byed par 'gyur/ / de phyir byang chub zhi pa su 'dod pa// sdig pa rnam pa sna tshogs spang bar bya// lus ni sgyu ma gsog dang 'dra ba dang // de bzhin rna mig sna lce rig nas ni// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin/
144a5: dri mchog dang // reg bya chos rnams zhum med sems kyis gtong // sbyin la bslabs shing tshul khrims nyams pa med// bzod pa dang ni brtson 'grus de bzhin te// bsam gtan sten cing shes rab pha rol song //
144a6: sems can dag gi don kyang rab tu byed// 'jig rten lha dang mi bcas thams cad kyang // byams pas rgyal ba la ni rab tu lta// de phyir mig ni mun gnag gtibs gyur kyang // byang chub zhi ba nyid ni 'tshang rgya 'gyur// rta dang
144a7: bal glang yang thog khri rnams dang / / phyogs dang sngas rnams kyang ni de bzhin te// glang po dag dang bzhon dang dgal ba dang // grong dang yul 'khor dga' ba gtong bar byed// grong khyer dang ni rgyal srid yongs
144a8: gtod zhing / / gser dang dngul dang shel dang byi ru dang // de bzhin gnas dang bu dang bu mo dang // rang gi mgo yang gtong zhing byang chub zhugs// me tog dang ni spos dang bdug pa dang // gdugs dang rgyal

144b1: mtshan lha yi bdan dang / / rol mo'i cha spyad sna tshogs thogs nas ni// dga' nas mchod pa mtshungs pa med pa byed// srid pa dag ni stong par shes nas kyang // srid pa'i 'gro bdag la dga' mi byed// de phyir stobs
144b2: bcu mtshan gyis rnam brgyan cing / / phyogs bcu thams cad du yang snang bar byed// byang chub sems dpa' gzugs la gang gnas pa// 'dod pa'i khams rnams dang ni gzugs kyi khams// gzugs med khams la
144b3: de dag mi chags te/ / khams gsum dag la snga nas chags pa med// byang chub sems dpa' gzugs la gang gnas pa// bdag du 'du shes sems can 'du shes med// srog tu 'du shes gang zag 'du shes med//
144b4: tshangs par spyod pa ma 'dres rtag tu spyad// byang chub sems dpa' gzugs la gang gnas pa// dngos por 'du shes dngos med 'du shes med// bde bar 'du shes mi bder 'du shes med// grangs su 'du shes grangs sa/
144b5: 'du shes med// byang chub sems dpa' gzugs la gang gnas pa// yod par 'du shes med par 'du shes med// bud med 'du shes skyes par 'du shes med// grong gi 'du shes grong khyer 'du shes med// byang chub
144b6: sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa/ / yul 'khor 'du shes grong mdab 'du shes med// 'dod chags 'du shes 'dod bral 'du shes med// zhe sdang 'du shes sdang bral 'du shes med// gti mug 'du shes
144b7: rmongs bral 'du shes med/ / byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa// nga rgyal nga rgyal bral ba'i 'du shes med// ma rig ma rig ma yin 'du shes med// lha dang lta ba ma yin 'du shes med// byang chub sa
144b8: dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa/ / de dag dbang po stobs la mi chags te// byang chub yan lag bsam gtan chags pa med// khams gsum nyes pa thams cad rab tu spong // 'dod chags chags med zhe sdang

145a1: gtum pa med/ / gti mug rmongs med rtag tu g.yo med 'gyur// sangs rgyas stobs bcu mthong nas bkur sti byed// blo gros ldan pa mtho ras smon mi byed// su dag gzhan las chos mchog thos nas ni/
145a2: de la nam yang nem nur mi byed pa// 'bru mar gang ba'i snod bzhin dang zhing dag/ bcad dadam bcad gzhan gyi blo yang shes// mdza' ba byas na rjes su chags pa skye// de yang nyon mongs pa ni chen po yin// zhe sdang byas na/
145a3: khong khro skye bar 'gyur// dgra dang 'jigs pa sdig pa rnams kyang 'byung // 'di gnyis rab tu rnam par spang byas te// blo gros ldan pa dag ni byang chub zhugs// de dag mi yi khyu mchog stobs bcur ni// 'jig rten du yang
145a4: mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur/ / nad dang phyi rol dag kyang rnam spangs te// chos kyi dbang po nyid la rab gnas shing // tshul khrims phung po dag kyang rnam par sbyangs// ral pa med cing ma 'dres skyon yang med// nam yang de dag
145a5: gi ni tshul khrims dag/ 'phags shing 'dres pa dag tu mi 'gyur te// mtha' 'di dag ni gnyis po yongs spangs nas// blo gros 'chang ba byang chub zhi rtogs 'gyur// de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin gyis dge slong gi dge
145a6: ' dun las chos smra ba me tog za mdzes kyi yon tan bye brag chen po yangs shing rgya che ba zos nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi dga' nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa
145a7: nags khrod stug pa kun du bzang po ni/ / sdong po chen pos gang zhing 'bras bus mdzes// drus kun skye ba me tog sdug pas brgyan// sna tshogs tha dad bya rnams sgra yang 'byin// gser gyi ri yang mdzes shing mthobs brgyan
145a8: mi 'am ce yi glu dbyangs snyan pa dang / rol mo shin du thabs ldan yid 'od grag/ grub pa'i bu mo rtag tu gar yang byed// nags de ltalha yi dga' ba'i tshal bzhin te// gzugs bzang gzugs 'bar ba yi shing gis dkrigs

145b1: ma tog rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad bskum/ / ut+pal pad mos brgyan cing chu yang 'bab/ 'di 'dru ba yi nags mchog nyams dga' ba// drang srong rtag tu gnas par 'thun pa dag/ khong nas sems can don dang can shed
145b2: pas/ / sdig pa'i phung po bdag drung grong du byon// de ltar chos smra yon tan 'chang ba 'di// me tog zla mdzes grong khyer 'dir byon te// blon nas sdig pa bgyid pa bdag gis bkrongs// 'di bkrongs pas ni bdag kyang
145b3: dmyal bar ltung / / byang chub sems dpa'i thugs rje'i stobs ldan gang // dpa' bo sems can phan phyir 'jig rten spyod// de dag sdig pa gyid bdag gi skabs mdzod cig/ byang chub sems dpa' de skabs bdag
145b4: mchi'o/ / gang yang rang rgyal dag ni gnyis pa dang / gang gzhan nyan thos rdzu 'phrul ldan pa ste// zag pa zad ci tha ma'i lus 'dzin pa// bdag ni sdug bsngal mnar med mchi ba skyobs// de nas yang bcom ldan la
145b5: kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lus dang srog la mtshogs par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo lus
145b6: dang srog la chags pa'i sems can rnams mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste// rtag tu rul ba'i lus 'di dang // srog kyang g.yo zhing dbang med de// rmi lam sgyu ma 'dra
145b7: ba la/ sems can gang dag chags pa ni// shin du ma rungs las byas nas// gti mug dbang song de dag ni// sems can dmyal ba mi zad par// mi mkhas bdud kyi bzhon pas song // dbub pa rdos 'dri'i lus
145b8: dang ni/ chu yi chu bur 'dra srog la// mi gang chags par mi byed pa// de dag 'gro ba mchog tu 'gro// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de lta zan

146a1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas lus dang /
146a2: srog lam lta ba byas te// mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du brtson 'grus brtsams pas sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed de dben pa ni bde bar gnas pa dang dgon pa dang nags
146a3: khrod spangs te grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang ljongs dang yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang ri khrod rnams su zhugs te/ ci nas sems can de dag nyan thos kyi byang chub dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang
146a4: chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lha de lta bur sems can rnams la chos bstan par bya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
146a5: de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la sngon byung ba'i gtam bstan pa 'di nyid rgya cher tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rgyas par rab tu bstan to/ / ngas sngon spyad pa dag ni spyod pa na// de tshe rgyal po dpa' bas byin
146a6: par gyur/ rgyal po'i pho brang rin chen ldan zhes bya// bskyed mos tshal gyi sar ni byung bar gyur// shing rta zhugs pas de tshe dge slong mthong // kun nas mdzes shing blta ni sdug pa ste// sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go bgos
146a7: pa/ phyogs rnams thams cad du yang snang bar byed// me tog zla mdzes phyogs su grags pa ste// snying rje gnas pa phan zhing skyir brtse ba// dpal dang gzi brjid dag gis mdzes pa ni// sems can rnams la brtse phyir
146a8: grong du 'ongs/ / da ni gzugs kyang de tsam mi phong bas// de la da yeng 'jungs pa ma rungs skyes// 'dod la chags shing srid la bcings pas na// 'di ni bdag gi srid las spyod snyam ste// nga yi bu rnams stong du rgya

146b1: pa yang / shir rtang zhugs shing zham ring mthon dman 'gro// cod pa na dang ni sna tshogs brgyan gyis brgyan/ sum brgyad par phyir lha yi du 'brang bzhin// de nang yi bu mo lnga brgyad ga/ nor bu thogs shing lham byon pa ldan
146b2: sdug/ mgo rgyan dang ni lta ba lbu brgyan gyis spyad// de dag gser gyi dra bas shir rta 'dren// nga yi bud med dag ni brgyad khri yang // gzugs mdzes shin du blta na sdug pa dge/ shing rkang zhugs pas dge slong de mthong ste/
146b3: ro rab bzhin du gzugs bzang dpal 'bar ba// mthong nas de dag par yang 'du shes bskyed// byang chu pa pa mchog tu sems skyes te// de tshe tshangs pa'i spyod par yang dgra btsud// yid du 'ong ba'i rgyun rnams del
146b4: gtor/ / de tshe nga ni phrag dog skyes par gyur// gnod sems zhe sdang thab mi bzad de// dbang phyug rgyags pas bu la 'di skad smras// mdun na 'dug pa'i dge slong bsad par gyis// gzhon nu de dag nga yi tshig thos nas/
146b5: shin du sdug bsngal yid kyang mi dgar gyur// yab cig de skad kyi ni tshig ma gsung // dge slong 'di 'dra bdag cag mi 'gums so// bskal pa bye ba gang gA'i bye snyed du// bdag cag lus dang yan lag bcad gtubs kyang //
146b6: dge slong 'don 'gums par mi bgyid de// 'di ltar bdag cag byang chub sems skyes so// rgyal po de che bu yi tshig thos nas// khros te gsod pa'i gshed ma 'bangs la spras// nga yis btsun mo'i mdun na 'dug pa yi//
146b7: dge slong 'di ni myur du song de phul// de nas gsod pa'i gshed ma phyi bzhin 'ongs// shin du gtum sems dga' byed snying rje med// 'bru mar dang btags ral gri thogs nas su// nga yis dge slong dum bu brgyad
146b8: du byas/ de yi lus dang yan lag bcad pa las/ khrag kyang mi zag 'od zer stong byung ste// bcad pa'i 'phron dpal be'u 'khor lo dag/ mtshan rnams de yi lus kyi nang na yod// shin du ma rungs las ni byas nas su/

147a1: bskyed mos tshal du de yi mod la byung // dge slong me tog zla ba dran nas ni// de yi rtsed mo dga' bar gyur te re// rings pa'i gzugs su myur zhing mgyogs par ni// de nas bdag gi rgyal po'i
147a2: po brang song / / gang du dge slong dum bu brgyad byas pa// sa phyogs der ni shing rtar zhugs nas phyin// lha rnams khrag khrig mang po bar snang la// chongs 'debs pa'i sgra dag des thos te// rgyal po khyod kyis
147a3: mi dge sdig mad bgyis/ / shi 'phos nas ni mnar med mi bder 'gro// rgyal po des ni lha yi sgra thos nas// shin du sdug bsngal mi dga' sems skrag gyur// bdag gis me tog zla mdzes bkrongs pa
147a4: ni/ / bdag gis sdig pa mi bzad mang po bgyis// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mtha' yas ldan// sangs rgyas mi yi khyu mchog sras po gang // dbang po bsrungs shing nges bzhi pa'i yid// de ni 'dod pa'i don
147a5: phyir bdag gis bkrongs/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams gang 'dzin cing // zad pa'i dus la dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod// 'jig rten kun du chos kyi sgron ma mdzad// de ni 'dod pa'i don phyir bdag gis bkroH//
147a6: 'jig rten kun na sman pa'i rgyal po gang // sems can na brtag tu gso byed cing // bdud rtsi dag gis bkru sman gtong ba yi// dge slong bdag gis 'dod pa'i don phyir bkrongs// zhib cing zab la zhi ba blta dka'//
147a7: ba'i// chos rnams skye dgu dag la gang 'chad cing // byang chub snying po mchog kyang gang ston pa// de ni 'dod pa'i don phyir bdag gis bkrongs// 'dren pa rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod 'dzin cing // 'jig
147a8: rten mdongs pa'i sgron mar gyur pa ste/ / gzungs dang mdo sde'i rgyal po gang 'dzin pa// de ni ci slad bdag gis 'dod phyir bkrongs// nyon mongs med cing rnam dag ye shes can// zhi ba rab zhi

147b1: rtag tu mnyam bzhag pa/ / 'dod pas mdongs pas bdag gis deng bkrongs te// des ni shin du ma rungs dmyal bar ltung // sangs rgyas gang dag 'das dag de bzhin ma byon dang // mi yi dam pa rgyal ba gang yang
147b2: bzhugs pa ni/ / bsngags bamatha' yas yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa rnams// de dag kun la thal mo sbyar te skyabs su mchi// / 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/ bam po bcu gsum pa/
147b3: de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin gyis chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes pa sad de shi ba'i lus kyi mdog ma gyur par sa la 'gyel cing 'dug pa mthong nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste 'gyod cing myos par gyur na
147b4: de'i tshe cho des rab tu cher btab bo/ / chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes de la yang 'di ltar bur yang dag pa'i yon tan gyis bstod pa dang snying rje dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag smras so// kun tu bzang por 'phags
147b5: pa'i dge 'dun gyis/ / khyod la rnam pa mang po bsgo ba bgyis// khyod kyi srog gi bar chad byung da re// rin chen ldan par rgyal po'i khab ma bzhud// khyod kyis dge slong dge 'dun tshig ma bzung // mgon po grong khyer du ni rtsi
147b6: sla byon/ / khyod ni gang gi don du byon pa yi// don de sgron ma mdzad pa mdzad du gsol// lha rdzas myu gu sna tshogs brgyan pa'i sa// gzugs bzang gzugs 'bar shing ljon mang pos dkrigs// grub pa'i rig 'dzin
147b7: gnod sbyin mchog gis bsrungs/ / lha rnams zhugs shing bya rgyal sgra yang sgrog/ kun du bzang po sangs rgyas rtag bzhugs pa// nags tshal dam par dga' ba bor nas ni// bgyi ba gang phyir khyod ni 'dir byon pa
147b8: des pa bgyi ba de dang bdag la gsungs/ / khyod kyi tshig thos nas ni bka' bzhin bgyi// sangs rgyas sras po bzhengs la bka' stsol cig/ kye ma de ni ci bgyi lha yi lha// bdag ni mgon med khyod kyi skyabs sumachi//

148a1: gcig pu seng ge ri dgas rgyal po ltar// dge slong dge 'dun mchog gi khya bor nas// sems can mtha' yas pa la thugs brtse'i phyir// rang gi srog kyang btang ste 'dir byon na// 'dod chags
148a2: zil non shin du 'jungs pa yis/ / bdag gis dpa' bo dum bu dum bur bcad// 'di ni dge slong dge 'dun mtha' dag kyang // khyod la lta bar pho brang ma lhags par// bdag ni 'jigs skrag khyod la ci
148a3: gsol pa/ de bar gsol ba gcig ni gnang bar mdzod// me tog zla mdzes mi 'jigs bdag stsol la// nya dus zla ba nya 'drar bzhengs su gsol// sems can gtso bo bdag la gnang bar mdzod// chos sgra
148a4: khyod ni zhe sdang rnam par grol/ / de ring bdag la sna gcig gnang bar mdzod// nyi ma bzhin du snang mdzad bzhengs su gsol// tshes smra mchog ni bdag gis bkrongs bgyis te// sdig pa ma legs bdag
148a5: gis deng bgyis pa/ / 'di nas 'chi 'phos mi bzad dmyal bar skye// bdag la de yi skyabs su 'gyur ba med// nyon mongs byed pa sdig sems ci ru rung // rgyags pas khengs pa'i rgyal srid ci ru rung // thams
148a6: cad spangs te gcig pu 'gro bar 'gyur/ / 'di nas bdag gis snying po cim blangs// 'dod chags zhe sdang bcom pa rnam dag chos// snyan par gsung ba bdag thul thugs rje can// 'gro ba'i gnyen cig/
148a7: sun 'byin mi mdzad pa// me tog zla mdzes bdag gis ci phyir bkrongs// kye ma bzod dang dka' thub nor phyug/ brtul zhugs bzang // kye ma gzugs dang des pa dag gi yon tan ldan// kye ma g.yo mad
148a8: dpal stag spros pa mi mnga' ba/ / bdag cag bor nas khyod ni gang du bzhud par mdzad// 'phags pa khyod kyi lus dang yan lag bcad pa na// 'o ma rab tu zag cing 'od zer stong dag byung // 'jig rten 'di dag

148b1: thams cad shin tu ngo mtshar gyur/ / ngo mtshar che ba'i rang bzhin 'dren pa bzhengs su gsol// kye ma me tog zla ba dul ba thugs rje can// kye ma byams dang snying rje'i phung po ri bo tshur// kye mtshos rnams zab
148b2: mo shin du ston pa'i mchog/ lha khyod bzhengs shig bdag la thugs brtser mdzad du gsol// kye ma zla ba nya zhal tshur spyon cig/ kye mas bcu legs gnas tshur spyon cig/ kye ma dpa' bo stobs bcu mngon
148b3: 'phags pa/ / tshal khyod dbang bdag po gang du bzhud// kye ma dpa' bo tshur spyon bdag la gsungs// khyod kyis yun rengs bzod pa sgoms pa dang // brtson 'grus thugs rje de dag gang du mchis// byams pa chen
148b4: po bzhengs la gsung phyung zhig/ kye ma shin du mchod 'os lha yi lha// tshe so sma cang mi gsung bar ci slad bzhugs// mkhas pa bzhangs la bdag gi khyim du bzhud// bud med tshogs la khyod kyis chos
148b5: ston cig/ lha khyod lus na bcad par mi nus te/ lha dang lha min gnod sbyi ni srin pos kyang // khyod kyi lha yi lus 'di mi shigs kyis// mkhas pa khyod deng sgra dag ma mdzad cig/ lha khyod sku
148b6: mdzad bzhugs pag la gda'/ / byang chub sems dpa' sgyum mi mdzes so// sgyu ma thams cad spongs la bzhengs su gsol// rin chen ldan pa'i grong du chos shod cig/ kye ma 'phags
148b7: ba me tog zla mdzes tshur/ / kye ma khams gsum 'dod chags bral batshur// kye ma pa ma lta bur 'dren par tshur// bdag gi sems dmyal sgo ni gcad du gsol// ngan song skyes pa rnams kyi rten dang dpung /
148b8: srog chags mnar med chen por ltung ba yi// skyabs mdzad me tog zla mdzes tshur spyon cig/ bdag gi bde 'gro'i sgo yang dbye bar gsol// mgon po khyod ni dgung bdun bshos ma gsol// re shig

149a1: deng bzhengs bdag gi bshes gsol cig/ bdag gi bshas gsol rin chen ldan pa 'dir// sems can dum mchos la dgod pa mdzod// khya mchos mchog togs pa bdag gi yab// mas mas can rnams
149a2: la khon med sems/ / kye mtshung skyon padag mdun chos ston cig/ kye mtshur smon khyod smon mur grub shig/ dge slong dge 'dun de ni mgon med gyur// kye ma mdongs shing mi dran mya ngan bgyid// sems can snying brgya
149a3: ni myur bzhengs la/ / dge slong dge 'dun dbugs kyang dbyung bar mdzod// kye ma 'jig rten gsum na sgron gyur pa// kye mtshur spyon kun du bzang por bzhud// kun du bzang po'i nags khrod bzhud nas ni// dge slong dag la phan
149a4: phyir khyod ston cig/ kye kye chos 'dzin yon tan rmad byung tshe// a shwad me tog bzhin du rnyed par dka'// shes rab thugs rje'i spyan ni dri med pa// kye kye dge slong dge 'dun gzigs su gsol// tshig gi lam dang bral ba'i
149a5: gzugs de yang / / kye kye dge slong dag la bstan du gsol// kye kye zla ba shar ba bzhin du 'dir// me tog zla ba de ring bzhengs su gsol// kye kye rgyal sras bdag la thugs brtse ba// dbugs 'byin mdzad pa ston pa bla na med/
149a6: kye kye mtshon dang dbyug pas btab pa bzod// bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan zhing rab tu des// kye kye me tog zla mdzes thugs rje can// rab sbyin 'dren pa khyod ni bzhengs su gsol// kye kye khyod ni bzhengs la bdag la yang /
149a7: mthong bar dka' ba'i gzungs rnams bshad du gsol// kye kye 'jig rten kun du snad mdzad pa// shes rab kyi ni sgron ma dam pa'i mchog/ kye kye sems can dag gi phan don la// brtson mdzad 'dren pa thugs rje'i stob
149a8: dang ldan/ / kye kye me tog zla mdzes bzhengs su gsol// dpa' bo sems can dag gi don mdzad pa/ kye kye sems can dag ni bye ba dang // khrag khrig rnams kyang zhi ba'i grong du bod// kye kye tshul khrims nor ldan blo gros cha/

149b1: mkhas pa bslabs pa na gyis shin du byug/ me kye tshul khrims brdul zhugs rab gnas shing // chas kyu gang gi myu gu mngon par dga'/ ma sa gas ngur smrig kha bsgrung 'chang // ga tum na
149b2: par byung la dga' bar mdzad/ / kye kye me tog zla baN+Dal zhugs mchog/ rab sbyin dka' thub bzang po khyod bzhengs shig/ kye kye dul ba sems can ma dul 'dul// rtag par dul ba'i gnas dang rjes su ldan// the rtse dul
149b3: phardul m+bu'i rjes su bzhud/ / zhi ba dbang por bzhi por nas des// kye kye sems can nyal zhing gnyid log pa// chos kyi sgra yis rtag tu sad par mdzod// kye kye sems can bye ba khrag khrig dag/ sa par 'byes nas thag
149b4: pa mchog la khod/ / kye kyi sbyin pa yi ni spang leb la// brtson 'grus thag gus sbrel pa'i ga sbyar te// kye kye sems can rgya mtsho chen por ni// rab tu ltung zhing sred pas ded pa rnams// kye kye stobs bcu ldan pa mcho/
149b5: mchog/ mnyan pa gdos 'dzin mkhas pa bzhengs su gsol// kye kye shin du sra ba'i gyur yang ni// zhugs nas bdag dang de dag bskal bar mdzod// kye kye sman pa'i dam pa brtul zhugs la// shin tu
149b6: spyod cing rig mdzad sman pa'i mchog/ kye kye ye shes rnam grol pha rol phyin// dam pa'i chos kyi rtsi dag sbyin mdzad pa// kye kye nad ni rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// btab pa'i sems can na ba rnam
149b7: gzigs nas/ / kye kye myur du bzhengs la de dag la// chos kyi sman rnams shin du stsal bar mdzod// kye kya ye shes sman pa'i rgyal po mchog/ mtshungs med ye shes 'phags shing pha rol phyin/ kye
149b8: nad rnams shin du gso mdzad cing / / thugs rjes sems can dag gi don kyang mdzad// kye kyen bar gyur pa'i sems can kha mos// 'dod chags nad kyis ma lus bcom pa rnams// des ni sems

150a1: tsan thams cad bde ba dang / / nad rnams med cing mya ngan 'das par 'gyur// kye kye mkhas pa ye shes rgya chen bslabs// chos kyi rnga dag shin du brdung bar mdzod// kye kye 'jig rten gyi ni the tsom gyi// 'khri shing thams cad
150a2: ye shes rgya mtshos chod/ / kye kye legs thos chos rnams 'dzin mdzad pa// rdul bral mdo sde bye ba brgya dag kyang // 'khor gyi nang du gdan la rab bzhugs la// mi mchog mkhas pa brjod pa mdzad du gsol// me tog zla
150a3: ba mtshan mchog brgyan pa kye/ / dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu tshad pakye// dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus lus brgyan kye// srid pa'i mtsho rgal spros med tshur spyon kye// srid pa'i btson rar chung khrol bzhengs shig kye// ye shes
150a4: mchog rig tshangs pa 'dra ba kye/ / me tog zla ba thugs rje chen po kye// byams dang thugs rje skyed la bzhengs shig kye// me tog zla ba khyod la gsol ba 'debs// dge slong dge 'dun khyod kyis mdor bar// tshur gshegs dge 'dun yod
150a5: su bsdu ba mdzod/ / bzhengs la nags khrod der yang gshegs sam kye// me tog zla ba bsam gtan dgyes pa mchog/ mdza' dang mi mdza' mtshungs par byams shing phan// gzungs la rab tu gnas pa tshud skyonaH/ ye shes sdong po
150a6: mtshungs med khyod bzhengs shig/ ri rab bzhin du mi g.yo brtan pa kye// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sems can mnyam yid kye// me tog zla ba brtul zhugs rdzogs pa kye// bzhengs la shing gi drung du 'tshang rgya mdzod// lha yi
150a7: rna ba chos kyi mchog 'chad kye/ / lha yi mig mkhas ye shes rtogs pa kye// bzhengs te bdag la gzigs shig thugs rje can// grags pa mtha' yas bdag gi tshig gson kye// 'jig rten kun la phan dang don mdzad kyi// me
150a8: tog zla ba shin du sbyin dgyes kye/ / bzhengs la myur du bdag gi re rdzogs mdzod// khyod 'dir dum bu dum bur ma bzhugs shig/ grong 'dir skyes pa bud med tshogs rnams kyang // khyod mthong thams cad shing bzhin sa la 'gyel

150b1: snyed skams 'gyur ba'i mya ngan rnams kyang bgyid/ / thugs rje mchog gi sman gyis de la gzigs// gang gi slad du byams pa bsgoms pa dang // ye shes shes rab thabs kyi stobs rnams dang // khyod kyi
150b2: thugs rje btang snyoms dga' ba yangs/ / de dag rdzogs mdzod bzhengs shig me tog mdzes// lha klu lha min rdzu 'phrul chen po dang // gnod sbyin srin po mi dang mi 'am ci// snyam pa me tog bdug pas bkang nas/
150b3: ni/ thams cad mthong bar dga' nas lhags shing 'khod// drang srong chen po'i tshig ni deng rtogs te// skyes dgu'i 'dod pa gnod byed gsod pa yin// yid kyi nang tu 'gyur ba ngan 'gro'i rgyu// / de phyir 'dod pa'i spyod pa spang
150b4: bar bya/ / dge slong bdag gis bsad pa sdig gi las// shin du ma legs mi bde byas pas ni// bdag ni mi bzad dmyal ba mnar med 'gro// bdag la de yi mgon skyabs byed pa med// bdag ni rgyal po'i
150b5: srid btang tshangs spyod gzhol/ / spos dang me tog byug pa rnams kyis ni// mchod pa dam pa rnams kyang rab tu bya// shin du mdzes par mchod rten bdag gis bya// bu dang bu mo bud med kyis bdag dang // blon po
150b6: dang ni dmag dpon de dag dang / / grong ba dang ni rgyal rigs mang po rnams// de dag thams cad la ni ngas bsgo ba// a ga ru dang tsan dan shug pa dang // shin du zhim pa'i spos mchog ci yod pas// myur du sgrom gyi snying po'i
150b7: khyogs tshes la/ / dge slong 'di ni bsreg pa'i cho ga gyis// grong khyer mi kun rgyal po'i tshig thos nas// spos mchog dag kyang thogs nas khyogs bcas te// spros rab bzang po yid du 'od las byas// der ni//
150b8: dge slong de yang btsug nas su// a ka ru dang tsan dan tsam pa ka/ rgya spos spri ka de bzhin pa ta la// me tog dang ni phreng ba byug pa dag/ shin du bzang dang 'bru mar dag gis bsregs// de yi rus pa'i sgrom ni

151a1: byas par byung / / dge slong dag gis de yang de bsregs te// rgyal pos de yis mchod rten byas nas su// 'di la ngas ni mchod pa bya zhes zer// me tog dang ni phreng ba blag pa dang // gdugs dang ba dan rgyal ma /
151a2: thogs nas su// rgyal pos der ni sil snyan stong dag dang // bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyang len du btsud// nyi ma gcig la rgyal po dus gsum du// dge slong de yi mchod rten de drung du// sdig pa sngon cad cung zad ci byas pa/
151a3: de tshe dus gsum du yang shin du 'chags// lo stong bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu lngar// nyes pa byas pa dag kyang rab bshegs te// phyis kyang tshul khrims dam pa ma ral bsrungs// rnam par dag cing gtsang la dri ma
151a4: med/ / lo stong bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu lngar// gso sbyong dag kyang de tshe rab gsos te// de ni de tshe bdag gi lus zhig nas// mnar med mi bzad par ni de lhung gyur// 'dod phyir snying rje med pa'i las byas pas//
151a5: sdug bsngal mang po dag kyang myong bar gyur// sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu lnga// de tshe de dag bdag gis ma mnyes byas// lo stong bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu lngar// de yi tshe na nga ni long bar gyur// bskal pa bye ba
151a6: khrag khrig drug bcu gnyis/ / sngan chad nga yi mig kyang bcar bar gyur// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag stong dang // shin du mang bar nga yi mig phyung phrogs// mgo dang rna ba dang ni rkang lag
151a7: kyang / / bskal pa mtha' yas khrag khrig bcad par gyur// bskal pa dag ni bye ba khrag khrig tu// mir gyur pa dang skye ba gzhan du yang // 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag gis rab gtses shing // sdug
151a8: bsngal tshor ba yun ring myong bar gyur/ / sdig pa'i las rnams byas pas 'khor ba na// yun reng shin du sdug bsngal myong por gyur// de phyir byang chub zhi ba su 'dod pa// srid pa gsum du sdig pa mi bya'o// rgyal po mchog

151b1: gis sngon gyi las bshags kyang / / snga ma'i nyes byas rnams las de ma thar// mi bzang gzugs kyi las rnams sngar byas pas// de shi dmyal ba mi bzad mnar med song // nga yi rna ba de bzhin rkang lag bcad// bskal
151b2: pa mtha' yas mang por sna yang bcad/ / spyod pa spyod tshe mtshon chad byeg thogs nas// 'debs byed nan gyis nga yi mig kyang phyung // byang chub phyir ni mgo lag lus bcad dang // bu dang chung ma mig dang rang gi sha/ rkang
151b3: lag dga' ba'i sems kyis yongs btang yad/ / sprin gyi sdig pa'i las ni zad ma gyur// kun dag 'a de ltar bskal pa mtha' yas spyod// sangs rgyas dpal sug dpag tu med pa mthong // byang chub spyo mchog 'a
151b4: ni spyod pa ru/ / de tshe sdug bsngal 'di dag sngon myong gyur// byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas shing // byams spyod rtag tu mi g.yo mi 'gul ba// sangs rgyas rdul sbyangs lha yi lha mchod nas// de dag nas
151b5: yang ngan sangasar mi 'gro/ / sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis go bgos pa// chos rje sangs rgyas bdag 'gyur su 'dod pa// tshul khrims ma 'dres g.yo ba med par sruspangs// gzungs la rab gnas chos kyang ston
151b6: par gyis/ nga ni de tshe rgyal po dbas byin yin// nga yis bu rnams phyi dus chos skyong ba// me tog zla mdzes pad ma bla ma yin// dga' byed de ni zhi ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// 'jig rten gsum dpa' 'gro ba'i
151b7: gnyen gcig pa/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rkang gnyis gtso bor gyur// skye dgu dag gi don chen mdzad nas ne// mang me bzhin du 'dren pa mya ngan 'das// bud med tshogs dang rgyal rigs mang po dang // khyim bdag dang na
151b8: blon po stobs chen dang / / tshong dpon de bzhin grong ba mkhar gyi rgyal// thams cad stobs bcu nyon mongs med par gyur// me tog zla mdzes kyi le'u ste sum bcu rtsa drug pa'o// / de nas bcom

152a1: ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ / gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ci nas bdag blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i ma na na
152a2: par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod na/ / gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan par bya// gzung bar bya/ kun chub
152a3: par bya/ bcad par bya/ klag par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya/ lung mnod cing kha ton du bya/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i bsgom pas mang du bsgom par bya// gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o// tshul khrims
152a4: kyi phung po la yang rab tu gnas par bya'o/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims tshogs gnas shing // bdag la phan sems spyad pa gang spyod
152a5: pa/ mngon dga'i sangs rgyas zhing du myur song nas/ bzod pa des thob chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur// de phyir gnod sems med cing kun 'thun gyis// thams cad ga mi du 'ong bar gyis// dpal stag sangs rgyas dpag med ma
152a6: nas na/ byang chub reg nas chos kyi bdag por 'gyur// de phyir phan yon mchog 'di thos nas ni// dge slong tshul khrims mchog dang ldan mthong na// ma sa go med rtag du sten par bya// ring bo mi thogs ting 'dzin 'di
152a7: 'thob 'gyur/ / gal te gter rnams dpag med tshad kyang med// rin chen sna bdun nor bus gang gyur pa// de bzhin zhing rnams gang gA'i bye ma snyed// nor bu rin po che yis gang ba rnams// byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin la
152a8: mos pa yis/ / nyin mtshan re rer sbyin pa 'di dag byin// de bzhin bskal pa gang gA'i bye ma snyed// rgyun mi 'chad par sbyin par byin pa bas// byang chub sems dpa' gang gis ting 'dzin 'di// thos nas bde gshegs

152b1: mdzod mchog 'dzin byed pa/ / bsod nams phung po des ni gang bzung ba// sbyin pa de kun de yi char mi phod// mig rjes su 'thun la dad pa dag/ ting 'dzin rdul bral mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni// bsod nams phung
152b2: bo dpe med mchog 'di yin/ / ye shes mdzad de dpag med 'byung gnas so// ting 'dzin rdul bral zhi ba 'di bzung na/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni nor chen 'gyur// rgya mtsho chen po bzhin du thos pa'i
152b3: gter/ / de la bsod nams tshad yod yod mi 'gyur// chos kyi mchog rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pas// shin du rgyas byas byang chub sems dpar brjod// ting 'dzin 'di ni su dag skyon byedag de ni
152b4: nam yang byang chub the tshom med/ / bsod nams phung po mchog dang gang ldan zhing // gang la tshad med bsam gyis me khyab pa// 'jig rten slob dpon sangs rgyas rnam par 'dren// rang byung thugs rje
152b5: chen po ma gtogs par/ / de yi 'og tu sems can su dag kyang // stong chen 'di na bsod nams phung po dang // mtshungs med bsam gyis mi khyab ye shes kyis// mnyam par gyur pa nam yang yod med do// /
152b6: ting 'dzin 'di ni thos nas 'dzin pa dang // klog cing yongs su chub par byed pa dang // mtshungs med sangs rgyas byang chub tshol ma gtogs// de yi ye shes mtshungs pa med par 'gyur// ting
152b7: 'dzin 'di ni bzung zhing blags pa yis/ / bsod nams phung po ji snyed bsags pa yang // gzhon nu ji ste chos de gzugs yod na// 'jig rten khams mang 'dir yang shod mi 'gyur//
152b8: gzhon nu de phyir byang chub sems dpa' gang // 'das dang 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang // sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par 'dod pa yis// ting 'dzin 'di ni gzung zhing klag par gyis//

153a1: dab na gshegs pa byung 'a pa// khas zhugs dang byur bya/ nan gzugs pardzun rgya gas gsung/ ngag ba na du sgrubs ldan nas shA pa
153a2: yasas/ byang chub phyung mamachog 'di ston cing / ti 'dzin dan yangs su tshal ba byung // de du tu ba 'di sgyu / dbyung chos kyi mdzad dis pa gyiste// d-il su
153a3: khrig 'byung / / 'di ni bsod nams phung po bos ma yas yangs// 'dis ni sangs rgyas ye shes myur du 'thob// mkhas pa 'jigs med de dag gang ston pa// 'di ni mdo sde kun gyi dam pa'i mdo// dge babasam
153a4: gyis mi khyab 'byung gnas te/ / chos de rnams la mthar thug rnyed mi 'gyur// stong chen dag ni bcad cing bshig nas su// rdul gyi tshogs rnams bgrang bar nus na yang // mdo sde brgya phrag bas ma yas tshad med pa/ rgyun
153a5: mi chad par de stong bgrang mi nus/ / sangs rgyas zhing gi sems can thams cad kyi// phyi nang rgyu ba'i dbugs ni bgrang nus kyang // ting 'dzin 'di la gnas nas gang ston pa// mdo sde de dag mthar thug nus mi 'gyur// sangs
153a6: rgyas zhing ni gang gA'i bye ma snyed/ / 'gro ba der yang sems can gang skyes pa// de dag sems ni bgrang bar nus kyang srid// rtag ston mdo sde de dag bgrang mi nus// rgya mtsho chen po'i bye ma ci yod dang // klung dang
153a7: mtshe'u dang gshong gi bye ma dag/ bskal pa bye ba dag gis bgrang nus kyang // de dag 'chad pa'i mdo sde mtha' yas so// sangs rgyas zhing ni bye ba mang po na// chu yi phung po rtag 'dug ci yod pa// brgya tshal sgra la
153a8: rtse mos bgrang nus kyang / / de yi dbyangs kyi yan lag kun mi bgrangs// gang sngon 'dir ni sems can ci 'byung ba// rang gi lus la snying por 'dogs pa rnams// bskal pa bye ba mang pos bgram dus kyang

153b1: de dag mdo sde sgrub pa shes mi nus/ / phyogs bcu dag na sems can ci yod pa// srog chags kun gyi sgra skad bgrang nus kyang // de dag rtag tu mi 'chad ston pa yi// mdo sde de dag bgrang bar yod mi nug / chos rnams thams
153b2: cad bstan par rab shis shing / / nges pa'i tshig dang bstan pa tshig don mkhas// gtan la bab pa'i yang dag tshul la bslabs// blo gros yangs shing rtag dga' shes rab can// yangs pa'i don sems rab tu phye ba'i
153b3: tho/ bsam dang mi bsam pa yang rtag tu shes// dbyangs kyi rang bzhin rgya chen thams cad rig/ sgra dbyangs de dag ston kyang chags mi 'gyur// thogs med de ni chos smrar brjod pa ste// 'gro ba kun
153b4: la ston kyang chags mi 'gyur/ / dri ba nges par bstan pa brgyal mkhas// de ltar de yis don dam rab tu rtogs// mdo sde gcig gis phyogs kyang bye ba skyed// bsam gyis mi khyab des ston chags pa med// chags med ston/
153b5: patshig gi don la mkhas// 'khor gyi nang du de 'chad chags mi 'gyur// ting 'dzin 'di la legs par gang gnas pa// byang chub sems dpa' de ni g.yo ba med// chos la stobs bskyed bye brag thob pas ni// srog chags bye ba mang
153b6: bI don de byed/ / ji ltar ri rab mi g.yo mi 'gul te// rlung rnams kun gyis 'gul bar mi nus pa// de bzhin dge slong chos smra mkhas pa yang // pha rol rgol ba kun gyis bskyod mi nus// stong chen gyi ni 'jig rten khams 'di
153b7: na/ ri gang mi g.yo bar ni brjod pa rnams// de dag rlung gis rab tu bskyod nus kyang // stong pa'i chos gnas dge slong ba skyod mi nus// su dag stong pa nyid la rtag brtson pa// sangs rgyas gnas su nges pa de yin te// gtan la bab pa
153b8: stong pa'i chos rab shes/ / de ni rgol ba kun gyis dkrug mi nus// bos kyi rgol ba dag gis mi bskyod cing // smra ba thams cad kyis kyang zil mi non// ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di ni bstan byas na// zil gyis mi non smad pa med par

154a1: 'gyur/ ting 'dzin ni pa 'di ni bshad byas na// dmas snang nyin rtags par yang tu chud// nams rnams can la nam nu med// lags mtha' yas dgal 'a mo gnas// ting 'dzin na pa
154a2: zhing blags pa na/ / stobs dang byang chub yan lag rnyed mi dka'// yang dag rig dang rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab// de la mngon par shes pa rnyed mi dka'// mtha' yas ye shes rgyal ba mthong ba yang // srid par grub pa
154a3: dag ni rnyed mi dka'/ / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig bsam mi khyab// ting 'dzin 'di 'chad de yis mthong bar 'gyur// de ni rgyal ba de dag thams cad las// ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di yang thos 'gyur te// yang dag rig dang dbang gi
154a4: pha rol phyin/ / sangs rgyas ye shes mchog dang ldan par 'gyur// stong chen gyis ni 'jig rten khams 'di dag/ lha rdzas nor bu rin chen bzang mchog gis// 'og nas bzung ste srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar// nor bu rin chen
154a5: dag gi sa gang gyur dang / / zhing yang mtha' yas rnam mang ji snyed pa// 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser bkram gang ba kun// sa yi 'og nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar// thams cad rgyal ba'i mchog la sbyin pa byin// sems/
154a6: can rnam pa mang po ji snyed pa// bskal pa mtha' yas mang por sbyin pa byin// sangs rgyas rnams la khor mor mi chad byin// byang chub 'dod phyir byin pa'i sbyin tshegs la// dge slong gang dag stong nyid mngon dga' ni
154a7: stobs bcu la ni thal sbyar phyag 'tshal na/ / byang chub sems dpa' stong nyid mngon dga' la// sbyin pa'i phung po snga mas char mi phod// bsod nams ldan pa'i mi des de rnyed nas// sangs rgyas byang chub mtshungs
154a8: med tshol ba'i phyir/ / dad pa rgya cher bskyed nas sbyin pa byin// de yi dpe 'di skyes bu dam pas bstan// su dag ting 'dzin dam pa'i mchog 'di las// tshigs bzhi'i tshigs bcad sems dga' 'dzin pa yang // /

154b1: yi bsod nams phung po bsags pa la// sbyin pa de kun brgya yi char mi phod// ting 'dzin rdul bral zhi ba ma thos par// phan byed byang chub sems dpas sbyin byin kyang // thos pas sangs rgyas ye shes myur thob
154b2: ltar/ de tsam sangs rgyas ye shes myur mi 'thob// gang gis zhi mchogs 'di thos nas su// rdul bral ting 'dzin stong pa'i rigs 'di ni// byang chub sems dpa' dga' bas rtogs byed pa// des ni sangs rgyas ye
154b3: shes myur du 'thob/ / gang gis 'di lta bu yi gter rnyed pa// zhing rnams mtha' yas gang gA'i bye ma snyed// de dag lha dang de bzhin mi rnams kyi// / nor bu rin po che yis gang bar gyur// byang chub sems dpas
154b4: ting 'dzin 'di thob ste/ / rtag tu chub par byed cing mi ngoms pa// thul bar dka' zhing mdzod rnams shin tu mang // nor yang mang zhing rin chen nor dang ldan// ji ltar ting 'dzin rdul bral 'di thob nas// byang chub
154b5: sems dpa' dga' zhing rangs pa ltar/ / rgyal srid shin du 'byor cing rgyas thob kyang // mkhas pa de dag nam yang dgar mi 'gyur// de dang de dag sems rgyas kun mkhyen gyi// chos rnams rtag tu 'dzin par
154b6: byed pa yin/ / zad pa'i mthar thug dus su gyur pa'i tshe// chos kyi tshul mchog rgya cher 'dzin par 'gyur// chos kyi mdzod 'chang blo gros chen po 'chang // thams cad mkhyen pa'i mdzod kyang 'chang ba yin// de dang
154b7: de dag sems can bye mang dang / / khrag khrig chos kyi dbyangs kyis mgu bar byed// de dag tshul khrims nor ldan blo gros can// skyes bu de dag bslabs pa'i nor gyis phyug/ de dang de dag tshul khrims brtul
154b8: zhugs gnas/ / mngon dga' chos kyi sdong po'i myu gu yin// de dag chos gos ngur smrig rin chen 'chang // khyim nas 'byung la rtag tu dga' bar byed// de dag sems can phan phyir mnyam pa med/ thams/

155a1: cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu zhugs// de dag dul ba sems can ma dul 'dul// rtag par dul ba'i gnas dang rjes su ldan// de dag dul zhing rab dul rjes su song // zhi ba'i dbang po rab tu zhi ba yin/ de
155a2: ngag sems can nyal ba gnyid log pa/ / rtag tu chos kyi skad kyis sad par byed// sems can dag ni sad par byas nas su// rin chen chos bzang mchog la 'god par byed// de dang de dag sbyin pa'i bdag po yin// /
155a3: khor mor rtag tu gtong la brkyang ba ste// mkhas pa de dag 'jungs dang 'grogs mi byed// gtong ba chen po dag la rtag tu dga'// de dag sems can dbul zhing sdug bsngal rnams// mthong nas longs spyod kyis kyang tshim
155a4: par byed/ / de dag sems can bde zhing phan pa'i phyir// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rtag par zhugs// de dag ye shes rtag tu bslabs pa ste// chos kyi rnga yang rgya cher shin du rdung // skye bo kun gyi the tshom 'khri shing
155a5: gcod/ rtag par ye shes la yang rab tu zhugs// de dag legs thos chos 'dzin rdul bral ba// 'khor gyi nang du stan la 'dug nas su// mkhas pa blo gros 'chang ba de dag ni// mdo sde bye ba brgya dag rab tu ston//
155a6: de dang de dag mang du thos pa yin// thos pa 'dzin pa sangs rgyas chos rnams 'dzin// chos kyi mdzod rnams shin tu 'dzin byed de// thub pa'i chos kyi gter la dga' ba yin// de dang de dag shes rab yangs
155a7: yin/ dga' ba dag kyang rgya cher rtag tu skyed// zhib cing 'byung bar 'gyur ba blta dka' ba// zhi ba'i chos mchog rnams kyang rab tu ston// de dag chos dang chos min shes pa ste// des shing blo gros ldan pa chos la
155a8: gnas/ chos kyi rgyal srid rab tu ston byed cing // mtshungs med chos kyi mchog la rtag tu spyod// de dag chos kyi mchog la lhur byed de// bla ma la yang ri mo byed par gnas// chos kyi grong khyer mchog la gnas pa ste// /

155b1: blo gros ldan pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng // de dag dregs shing rgyags pa'i sems can rnams// rtag tu zag med pa la gnas pa mthong // rab tu ma rung log pa'i lam bong zhing // 'khor ba'i
155b2: lam la gnas pa mthong nas ni/ / de la byams dang snying rje rgya cher bskyed// dga' dang btang bsnyoms dag la 'angarab gnas te// de dag la ni yan lag brgyad ldan pa// lam mchog zhi ba blta dka' rab tu ston//
155b3: de dang de dag legs byas chos kyi gru// bshams nas 'khor ba'i rgyun du song ba dag/ rgya mtsho chen por lhung zhing khyer ba yin// sems can mang po dag ni sgrol bar byed// byang chub yan lag stobs dang
155b4: dbang po yis/ / go bgos dam pa'i chos kyi grur zhugs nas// pha rol 'gram ba de rtag tu 'jigs med par// khor mor sems can rnams kyang 'god par byed// de dag sman pa'i gtso bo dka' thub la// shin du sbyang
155b5: pa rig byed sman pa'i mchog/ rig pa ye shes rnam grol pha rol phyin// dam pa'i chos kyi rtsi yang sbyin par byed// nad ni rnam pa mang pos btab pa yi// sems can na ba dag kyang mthong nas su// de dag
155b6: la ni chos kyi bkru sman gtong / / chos rnams kyis ni de dag gso ba byed// de dag smra ba pha rol rgol ba 'dzom// 'jig rten dbang po tshig gi dbang phyug ldan// shes bya kun la 'od byed blo gros 'chang // ye shes
155b7: dam pa'i sa la rab tu gnas/ / dpa' bo ye shes stobs ldan stobs 'jom pa// ye shes ldan pa dag gis yang dag bsngags// sems can bye ba khrag khrig mang po dag/ chos la gnas nas shes pas mgu bar
155b8: byed/ de dang de dag bdag po ded dpon te// gsal ba sems can rnams kyi skyabs 'dod pa// sems can rin chen lam la rmongs gyur cing // rtag tu bdud kyi snying zhugs mthong nas ni// de dag la yang lam

156a1: ye shes gtam ni brjod la gang dag gis/ / sems can khrag khrig chos mchog mig thob 'gyur// de dag ye shes bye brag pha rol phyin// lam rnams kyang ni nye bar ston par byed// mkhas pa de dag gi ni/
156a2: sems rnams kyang // bdud rnams bye ba stong gis yod mi shes// ji ltar nam mkha' la ni bya song ba// de yi rjes ni gang du'ang shes mi nus// ye shes stobs ldan dul zhing rab tu zhi// zhi ba 'phags
156a3: ye shes dag la gnas/ / dpa' bo khyu mchog bdud rnams thams cad bcom// byang chub zhi pa mngon par 'tshang yang rgya// rtag tu rdzu 'phrul dag gi pha rol phyin// zhing yang brgya phrag mang por 'gro bar byed// sangs
156a4: rgyas mang po bye ba khrag khrig mthong / / ji bzhin gang gA'i yi ni bye ma snyed// de yi mig kyang thogs par mi 'gyur te// phyogs bcu dag gi gzugs mang mthong bar 'gyur// ji snyed phyogs bcu yi ni srid pa ni// sems
156a5: can yod dgu de dag 'dren par 'gyur/ / bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag mang por ni// de dag de yi phan yon kun brjod cing // spobs pa yi ni rab tu bshad mdzad kyang // sngon gyi spyod pa'i bsngags pa zad mi nus// ting 'dzin
156a6: mtshungs med rdul dang bral ba 'di/ skyes bu sugang 'dzin par byed pa ni// sangs rgyas dag gi nor rnams mi zad de// shin du rgya che ye shes rgya mtsho bzhin// tshul khrims kyi phung po nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste sum bcu
156a7: rtsa bdun pa'o/ / // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa// gzhon nur de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngo mtshar dang // rmad du byung ba'i
156a8: byang chub sems dpa'i chos 'di dag dang / / gzhan yang tshad med pa 'dod pa dang // myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas chos thams cad kyi rang

156b1: chog zhi nying bde/ / rtag par mya ngan 'das pa rab tu ston// mkhas pa dag ni ye shes lam de yis// sems can mang po bye ba rgya 'dren par byed// de dang de dag gnas dang rten du 'gyur// skyabs dang mig dang sgron
156b2: ma byed pa yin/ / 'jigs pa rnams la mi 'jigs rab tu sbyin// skrag pa rnams kyang rtag tu dbugs 'byin byed// de dag sems can shin du sdug bsngal dang // dmus long gyur pa 'di dag rig nas ni// yang dag
156b3: tshul bslabs rin chen chos rnams kyis/ / chos kyi snang ba dag kyang byed par 'gyur// 'jig rten na ni bzo mchog ci yod pa// bzo bo byed pas sems can pa na 'gyur zhing // gang gis sems can rtag tu bder 'gyur ba//
156b4: bzo yi rnam pa de dag shin du bslabs// su dag byang chub tu ni mngon zhugs te// blo gros ldan zhing 'jig rten mig sbyin pa// bslabs pa rnams la mchog gi pha rol phyin// mkhas rab 'jig rten na yang ngo mtshar thob/ sadra
156b5: rgyas dag gi chos mchog thos pa yis/ / mtshungs pa med pa ngoms par yod mi 'gyur// tshul khrims bzod dang ting 'dzin pha rol phyin// mtsho yin mo mas nyi 'o// de gzhi ba zhi ma chos rnams ni/ gnan pa ston ngos mi re/ 4
156b6: pa'i thabs kyi char yang ra ba 'bebs shing / / chos kyis skyes bu dag ni tshim par byed// de yi drung du sems can mang po ni// chos 'dod mkhas pa ji snyed lhags nas su// chos mchog bzang po dam pa rin po che//
156b7: dra zhing gsal ba'i lam rnams mnyan snyam pa// de dag blo gros 'chang bas the tshom bcad// chos kyis de dag shin du mgu bar byed// tshul khrims bzod dang ting 'dzin pha rol phyin// sems can rnams kyi
156b8: bsam pa rab tu shes/ / ye shes ldan zhing ye shes mchog rab kyi// pha rol phyin pa sems can bas ma la mkhas// sems can pha rol sems dang spyod pa dang // gang dag gtam ni ci 'dra'i chos brjod pa// /

157a1: bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par smras pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan par bya// gzung bar bya/ bcad par bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ rab tu 'don par bya// lung mnad cang kha ton bya// nan mongs pa med
157a2: par sgom pas bsgom par bya/ / gzhan la yang rgya cher rab tu bstan par bya// des bzod pa'i stobs pasgom par bya// bzod pa bstan par bya/ mang du bya/ chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos 'dod pa dang / chos yongs
