224a4: dpa' gang la la ting nge 'dzin 'di la dad de/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyi bsnyen bkur byas
224a5: pa bas byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang ting nge 'dzin 'di la mchog tu 'jug na de de bas bsod nams ches grangs med par skyed do/ / 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig gis bskal pa khrir dkon
224a6: mchog gsum la dbul ba phul ba bas byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang gis rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin 'da'i ming thos te/ / thos nas kyang tha na yud tsam zhig nyan 'dod par gyur
224a7: na de de bas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thob par byed pa'i bsod nams ches grangs med par skyed par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// dran pa
224a8: ldan zhing blo gros ldan/ / shes rab ldan pa mi 'jigs pa// de ni tshe rabs thams cad du// byang chub spyad pa spyod par 'gyur// sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab mdzes pa// skad cig gcig la mnyes byed na/ gang dag

224b1: ngas ni sngon bshad pa/ / mi kho ma brgyad rnams rnam par spong // gzugs dang kha dog phun sum tshogs// mtshan rnams kyis kyang legs par brgyan// mthu stobs dang yang rab tu ldan// le lo 'dod par yod mi 'gyur//
224b2: skyid cing nor yang chen por 'gyur// bsod nams ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul che// 'jig rten snang byed mthong nas kyang // phyi phyir zhing ni mchod pa byed// bdag med stong pa thos nas kyang // de ni chos la mi rmongs te// chos rnams rje
224b3: bzhin mkhas pa ni/ / dad pa myung du rab tu thob// rigs kyi mchog dang mod pa dang // snying pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur// byin pa'i bdag po dpa' bor 'gyur// sang snga med cing lkug par gtong // gang dag la la'ajamaching /
224b4: du khyad par 'phags pa'i mdzes par rigs// der ni brten pa skyes pa dang // smad pa'i 'gro bar ma yin dang // skye ba kun du 'di lta bur// khyim bdag dbang cher grags pa dang / dpal dadag zi brjid 'phags pa yang /
224b5: tshul 'dir yi rang spyad par 'gyur// bram pa sA la che 'drab// tshul khrims ldan dang mang thos 'gyur// rgyal rigs sAl che 'drab// sgyid cing nor yang chen por 'gyur// bsod nams mdzod kyis thags pa yi//
224b6: rgyal po rdzu 'phrul cher 'gyur te// rgya mtshor bcas dang rir bcas kyi// sa la chos kyis ston par 'gyur// rin chen bdun gyi dbang phyug che// 'khor los sgyur ba rgyal dbang 'gyur// rgyal por gnas nas sangs rgyas
224b7: la khyi byung sti stang byed par 'gyur / / shi 'phos nas ni mtho ris 'gro// sangs rgyas bstan la dad par 'gyur// ri rab rtse mo'i dbang phyug po// lha yi dbang po brgya byin 'gyur// lha dbang 'thab thal rab tu 'gyur/
224b8: bzhin yongs su dga' ldan 'gyur// lha dbang rab tu 'phrul pa dang // dbang byed 'jigs pa med par 'gyur// tshul 'dir yi rang byas pa ni// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten tshangs pa'i mchog/ mkhas pa lnga rnams

225a1: ba yis/ mchod pa bya ba'i dbang phyug 'gyur// gang zhig mdo sde dkon mchog 'dir// phyi phyir rjes su yi rang na// sus kyang de yi yon tan mtha'// brjod par nus pa ma yin no// byang chub tu ni sems
225a2: bskyed na/ / bskal pa bye ba rnams su yang // nam du'ang long theng mi 'gyur te// ston pa bla na med par 'gyur// rtswa shing ri dang sdong po dang // 'khri shing sman yang de bzhin te// me tog 'bras ldan ljon shing yang // gang du 'gro/
225a3: bar 'dud par 'gyur// mar me mdzad nas bzung nas su// brtul zhugs bzang po gang 'gro bar// phyogs bcu dag gi 'jig rten khams// mtha' yas 'od kyis snang bar byed// gang dag 'das pa'i bar de dang // gang
225a4: dag ma 'ongs shing rnams kyi/ / me tog 'bras bu lo ma dag/ de dag rnam par shes par nus// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong dang // khrag khrig phrag brgya rnams kyis kyang // de dag gi ni yon tan mtha'// brjod par nus pa/
225a5: ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag ni// mdo 'di phyir zhing mos byed pa// de yi bsngags pa'i phreng ba yi// mtha' ma brjod par mi nus so// mdo sde yon tan gang brjod par/ de dag thams cad de dang ldan// de bas
225a6: rab tu lhag yod de/ / de yi yon tan mtha' thug med// mi gang de la dga' bar mi byed cing // yod pa min dang bsngags pa mi smra dang // mi gang khros nas mi snyan smra ba'am// yang na de la 'khrug pa byed pa dag/ sems
225a7: can dmyal bar skye 'gyur te/ / lus ni chen por gyur nas su// de ni sdug bsngal myong 'gyur te// yid rab mi bde ma rung 'gyur// dpag tshad lnga brgya'i tshad tsam du// de yi lus ni skye bar 'gyur// sdig pa'i las
225a8: kyis rtag tu yang / / bye bas bskor nas za bar 'gyur// bskal pa dag ni du mar yang // lus ni dpag tshad lnga brgyar 'gyur// de la mgo yang lnga brgya ste// de las nyung bar mi 'gyur ro// mgo rnams re re dgal

225b1: yang / lnga brgya'i lce las mi nyung ste// lce gcig la yang thod shol ni// lnga brgyar tshad ste mi nyung ba// 'bar bas de la rmo byed de// skur 'debs sdig pa'i las kyis so// tshig rtsub dag ni smras pas na// shin du tsha bar
225b2: sreg par 'gyur/ / gang dag sdom par mi byed cing // byang chub sems dpa' gnod byed pa// de ni sems can dmyal skye ste// / dud 'gro skye gnas 'gro bar 'gyur// tshul 'di spong bar byed pa ni// bskal pa bye ba stong rnams
225b3: dang / brgya dang khrag khrig rnams su yang // mnar med par ni sdug bsngal rnyed// de nas shi 'phos rab sdug cing // shin du mi bzad sbrul du 'gyur// bkres shing skom pas mngon gzir kyang // shin du mi bzad las rnams
225b4: byed/ bza' ba rnyed kyang sdig pa yis// nam yang tshim par mi 'gyur ro// gal te de nas shi 'phos nas// mi yi nang du skye na yang // yid mi gzhungs shing dmus long 'gyur// gnod par sems shing sdom pa med//
225b5: nyes pa'i tshig rnams smras nas ni// 'phags pa mnyes par mi byed pa// mi yi nang nas shi 'phos nas// slar yang ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su// nam yang sangs rgyas mthong mi 'gyur//
225b6: gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' la// gnod par byed pa rab bsdams dang // gang zhig chos dang ldan pa yi// chos smra de dag srang byed pa// ngan 'gro rnams ni kun spangs nas// brgya byin rdzu 'phrul chen por 'gyur// tshangs pa
225b7: 'thab bral dga' ldan dang / / dbang byed par yang de 'gyur ro// gal te mir ni gyur na yang // rtag tu 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur// tshong dpon dang ni khyim bdag 'gyur// rtag tu skyid cing nor cher 'gyur// ji ltar gang gA'i phye
225b8: snyed kyi/ bskal pa de snyed rtag tu yang // 'jigs med dran pa phun sum tshogs// bde dang ldan zhing gnod pa med// tshe rabs tshe rabs phyi phyir zhing // rtag tu sangs rgyas mchod par 'gyur// blo ldan gang zhig sangs rgyas la//

226a1: bskal pa de snyed mchod pa bas// phyi dus chos ni 'jig pa na// gang dag mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa// chos gang 'jig rten mgon po yis// bstan pa'i mdo sde 'di la des// nyin zhag gcig tu bzung ba yi// de ni
226a2: bsod nams khyad par 'phags/ / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa// de dag kun la mchod par 'gyur// mdo sde 'di 'dra 'dzin pa ni// gang dag ma 'ongs sangs rgyas dang // 'das pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag dang / de dag
226a3: de yis mchod par 'gyur/ / 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig rab kyi zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la gnod sems dang // tha ba dang khro ba skyed
226a4: dam/ 'dum par mi byed dam// brnyas thabs gang yang ru nga bas brnyas te/ ngan pa'i rigs su skyes pa zhe 'am// rnyed pa chung ba zhe 'am// yid gzhungs pa nur zhe 'am/ shes rab chung ba zhes brnyas sam ci yang rung ste/ tshul
226a5: khrims kyi yan lag nyams pa zhe 'am/ mdog ngan pa zhe 'am// gzugs dang mi ldan pa zhe 'am/ gzi brjid chung pa zhes brnyas sam// tha na yung tsam zhig khros te lta na yang de mi dge ba'i las des bskal pa bye ba
226a6: grangs med pa chad par ngan song rnams su sreg par 'gyur ro/ / 'jam dpal ngas ni ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' la khong khro ba'i sems gcig bskyed pa las kha na ma tho ba che ba'i chos de lta bu gcig kyang ma mthong ngo // /
226a7: 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad la mtshon gyis btab bam// dbyug pas brdegs pa bas rigs kyi bu 'am/
226a8: rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang gis theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la tha na gnod sems mam// tha ba 'am/ zhe sdang gi sems gcig bskyed dam/ khros te brnyas pa'i sems bskyed na de de bas sdig pa

226b1: ches mang du skyed do/ / 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' la khong khro ba'i sems bskyed pa 'am/ brnyas pa'i sems skyed pa ji tsam pa de snyed kyi bskal par byang chub sems dpa' des sems
226b2: can dmyal ba rnams su gnas par go cha bgo bar bya'o/ / 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' la skur ba btab pa ma gtogs par/ byang chub sems dpa' las gzhan gang gis kyang log par ltung bar byed mi nus so//
226b3: 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na nor bu rin po che rdo rje ni rdo rje nyid ma gtogs par shing ngam/ bong ba 'am/ dbyug pa 'am// rdo ba 'am// mtshon chas gcag par mi nus so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems
226b4: dpa' yang byang chub sems dpa' la skar ba btab pa ma gtogs par las gzhan gyis log par ltung bar byed mi nus so/ / 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las lha'i bskal
226b5: pa bye bar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re rer 'khor bzhi la ci 'dod pa sbyin pa byin pa bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gzhan gyis// 'thun par bya ba'i don du g.yos// de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag
226b6: pa'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa ni g.yung drung ngo zhes tshig du smra na yang de de bas chas bsod nams grangs med par bskyed do// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la las lha lo stong du dkon mchog gsum la ci rigos
226b7: pa byin pa bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang gzhan zhig tha na sa gol gtogs pa srid du 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o// 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal po'o/ 'du byed thams cad ni stong pa'o// 'du byed thams cad ni bdag
226b8: med pa'o/ / snyam du dpyod na de de bas bsod nams ches grangs med par bskyed do// chos kyi rnams grangs 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu brgyad stong ni byang chub tu sems pamyed do// dge slong ma lnga brgya ni theg pa gcig tu yang dag

227a1: par 'dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ / byang chub sems dpa' stong nyis brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod par 'gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu gas so// chos
227a2: kyirnam grangs 'di dang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir steng gi bar snang las lha'i me tog/ ud pal dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po rnams kyi char chen po yang rab tu bab bo// na dan
227a3: thul gyi snying po'i spos kyi char chen po yang mngon par rab tu bab bo/ / gos kyi char dang rin po che'i char dang rgyan gyi char chen po yang rab tu bab po// 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med brjod du med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed
227a4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis de'i tshe/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re res kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi lag pa mngon par sprul te/ lag par
227a5: res kyang lha'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad tsam grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med pa'i gdugs kyi sprin dang / rgyal mtshan gyi sprin dang ba dan gyi sprin dang / me tog gi sprin dang tsan dan sbrul
227a6: gyi snying po'i sprin dang / rgyan gyi sprin dang seng ge'i rgyal mtshan zla ba'i sprin dang / nor bu rin po che snang ba thams cad bsags pa'i sprin dang / nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i sprin rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la
227a7: pod do/ / com nan 'das k+Sha thub pa la yang gtong ci mngon par gtor nas tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das legs par gsungs so// bde bar gshegs pas legs par gsungs te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jig rten du ringadu
227a8: gnas par gyur cig ces smras so/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang / lha'i bu mo bye khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med bsam byas

227b1: mi khrab/ gzhal du med brjod du med pa rnams kyis kyang lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang man dA ra ba chen po dang / many+dzu Sha ka dang yi dga' dang pa ru sha ka dang ta ra Ni dang bal ba ki dang / ko ta ra Na dang dri mchog dang d+haN+Da ska ri de ba
227b2: dang ud bal dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po dang / me tog 'khor lo dang 'khor lo chen po la sogs pa lha'i me tog gi char chen po rab tu phab po// lha'i gos dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyi char rab tu
227b3: pab po/ lha'i tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i char dang rin po che sprin gyi char dang rgyan gyi sprin gyi char rab tu phab po// brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong babrang ba las shin du 'das pa grangs med pas
227b4: kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'dzam bu'i gling gi tshad tsam gyi me tog gi sprin dang / gos kyi sprin dang rin po che'i sprin gyi char rab tu bab po// de bzhin du klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang /
227b5: nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du med/ tshad med pa dag gis kyang lha'i me tog gi char dang / spos dang gos dang rin po che'i char mngon
227b6: par phab ste/ lha'i rol mo'i dbyangs sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa byas nas tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das legs par gsungs so// bde bar gshegs pas legs par gsungs te/ kye ma'o bdag cag gis mngon
227b7: ma thos pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos so/ / kye ma'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par gyur cig ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
227b8: pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa dag dang / bzang skyong la sogs pa dge bsnyen stong phrag dpag tu med pa dag dang nyan thos chen po dag dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang driHdang

228a1: lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci dang lho 'phye chen pa brgya phrag grangs med pa dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// phags pa rab tu zhi ba rnam par ngas
228a2: cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang da na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas
228a3: gtan la phab pa/ / // rgya ga skang du/ Ar+ya pA mo ba ma sa mAd+hinA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du// 'phags pa sgyu ma lte bu'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang pa// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
228a4: dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer bA rA na sIn drang srong lhung ba ri dgas kyi nags na/ dgra bcom pa nyi khri'i dge slong gi dag 'dun chen po dang / byang chub
228a5: sems dpa' khri nyis stong la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po sang ka'i seng ge dang // seng ge'i blo gros dang legs par gnas pa'i blo gros dang / dpe med blo gros dang sa 'dzin dang mes byin dang chu lha dang / dkon
228a6: mchog 'byung gnas dang / phug sbas dang bzang skyong dang glog lha dang rnam par snang byed dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / ye shes 'byung gnas dang brtson pa mi gtor dang / mthong ba don yod dang byang chub sems dpa'
228a7: sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa khri nyis stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ / lha'i bu mtshams bzang dang legs par gnas pa'i blo gros la sogs pa thams cad kyang zag pa chen po yang dag par zhugs pa nyi khri dang
228a8: yang thabs gcig go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po stan las langs

228b1: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu
228b2: ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gas
228b3: nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas dris pa lung bstan pa'i phyir/ rtag
228b4: skabs phyes pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ / de skad
228b5: ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla
228b6: na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob cing / ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba
228b7: yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar lus mngon par sprul nas sems can rnams kyi mos pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston pa dang / ci nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshar rgya
228b8: bar 'gyur ba lags/ / de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying popa 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po legs so legs so//

229a1: pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod ni 'di ltar sngon gyi rgya ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsten bkur byas pa ste/ khyod 'di ltar sems can thams/
229a2: cad la snying brtse ba dang / snying rje bar zhugs pas pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni legs so// pad ma'i dpal gyi snying ngo //
229a3: khyod de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan//
229a4: 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po chos gcig dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
229a5: chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob cing ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de lta de sa pa
229a6: lus mngon par sprul nas/ sems can rnams kyi mos pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston pa dang / ci nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// chos gcig po
229a7: gang zhe na/ pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khams gsum pa thams cad la mi gnas pa yin te/ nang ngam phyi rol la gnas par mi byed do// de gnas pa med pas yang dag pa mthong bar 'gyur ro//
229a8: yang dag pa mthong bas yang dag pa la sbyor bar 'gyur ro// yang dag pa la sbyor bas ci la yang blo thogs par mi 'gyur ro// de blo thogs pa med pas yang dag pa'i bya ba la spyod do// yang dag pa'i bya ba la spyod pa de gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/

229b1: chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ste/ chos gang yang ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin no// chos thams cad ni rkyen las 'byung ba ste/ rkyen med par 'byung ba'i chos ni gang yang med do// chos gang rten cing 'brel bar
229b2: 'byung ba de ni ma skyes pa'o/ / de ltar na chos thams cad ni skye ba med pa ste/ chos thams cad ma skyes par rtogs par gyur pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam la 'jug pa rtogs pa 'thob bo// 'di ltar sems can thams cad la
229b3: phan pa'i dngos po dang / snying rje'i sems kyi rjes su 'jug pa rab tu 'thob bo// de de ltar mos pas chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur baHshes so// chos thams cad ni yongs su brtags pas sprul pa ste/ yongs su
229b4: brtags pa de yang shin du stong pa'o/ / chos thams cad stong par rtogs pa de ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba/ de ra
229b5: lus mngon par sprul nas sems can rnams kyi mos paji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston pa dang / ci nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ ba
229b6: ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa gang la la dag 'khor
229b7: 'dir 'dus pa lta mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'khor 'di na bsams bzhin du go cha bgos pa gang dag sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa skyes bu dam pa drug bcu yod do// byang chub
229b8: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa drug bcu po dag sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gis

230a1: 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa lags sam/ 'on kyang 'jig tan gyi khams gzhan dgan ga dang sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa'i skyes budam pa dag kyang mchis/ bcom ldan
230a2: 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub kyi phyogs cha logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya ba yod de// de na de bzhin gshegs
230a3: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho ning gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces
230a4: bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob ces bya ba dang gnyis ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa yin te/ pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po skyes bu dam pa de gnyis las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
230a5: gang gzhan dag/ nub bdun du 'dri ba'i lan nyan pa de dag sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad
230a6: ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sgyum lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mang du mchis so// de ci'i slang du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing
230a7: derer skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bsgrim mi 'tshal bar skyes bu dam pa de gnyis las chos 'dri ba'i lan nyan pa'i slad du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad ma'i dpal gyi snying
230a8: po ji skar zer ba de de bzhin te/ de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa dag ni tshad med grangs med do// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub

230b1: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ji lta bu'i sems kyi mtshan
230b2: ma bstan pas/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed 'dir 'chi bar 'gyur ba dang / bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
230b3: 'od dpag med de yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas gda' bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa legs par mdzad du gsol/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa de gnyis sangs rgyas
230b4: zhing 'dir mchis na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis las chos 'dri ba'i lan thos pas// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting
230b5: nge 'dzin kyang thob par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de yang mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang
230b6: rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam 'debs pa dang / der skyes mtha bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
230b7: las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas// mdzod spu nas 'od rab tu bkye ste/ 'od des stong
230b8: gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gser gyi kha dog gi snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/ / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ ri'i tshogs dang shing ljon pa dang ri'i rgyal po rib rab dang / ri

231a1: btang zung dang btang zung chen po dang khor yug dang khor yug chen po gang dag yod pa dang / gang dag 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun nag de dag thams cad kyang gser gyi kha dog gi snang ba des khyab par gyur to// nyi ma dang
231a2: zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba/ 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa 'di dag kyang mig gi dbang po la snang bar ma gyur to// nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong las thal nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams
231a3: bde ba can de thams cad gser gyi kha dog gi snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/ / de nas 'od de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/
231a4: lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar mi snang bar gyur to// de nas gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can der skyes pa'i sems can rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang nyan thos chen po de dag
231a5: g is kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di mthong zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis
231a6: bltas pa de yang mthong ste/ dper na skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu lag mthil du bzhag pa ltar mthong nas/ de dag dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba rgya cher skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
231a7: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig de skad kyang brjod do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i
231a8: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gang dag 'dus pa dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang

231b1: mi ma yin pa dang / brgya byin dang mangs pa dang 'jig rten stong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba na de nga de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs par
231b2: sangs rgyas 'od dpag mad byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis 'dun gyis bltas te/ ri'i rgyal po bzhin du 'bar ba de dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing da yang
231b3: sa ler mthong ste/ / 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu mig dang ldan pas/ mdam gad tsam gyi phyogs na skyes bu gcig shos kyi bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor bstim mi dgos par mthong ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang
231b4: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med mthong ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can yon tan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas gang ba yon tan
231b5: gyi dko pa chen po dang ldan pa de yang snang ngo / / mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med/
231b6: la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig de skad kyang brjod do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag par bstan pa mdzad pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'din sngon sems ma bskyed pa'i srog chags brgyad khri bzhi skyong bla na med pa yang dag
231b7: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ / 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo'o// 'jig rten gyi khams da
231b8: ba can de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang nyan thos chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis/ / 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di mthong nas/ ngo mtshar du gyur te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

232a1: g shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
232a2: sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhes kyang brjod do/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang nyan thos chen po de dag gis tshig de brjod ma thag tu de'i tshe/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
232a3: de rnam pa drug tu 'gul/ / rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul// g.yos rab tu g.yos// kun du rab tu g.yos/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun du rab tu ldeg/ 'ur 'u ra/ rab tu'ur 'u ra/ kun du rab tu 'ur 'ur/ 'khrugs rab
232a4: tu 'brags/ kun du rab tu 'khrugs/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun du rab tu chem che ma mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa'
232a5: sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med gal ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
232a6: bos phyag 'tshal te/ zhes dang bcas par phyogs / cig tu 'khod do// skyes bu dam pa de gnyis phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
232a7: 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i mthu bstan pa brnyes pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
232a8: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i mtshan brjod pa tsam gyis sems pa ma mchis pa'i dogs 'di yang rnam badra

232b1: g.yos pa'i slad du'o/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis skyes bu dam pa de gnyis la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
232b2: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i mtshan brjod par ma zad kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du ma dag na yang bcom ldan 'das de'i mtshan yongs su rjod do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing
232b3: de dag thams cad kyang 'od des reg pas rnam pa drug du rab tu g.yos so/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i mtshan thos nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yong/
232b4: su rdzogs par 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de las byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bzhi bcu bcom ldan 'das de
232b5: bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i mtshan thos so/ / thos nas kyang de dag thams cad 'dus nas mgrin gcig tu dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o// de dag kyang bcom
232b6: ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par lung bstan to/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de la/ byang chub
232b7: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
232b8: p a des sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i 'od 'di btang ba rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pam 'di ltar yid du mchis

233a1: dang / 'di ltar blta na sdug pa'i 'od mi gtong na gang gi slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des 'di ltar yid du mche ba dang / 'di ltar bltaran sdug pa'i 'od bkye ba 'di'i rgyu ni gang lags
233a2: rkyen ni ci lags/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis skyes bu dam pa de gnyis la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/ rgyu med rkyen med par
233a3: bcom ldan 'das des 'di ltar yid du 'ong ba dang / 'di ltar blta na sdug pa'i 'od mi bkye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de
233a4: deng byang chub sems dpa' 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rin po che bsgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs ston par 'gyur te/ de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa des chos bstan pa de'i snga ltas su 'di ltar yid du 'ong
233a5: ba dang / 'di ltar blta na sdug pa'i 'od 'di bkye'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
233a6: gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
233a7: shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang chos bstan pa de yang mnyan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchi'o// bka'
233a8: stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de khyod nyid las brtsams te/ chos ston par 'gyur gyis de'i dus la bab par shes pa/ khyed deng shig ces skabs phye bas/ de nas

233b1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i nyen
233b2: 'khor na 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bzhi bcu po rnams la smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dag tshur shog/ khyed kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
233b3: shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos bstan pa de yang mnyan pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der 'dod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
233b4: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gzhan dang gzhan dag na yod pa spangs nas/ smon lam dang thugs rje chen pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon
233b5: mongs pa can der byung ste/ sems can dman pa la mos pa 'dod chags kyi shas che ba/ zhe sdang gi shas che ba// gti mug gi shas che ba rnams kyi nang du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
233b6: sangs rgyas pa ni dka' ba mdzad pa'i phyir ro/ / skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis/ tshig 'di smras ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad lhan cig 'dus nas/
233b7: mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de'i mtshan thos pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags na/ gang dag gis sha'i mig
233b8: gis de mngon sum du mthong la mthong nas kyang dang ba rnyed pa dag lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub

234a1: pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang bstan bkur bgyi ba dang / chos bstan pa de yang mnyan pa'i slad du 'jig rten gyi ba mi mdzod der mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rig kyi bu dag khyed de'i
234a2: dus la dbab par shes ni nga shig de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgya
234a3: bcu rtsa bzhis yongs su bskor te/ mdun du bdar nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de nas dong ngo // de nas de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag
234a4: brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi po de dag thams cad re re la yang khang pa brtsegs pa bye ba phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi sprul pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas so/ / khang pa brtsegs pa de dag kyang gru bzhi lham pa
234a5: ka ba bzhi zug pa/ cha mnyam par legs par rnam par phye ba legs par zin pa sha stag go// khang pa brtsegs pa re re yang 'phang du ni dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ rgyar ni dag na brgyad do// khang pa brtsegs pa dag gser
234a6: las byas pa dag kyang yod dngul las byas pa dag kyang yod/ bai dUr+ya las byas pa dag kyang yod/ shel las byas pa dag kyang yod/ mu tig dmar po dang rdo'i snying po dang / spug las byas pa dag kyang yod do// rin po che
234a7: gser dang dngul dang sna gnyis pa dag kyang yod/ rin po che gser dang dngul dang bai dUr+ya dang sna gsum pa dag kyang yod rin po che gser dang dngul dang bai dUr+ya dang shel dang sna bzhi pa dag kyang yod/ rin po che ga ser dang du/
234a8: dang bai dUr+ya dang shel dang mu tig/ dmar po dang sna lnga pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ rin po che gas ra dang dngul dang bai dUr+ya dang shel dang mu tig dmar po dang spug dang sna drug pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang

234b1: yod/ rin po che gser dang dngul dang bai dUr+ya dang shel dang mu tig dmar po dang spug dang rdo'i snying po dang sna bdun pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ tsan dan dmar po las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs padag
234b2: kyang yod/ / tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po las byas pa dag kyang yod/ a ga ru dang tsan dan las byas pa dag kyang yod/ a ga ru nag po dang tsan dan las byas pa dag kyang yod// tsan ngan thams cad las byas pa'i khang
234b3: pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod me tog ud pal dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ sna ma'i me tog dang par sha ka dang tsam pa ka dang / s+yA sAr dang / a ti mug tu
234b4: ka dang ta ra ni dang go ta ra ni las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ me tog da nu ska ri las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ me tog man dA ra dang man dA ra chen po las byas pa'i khar pa brtsegs pa dag
234b5: kyang yod/ me tog pa ru sha ka dang pa ru sha ka chen po dang many+dzu Sha ka dang many+dzu Sha ka chen po dang / mdog mdzes dang mdo/ mdzes chen po dang / me tog 'khor lo dang 'khor lo chen po dang kun du 'khor lo dang / shin du mdzes
234b6: pa'i 'khor lo dang me tog zla ba dang zla ba chen po dang / shin du mdzes pa'i zla ba dang zla ba mchog dang / sbrul dang sgra la chen po dang / shin du mdzes pa'i sgra la las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ me tog tham/
234b7: cad las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod kha dog dum pa kha dog sna tshogs kha dog brgya stong du ma pa dkra ba/ blta na sdug pa yongs su dag pa/ 'od gsal ba dag kyang yod do// khang pa brtsegs pa re rar yang
234b8: lha'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul te/ de na lha'i bu mo kha cig gi lag na dung dang rnga bo che dang rdza rnga dang khar rnga dang pi bad rgyud gcig pa dang / glu dbyangs sgra snyan pa dang / gling bu dang rgyud can bi bang dang pi bang brgyud gsum

235a1: pa rnams thogs te/ sel snyan dang gra byangs dang ram mo'i sgra skad rnam pa mang po de lta bul na cang 'bod do// lha'i bu mo kha cig ni can dan dmar zan phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'bod do// lha'i bu mo cig na/
235a2: tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do// lha'i bu mo kha cig ni a ga ru dang tsan dan gyi phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do// lha'i bu mo kha cig ni a ga ru nag po dang tsan dan gyi phye ma'i phur ma thogs
235a3: shing 'khod do/ / lha'i bu mo kha cig ni tsan dan thams cad kyi phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do// lha'i bu mo kha cig ni ud pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po'i me tog gi phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do
235a4: lha'i bu mo kha cig ni me tog man dA ra dang man dA ra chen po dang ba ru sha ka dang ba ru sha ka chen po dang many+dzu Sha ka dang many+dzu Sha ka chen po dang / modag shog mdzes dang mdog mdzes chen po dang / me tog 'khor lo dang 'khor lo chen
235a5: po dang / kun du 'khor lo dang shin du mdzes pa'i 'khor lo dang / me tog zla ba dang zla ba chen po dang / shin du mdzes pa'i zla ba da zla ba mchog dang / sA la dang sbrul chen po dang shin du mdzes pa'i sgra la'i me tog gi phye ma'i
235a6: phur ma thogs shing 'khod do/ / lha'i bu mo kha cig ni me tog thams cad dang bdug pa dang spos dang me tog phreng dang byug pa dang phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do// khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang bkod pa chen po'i
235a7: seng ge'i khri la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mngon par sprul to/ / khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang mu tig dkar po dang mu tig dmar po dang
235a8: mu tig mthon ka'i mu tig gi phreng ba brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to/ / khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang lha'i ras bcos bu'i rgyal mtshan gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas g.yogs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong

235b1: mngon par sprul to/ / khang pa brtsegs pa re rerang yang spos kyi phur ma brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to// khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang gdug ga dod dugadog sngags pa/ kha dog brgya stong du ma bkrab/ blta na sdug pa
235b2: legs par las su byas pa/ dbyibs shin du legs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to// khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang shing ta la'i phre ba brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to// khang pa brtsegs pa re rang yang
235b3: rin po che'i shing ljon pa brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to/ / khang pa brtsegs pa re rar yang dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba gang dag rlung gis bskyod pa na 'di lta bu'i sgra dag 'byung ba 'di lta ste dper na/ lha'i sil snyan
235b4: y an lag bye ba brgya stong dang ldan pa mkhas pa dag gis legs par blangs nas sgra 'byung ba de bzhin du dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba de dag kyang rlung gis bskyod na sgra snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba brgyad khri bzhi stong
235b5: mngon par sprul to/ / khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang rdzing bu gzhi gser gyi bye ma bdal ga bai dUr+ya dang shel gyis sbas pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi kha khyer gyis bskor ba/ me tog ud pa la dang pad ma dang ku mud dang
235b6: pad ma dkar pos gang ba/ dur bsgra 'byin pa yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba/ bya rog gis btung du rung bar mu dang khang chad du gang ba dag sprul to// khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang rin po che'i shing ljon
235b7: ba'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis bskor to/ / rin po che'i skud pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gis kun nas dkris so// rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa re rer 'od kyis kyang dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong du snang bar gyur to// de bzhin du
235b8: khar pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyi bkod pa dag so sor byas so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyis/

236a1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi khang pa brdegs pa bkod pa ji snyed yod pa/ khang pa brtsegs pa de dag thams cad kyi nang na bkod pa chen po gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad khang
236a2: pa brtsegs pa re rer mngon par sprul to/ / snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang de ltar bkod pa rnams mngon par sprul nas/ bkod pa de lta bu des byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad khri ba'i
236a3: stong dang lhan cig tu 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las btung ba dang / brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba
236a4: can de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyis de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas pas/ 'jig rten
236a5: kyi khams mi mjed 'di lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par gyur pa/ de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang khang pa brtsegs pa bye ba phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi
236a6: bzhis yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar nas/ yon tan gyi bkod pa chen po dang ldan pas shin lhag ge'o// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi 'od kyis kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na
236a7: bas khyab par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gal ba der dong ste phyin nas// bcom ldan 'das
236a8: bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs sasangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ / lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig du 'khod nas/

236b1: skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis tshig 'thun par sgra dbyangs gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// gzi brjid ma tshungs med yon tan phung po gcig la phyag 'tshal lo// drang/
236b2: srong chen po kun mkhyen yon tan kun gyi pha rol gshegs// thams cad zil gnon srid pa gsum gyi chags pa'i lam las 'das// shAkya khyu mchog dri bral zla ba'i zhal la phyag 'tshal lo// nyi ma dri med lta bu'i sku dang /
236b3: ldan pa rnam par mdzes/ mtshan mchog gsum bcu rtsa gnyis dag gi go cha mnabs gyur cing / dpe byad bzang po rnams kyis spras pa 'jig rten kun tu gas pa/ mi mchog khyod mtshungs 'jig rten gsum na gang yang yid ma
236b4: mchis/ bde bar gshegs pa'i sku yi 'od kyis gang tshe reg gyur pa/ de tshe 'jig rten nyi ma zla ba nor bu zhugs rnams dang / brgya byin tshangs pa lha dang de bzhin mi ci rnams kyi 'od/ snag tsha'i phung po bzhin du mog mog mi
236b5: sdang gsal ma mchis/ rgyal bzhing gcig na ni yang dag bzhugs par gda' bzhin du/ 'gro ba'i don du skad cig gcig gis mtha' yas zhing du gshegs// ston pa'i bzhud dang byon pa 'tshal ba su yang yod ma mchis//
236b6: mdzad pa dag dang 'dul ba sna tshogs dag gis sems can 'dul// spu yi khung gcig nang du mtha' yas zhing rnams ston mdzad kyang / 'phel ba dang ni bri bar gyur pa gang yang yod ma mchis// 'di ni ji bzhin las dang byed pa
236b7: rgyu dang 'bras gda' la/ / sems can rnams la gnod pa ma mchis 'dres par gyur ma mchis/ gdan sems can dmyal ba dud 'gro yi dgas ma mchis shing / rgyal ba'i sras po grags pa chen po dag gis yongs gang la/
236b8: mi khom brgyad po dag dang bral te mchog tu nyams dga' ba'i// yongs dag zhing de dag kyang mi mchog la lam ston pa mdzad// lha mi gang dag mi 'jigs bag ma mchis pa bskrad slad du/ sems dmyal dud 'gro yi dgas 'a

237a1: ba shin du mi bzad pa'i/ / kun nas nyon mongs zhing rnams la la dag kyang bstan mdzad nas// de dag thams cad bde bar gshegs la skyabs su nye bar ma chi// zhing gzhan la la dag kyang nam mkha' lta bur ston
237a2: par mdzad/ / de bzhin gzhan yang zhugs kyis bltam zhing me lce 'khrugs pa dang // zhing gzhan dag kyang chab kyis yongs su bltam par ston pa mdzad/ rnam 'phrul 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yul lags so// /
237a3: 'dul ba'i don du gzugs kyis rnam pa mtha' yas ston mdzad pa// la lar 'dod pa'i dbang phyug 'od chags gzugs dang ldan par gyur// tshangs pa'i bdag po mchog tu zhi ba'i ting 'dzin rnyed pa dang // sum bcu rtsa
237a4: gsum dbang phyug mig stong rdo rje 'bar ba dang / / srog chags brgya phrag mang po rab tu dga' bas mchod bgyid cing // dge ba bcu po dag gis sems can mtha' yas 'dul bgyid pa// blon po tshong dpon dag dang bka' la gtogs
237a5: pa'i gtsor gyur cing / / shin du 'jigs med dgra tshogs phab nas chad pas mi gcod la// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis pos sems can rnams ni sdud bgyid cing // rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam la sems can rab tu 'jog
237a6: bgyid pa/ bsod nams las kyis rin chen bdun dang ldan par gyur pa yi// gling bzhi dag gi dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba dag tu gyur// 'jig rten 'di na la lar bltam pa lta bur ston mdzad de// dogs la ni gos
237a7: pa bdun dag thor zhing bshegs nas kyang / nga ni skyes nas skye dang 'chi ba'i tha mar dbyung ngo zhes/ ling 'ong yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gsung mchog brjod pa mdzad// mar me mdzad patsun chad dri mthams cad srang
237a8: lags kyang / / 'gro rnams sangs rgyas ye shes mchog lo yongs smin mdzad slad du// la lar sems can dag pa btsun mo'i 'khor na bzhugs par gda'// mi yi dbang po btsun mo dag dang sras kyang ston pa mdzad//

237b1: yab yum dag dang gnyen gyi rtsa lag sdug pa'i 'khor rnams dang // yul 'khor 'byor dang rin chen gter mdzod mang po btang mdzad nas// brgya byin tshangs pa dag dang lha mi rnams kyis phyag bgyis shing / drang srong
237b2: chen po mngon par b+hung ste nags na bzhugs par gda'/ / 'gro la sman slad gung lo drug tu dka' ba spyad nas ni// bsam gtan mkha' khyab rin chen mchog la bsam gtan mdzad par gda'// mu stegs can
237b3: gyi tshogs rnams thams cad tshar gcad mdzad slad du/ / sems can dag pa byang chub shed drung du yang gshegs par gda'// 'gro rnams sangs rgyas ye shes mchog tu yongs smin mdzad slad du// mi dbang smram
237b4: lta bu'i ting 'dzin mchog la bzhugs mdzad nas/ / sku yi tshul ni gang gis 'jig rten rnam par 'dul 'gyur ba// rgyal ba de 'dra nyid kyi sku yi cha lugs 'dzin par mdzad// ji ltar sgyu ma mkhan gyis 'gro ba rmongs
237b5: par bgyi slad du/ / sgyu ma mang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston bgyid pa// de bzhin 'gro ba'i sgron mas sems can 'dul bar mdzad slad du// sangs rgyas nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mang po rnams kyang ston// thub
237b6: pa dpa' bo la lar dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud 'dul ston/ / gang la pha rol mu stegs tshogs kyi 'gro ba ma mchis shing / rdul bral mya ngan ma mchis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa/ bla na med pa 'gyur ba ma mchis
237b7: 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ / khyod kyis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang nas byang chub brnyes// phyogs kyi lam rnams thams cad du yang 'khor la bskar bar mdzad// mi yi dbang po kun nas zhal ldan chu zla bzhin du bzhugs/
237b8: bde gshegs rang blung mtha' yas yul la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo// la la dag la sangs rgyas tshes kyi sku ni ston mdzad pa// rtag pa brtan pa ther zug 'gyur ba ma mchis gyur pa dang // ma bgyis ma skyes dri ma ma mchis

238a1: 'gog pa ma mchis chos/ / mig yor 'dra bas phyogs bcu dag ni shin du rgyas par 'gengs// ring por mi thogs par ni sdug bdag dang 'bral 'gyur gyis// 'dus byas 'di la byed cag yid brtan bya ba'i mi rigs
238a2: shes/ / 'gro ba thams cad rmi lam sbrum mig rgyu 'dra ba dang / mi rtag mi brtan skad cig par yang la la dag la ston// bde gshegs sku yi phrin las mtha' dang pha rol yod ma mchis// gsung dang thugs kyi 'jug pa'i spyod
238a3: yul dag kyang dpag mi lang / / dam mkha' lta bur rgya che tshad ma mchis pa ston mdzad de// rgyal ba'i spyod yul sems can rnams kyis 'tshal bar nus ma lags// phyogs bcu dag na mchis pa'i sems can ma lus ji snyed
238a4: de dag shA ri'i bu dang 'dra bar shes rab ldan gyur kyang / / rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal po'i dngos po'i yul tshad ma mchis pa// rgyal po'i spyod yul thams cad de dag rnams kyis rig mi nus// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
238a5: mkha' 'dra pha rol mtha' ma mchis/ / de ltar rgyal ba'i yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab ma lus pa// 'di ni rgyal ba'i sras rnams kun dang nyan thos rnams dang ni// rgyan gyi rgyal ba 'dus pa rnams kyis 'tshal bar nus ma lags
238a6: de ltar 'di dag las sogs mtha' yas thabs dang ldan pa yis/ / 'dul ba'i don du sku yi mdzad pa mtha' yas ston par mdzad// nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs par mtha' yas sku dang ldan gyur pa// mgon po rtog dang
238a7: rnam par rtog dang bral la phyag 'tshal lo/ / sdug bsngal ba rgya mtsho rgya chen pha rol rab tu rgal gyur pa// nyon mongs thul pa rgyal ba 'gro ba'i gtso la bstod pa yi// bsod nams ci mchis des ni 'di ni 'gro ba ma lus pa//
238a8: chub rin chen rab mchog zhi zhing bde la reg par shog/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzugs dbang phyug dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyis tshul dang

238b1: thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
238b2: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chud dam zhes bsnyun gsol lo/ / nyam nga ba nyung dpa// bskyod pa yang ngam// stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes kyang bsnyun zhes
238b3: gsol lo/ / 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos ngag 'jig rten gyi khams nyams dga' ba la ltar stsol cig ces kyang gsung ngo // de nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i byang chub sems dpa'
238b4: dang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khang pa brtsegs pa'i bkod pa chen po nges yongs su khyab pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs dag kyang mthong nas ngo mtshar du 'dzin cing de dag 'di snyam du
238b5: sems te/ gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can nas 'dir lhags pa 'di dag ci de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu 'am// 'on te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag gi mthu yin snyam mo//
238b6: de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed
238b7: 'di khang pa brtsegs pa sna tshogs du mas brgyan cing yongs su khyab par gda' ba ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/ / bde bar gshegs pa mchog tu ngo mtshar to// gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba
238b8: can nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags pa dag ci de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu lags sam/ / 'on te byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gi mthu lags// de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das

239a1: kyis byang chu sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di rin po che sna tshogs kyi khad pa brtsegs
239a2: pa du mas brgyan cing yongs su khyab par snang ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu ma yin gyi/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa'
239a3: sems dpa' chen mthu chen thob kyi mthu yin no/ / gsol pa 'di ltar 'di dag gi mthus 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa du mas brgyan cing yongs su khyab par gda'
239a4: ba ni skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyi smon lam dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yongs su sbyangs pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa mchog tu ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das
239a5: kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/ skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa nas dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yongs su sbyangs pa yin no// /
239a6: pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa yin te/ 'di gnyis sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par sprul pa 'di lta bu 'di dag ston to// pad ma'i
239a7: d pal gyi snying po khyod shar gyi phyogs cha logs su de na tse sdang ltos shig de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig sgrib pa med pas bltas
239a8: na shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi zhabs la byang chub sems dpa

239b1: sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob gnyis phyag 'tshal nas tshig 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog/
239b2: pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med/ bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam zhes spyan gsol lo// nyam nga ba nyung dam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar rig pa la gnas sam zhes kyang spyan gsolalo// zhes
239b3: smra'o/ / de bzhin du lce'i phyogs cha dang / de bzhin du nub dang / de bzhin du byang dang / de bzhin du 'og dang / de bzhin du steng dang / de bzhin du phyogs ba cu kun du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bya ma snyed na rin
239b4: po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i bkod pa chen po du mas brgyan cing yongs su khyab par mthong ngo / / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag kyang mthong ngo // sangs rgyas
239b5: bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi spyan snga na skyes bu dam pa de gnyis zhabs la phyag 'tshal bar yang mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang de shin du ngo mtshar cher 'dzin par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
239b6: sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 'di ltar skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyis sgyu malta'u 'i dzin mngon par bsgrubs pa ni
239b7: bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa mchog tu ngo mtshar to// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi
239b8: zhing thams cad na gda' ba'i slad du'o/ / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad pas// byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos phyogs

240a1: kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag dang skyes bu dam pa de gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba mthong
240a2: ba dang / / de bzhin du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des kyang phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag dang / skyes bu dam pa de
240a3: gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba mthong ba dang / mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor srog chags sum khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
240a4: chub tu sems bskyed pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
240a5: ldan 'das skyes bud dam pa 'di gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ji srid cig lags/ de'i mtshan ni ci zhes bgyi// bcom ldan 'das
240a6: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis legs par bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag
240a7: kyang de'i bya ba dang / de'i spyod pa dang / de'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur te/ de lta bas na pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod shin du legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do// byang chub
240a8: sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po sngon

240b1: byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa yangs pa tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong gi rdul phra rab ji snyed yod pa de snyed du tshad med pa/ de snyed du bsam
240b2: gyis mi khyab pa/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji tsam yod pa de bas kyang ches mang ba'i bskal pa byung ba de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin chen bsags pa dpag tu med pa bde ba kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba na/
240b3: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lor sgyur ba bla na med
240b4: pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser 'od seng ge'i rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba byung ste/ pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
240b5: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yon tan bkod pa gang dag yod pa de dag dpe cung zad tsam gyis cung zad cig brjod par byas nyen cig/ pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'di ji snyam du sems/
240b6: 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan
240b7: bkod pa mang ngam/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang lags so// bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ tshad ma mchis te/ dag gi las kyis lam gdab par srab ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
240b8: pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'di lta ste/ dper na mil la zhig gis skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshegs pa'i rtse mos rgya mtsho chen po las chu thigs pa gcig blangs na pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'di ji snyam du sems/ chu blangs

241a1: pa dang lhag ma lus pa de gang mang / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das blangs pa ni nyung / lhag ma lus pa ni tshad ma mchis so// bka' stsal pa/ pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod mos par bya'o// khyod kyi khong du chud par
241a2: bya'o/ / mi des skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshegs pa'i rtse mo des rgya mtsho chen po las chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs pa ji snyed pa de tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag
241a3: med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par blta'o/ / rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i phung po ji snyed pa de tsam du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od ser
241a4: ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan rin chen bsags pa dpag tu med pa bde ba kun du ston pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yon tan bkod par blta'o/ / de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
241a5: yang dpag tu med de/ / ji ltar de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dpag tu med do zhes bya na/ de las brgya stong du bsgres pa bas kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
241a6: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ches mang ngo / / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang de snyed do// bcom
241a7: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de ni theg pa gsum kho na las brtsams te chos ston to/ / pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po ngas bskal pa gAng gA'i klung bye ma snyed du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
241a8: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang / nyan thos kyi yon tan bkod pa dang / bde ba'i rgyu las brtsams

241b1: te chos bstan par 'dod kyang / nga'i spobs pa yang zad par mi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de'i mthar phyin par yang mi 'gyur ro// pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan
241b2: ' das de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po de'i gsung dpal 'jig rten gyi khams stong gi dbang phyug chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid ces bya ba'i rgyal po zhig zung
241b3: ste/ pad m-i'i dpal gyi snying po rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de la bu bye ba phrag brgya yod de/ rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag thams cad kyang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan par gyur to// de dag thams cad bran
241b4: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to/ / pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi yongs su longs spyod pa'i bskyed mos tshal ni bdun khri drug stong yod do rgya
241b5: bu re re la yang longs spyod kyi skyed mos tshal khri khri yod do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ce mo gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na
241b6: bud med mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pa de ni med do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med ming yang mi grag ste/ rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag thams cad kyang
241b7: tshangs par spyod pa las mur pa brdzus te byung ba sha stag go/ / sems can de dag thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi dga' ba dang / chos kyi dga' ba'i zas can yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing den la zas
241b8: rigs pa med par gyur to/ / pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de ni las gzhan med de bya de rnams dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das de la lo bye ba stong phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar

242a1: nga bsnyen bkur byas so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa des de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas tshad med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa yang dag par rab tu
242a2: bstan to/ / pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po tshad med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa tshad med
242a3: pa dag don du gnyer bar mi bya ba de gang yang med do/ / rdul ba tshad med pa gang dag brtsam par mi bya ba de gang yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa ni tshad med do// tshul khrims
242a4: ni tshad med/ / bzod pa ni tshad med/ brtson 'grus ni tshad med/ bsam gtan ni tshad med/ shes rab ni tshad med/ 'khor ba sangs rgyas su 'dzin pa ni tshad med// sems can dag la byams pa da med// shing gi
242a5: bkod pa dag ni tshad med/ nyan thos dag ni tshad med// gzugs yongs su grub pa dag ni tshad med/ dbyangs ni tshad med/ spobs pa ni tshad med pa'i phyir ro// pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po byang chub sems dpa' ni tha
242a6: rnams bskyed pa gcig gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci mngon par 'du byed pa de dag thams cad tshad med pa nyid du yongs su bsngo'o/ / de ltar yongs su bsngos pas cha med par 'gyur zhe na/ gang gi tshamams can
242a7: thams cad la yongs su bsngo bar byed pa de'i tshe sems can 'di dag thams cad skye ba med par mngon sum du byed/ sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su su pas das cu badzi ga kyi yongs tu
242a8: bstobs tshad med pa zhes bya'o/ / stong pa nyid tshad med pa'o// mtshan ma med pa tshad med pa'o// smon pa med pa chad med pa'o// mngon par 'du bya ba med pa tshad med pa'o// de ltar na 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag

242b1: pa'i mtha' chos kyi dbyings rnam par grol ba/ ma skyes pa/ dben pa/ bral ba/ mya ngan las 'das pa/ tshad med pate/ rigs kyi bu mdor na chos thams cad ni tshad med pa'o// de'i phyir chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa/
242b2: ma 'gags pa zhes bya'o// gang mi skye mi 'gag pa de ni tshad med pa'o// pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol
242b3: pos de ltar rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de la tshad med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa 'di yang dag par rab tu bstan to/ / des kyang chos tshad med pa dag la nges par sems par byas par
242b4: gyur to/ / de nas rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid kyis bcom ldan 'das de las chos dpag tu med pa bstan pa 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu ste yi rangs nas rab tu dga' ste dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bu de dag
242b5: dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ 'dren pa chos rnams kun la dbang sgyur ba// smra ba'i chogs rnams yang dag rab tu 'joms// bdud kyi sod dang
242b6: nyon mongs kun sel ba/ / mtshungs med ye shes mtshol phyag 'tshal lo// nyi zla dag dang me yi 'od rnams dang // brgya byin tshangs pa nor bu glog 'od rnams/ bde gshegs gzi brjid kyis ni meg mog gyur
242b7: mi mchog 'od mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / thub pa bskal pa rgya mtsho 'das par yang // dga' ba rnam la du ma spyod par mdzad// phrin las de yi 'bras bu yid du 'ong ba ste// des na 'gro bas pa lngas na ngoms mi
242b8: 'gyur/ khyedang rga dang na dang 'chis gtses shing // sems can sdug bsngal mang pos gzir gzigs nas// de dag rnams la thub chen thugs rje ste// rtag tu mi 'pho zhi ba'i chos kyang ston// srid gsum srog chags

243a1: kun gyi sman pa 'dra/ / 'dod chags zhe sdang mun pa thams cad spyod// thug rje bskyed pa mdzad nas chos kyi sman// zhi ba bla na med par rab tu ston/ mas kun gyi spyod pa rab tu mkhyen// rab byam nas/
243a2: rnams kun na srog chags kyi// mkhyen nas gang gis mya ngan 'das mchog la// reg par 'gyur ba de 'dra'i chos kyang ston// mi mchog khyod kyi thugs rje ci 'dra ba// ji snyed rab 'byam zhing gi nyan thos dang / rkyen bya
243a3: thub pa ma lus de dag la/ / de 'dra ba yi snying rje yod ma mchis// bsod nams phung po mtshan mchog rnams dang ldan// rgyal ba'i sku ni gser gyi ri bo 'dra// bye ba'i nyi las lhag pa'i gzi mnga' ba// mi mchog
243a4: mtshungs ma mchis la phyag 'tshal lo/ / chos sprin rgyal las chos char 'bebs pa na// gang dag rgya chen mos pa spyod yul ba// sngon gyi sangs rgyas spyod la 'jigs ma mchis// de dag rtag tu bde gshegs mdun
243a5: namachis/ / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bsam yas su// me mchog mthong ba rnyed par shin du dka'// bsod nams las kyis bsam pa yongs sbyangs pa// de dag mig lam rnam par 'dren rnams gdang // rgyal
243a6: ba'i sku ni chos dbyings rgyas par 'gengs/ / zhing rnams rab 'byam thams cad na yang ga dang // bzhud dang byon par mngon pa yod ma mchis// 'on kyang 'jig rten dag na snod bzhin gda'// bden pa gzigs
243a7: shing don dam ston pa'o/ / chos kyi sbyin bdag zhi ba'i thugs ldan pa// rgal nas srog chags bcings gyur gzhan sgrol ba// bde bar gshegs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyis skye ba'i shing ljon rtsa nas
243a8: bton/ / nga rgyal ri bo sra ba rdu'ang brags// rgod pa mi mnga' g.yo dang sgyu dang bral// rab zhi thugs dang ldan la phyag 'tshal lo// mi mchog chags pa thams cad yod mi mnga'// dgongs pas dang chu dang me dang

243b1: 'dra/ rgyal ba sems can kun la snyoms thugs ldan// rlung dang nam mkha' 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo// thub pa chen po yon tan 'di 'dra'i gter// bsod nams rgya mtsho las byung sku dang ldan// bskal pa khrag zig
243b2: dag tu de brjod kyang / / yon tan rgya mtsho zad par nus ma lags// yon tan rgya mtsho lha mis mchod pa la// bdag ni bu dang bcas te mchod pa bgyid// rgyal ba mchod pa'i bsod nams ci mchis pa// des na
243b3: thub pa chen po khyod 'drar shog/ pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de nas rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de dus gzhan zhig na// bskyed mos tshal na bsam gtan gyi gnas pas gnas shing 'dug pa'i glo g.yas
243b4: g.yon nas/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i pad ma bkra ba blta na sdug pa dag pa gnyis byung ngo // pad ma de gnyis las khye'u mong rin chen sems dang / rin chen mchog ces bya ba gnyis rdzus te byung nas dkyil
243b5: mo dkrung bcas te 'dug go/ / pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ltar rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas khye'u gnyis dkyil mo dkrung bcas te 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang tshigs su bcad
243b6: pa 'di smras so/ / khyed gnyis lha 'amaklu yin nam// gnod sbyin dri za mi ci 'am// mi 'am mi ma yin nam ci// dris pa smos shig grogs po dag/ pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ltar rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi
243b7: g.yas phyogs su byung ba'i khye'u gang yin pa des rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ grogs po chos kun stong pa yi// ming ni 'dri bar byed dam ci// chos rnams thams cad ming med na//
243b8: gang gi ming ni 'dri bar byed// stong nyid gang la'ang lha med cing // klu med srin po yod ma yin// mi 'am mi ma yin yang rung // thams cad de na yod med do// pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de nas khye'u gcig sho sa ngas rgyab/

244a1: po dpal gyi gzi brjid de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ming ni ming gis stong pa ste/ ming la ming ni yod ma yin// chos rnams thams cad ming med de// 'on kyang ming gis yongs su brjod// ming
244a2: gi rang bzhin gang yin pa/ / de ni ma mthong ma thos so// las kyis 'gags pa ma yin na// 'dri na gang gi ming zhig 'dri// tha snyad du ni ming byas nas// ming btags byas te bstan pa ni// kho bo'i ming ni rin chen sems//
244a3: gcig shos rin chen mchog ces bya// pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ltar khye'u gnyis kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras te mngon par shes pa lnga bsgrubs nas// rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de dang lhan cig
244a4: tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la
244a5: mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ltar khye'u de gnyis kyis dbyangs gcig tu bcom
244a6: ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ pad ma ngag dang dri ba da' dang / me tog phreng dang na bza' dang // 'on te zas dang skom gyis sam// rgyal ba ji ltar mchod par bgyi// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang
244a7: gnyis gtso/ / ji ltar mchod par 'gyur ba lags// don 'di legs par bstan du gsol// 'dren pa thos nas 'tshal bar bgyi// pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
244a8: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des khye'u de gnyis la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ lus can kun la phan pa'i phyir// byang chub tu ni sems bskyed na// mtshan mchog sum bcu gnyis ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas dag

244b1: la mchod par 'gyur/ / mi gang zhig gis sangs rgyas zhing // gang gA'i bye ma'i grangs snyed dag/ me tog rnams kyis bkad byas te// 'jig rten mgon la phul ba bas// gang gis 'dir ni thal sbyar nas// byang
244b2: chub tu ni sems btung na/ / 'di ni bsod nams ches mang ste// de la tshad ni yod ma yin// byang chub sems ni ci 'drag de ltar blo mchog gis bstan pa// de 'dra'i mchod pa gang yang med// de 'dra ba yi dpal yang
244b3: med/ pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ltar khye'u de gnyis kyis slar yang bcom ldan 'das de la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni// bdag cag yid ma yang dag 'chas// bla na med pa
244b4: seng ge'i sgra/ / lha dang mi dgags na mdzod cig/ ji srid du ni 'khor ba yi// sngon gyi mtha' ni mi dmigs pa// de srid bskal pa du mar yang // sems can phyir ni spyad par bgyi// ji tsam sngon gyi mtha' dran pa// rnam
244b5: grangs 'di yi tshul dag gis/ / sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// de srid bskal par spyad par bgyi// gal te de ring sran chad du// 'dod chags kyi ni sems 'byung ba// phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa yi//
244b6: sangs rgyas rnams ni bslus par 'gyur// de ltar zhe sdang gti mug dang / phrag dog ser sna'ang de bzhin no// rtag tu bden pa'i tshig smra zhing // rdzun gyi tshig ni spang bar bgyi// gal te de ring slan chad du/
244b7: rdul med byang chub ma thob par// bdag caganyan thos sems gyur// des ni brdzun du smra bar 'gyur// rnams kyang rang sangs rgyas su ni// bdag cag dga' bar mi bgyid gi/ sems can rnams la snying
244b8: rjezhi bzhal babye bar spyad par brtsi/ / ji ltar 'dren pa khyod kyi zhing // grub pa rnams na dag las// gzhan du yon tan bye ba skyed// phun sum tshogs pa'i shing du bgyi// den can pas gang yang me/

245a1: rang rgyal 'dren pa dag kyang med// de tshe bya ba tshad med pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig gnas// bde ba 'di dang ldan pa yi// skye bo dri ma med par 'gyur// sangs rgyas mdzod ni bzung bas na//
245a2: sangs rgyas chos rnams tshar phyin to// gal te 'di dag gzhan min par// de bzhin du ni 'gyur des na// rgya mtshor bcas dang ring bcas pa'i// sa 'di thams cad g.yos par shog/ tshig 'di smras pa'i mod la ni// sa yang
245a3: rab tu g.yos par gyur/ / sil snyan dag ni ma dkrol bar// de na thams cad sgra yang 'byin// stong phrag bye ba'i lha rnams kyis// me tog char dang phye ma'i char// spos kyi char ni yid 'ong dang // na bza' bye ba rab tu phab// pad ma'i
245a4: dpal gyi snying po de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du ngogs sam yid gnyis za na de ltar mi blta'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
245a5: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid ces bya bar gyur to/ / pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u rin chen sems dang / rin chen mchog ces bya ba de gnyis
245a6: gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na de yang de ltar mi blta'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di ni khye'u rin chen mchog ces bya bar gyur to// byang chub sem
245a7: dpa' mthu chen thob 'di ni khye'u rin chen sems shes bya bar gyur to/ / rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dang po sems bskyed pa ni de yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom
245a8: ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ji tsam du zab mo la mos par gyur pa dang / gang gi ming yang

245b1: mi dmigs pa de srid du 'di gnyis byang chub tu sems bskyed par ma gyur pa ngo mtshar to/ / bcom ldan 'das la skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i pha rol na sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la rim gro
245b2: bgyis par gyur/ bka' stsal pa/ gis kyi bu gang gA'i klung gi bye ma ni bgrang bas mtha' rtogs par nus kyi/ skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i pha rol na sangs rgyas dag la bsnyen bkur
245b3: byas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni de ltar ma yin te/ de srid du 'di gnyis kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed do// skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos shing yon tan pag/
245b4: tu med pa dang ldan te/ 'di gnyis kyi yon tan dag gi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// 'jig rten gyi khams
245b5: yon tan rin chen bsags pa dpag tu med pa bde ba kun tu ston pa zhes bgyi ba de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa de 'di nas
245b6: phyogs gang logs na mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu nub phyogs logs na ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin chen bsags
245b7: pa dpag tu med pa bde ba kun du ston pa zhes bya bar gyur to/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
245b8: 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / bran

246a1: pa dang bde bar bgyi ba'i slad du skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra bar 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos phran bum tshogs pa cing dra ba dang / cha ji tsam pa dang / longs
246a2: spyod ci 'dra ba dang / 'od ci 'dra ba dang / skyes bu dam pa de gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas mtshan jiskad ces bgyi ba de dag legs par bstan
246a3: du gsol/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyi smon lam chen po bshad pa thos nas byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang smon lam chen po yongs su
246a4: rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de'i
246a5: phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/ / byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi
246a6: ltar nyan pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi tshe'i tshad ni dpag tu med de/ de'i mtha' ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bar
246a7: du bshad kyang rtogs par sla ba ma yin no/ / rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'od dpag med kyi tshe dpag tu med tu zin kyang 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pa/ mi brtan pa// ther zug ma yin pa/ yun du gnas pa ma yinapa/
246a8: ste/ rigs kyi bu ma 'ongs pa'i dus 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar

246b1: 'gyur ro/ / de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi'i bar du de'i dam pa'i chos gnas te/ ji ltar bzhugs pa de bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang
246b2: sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub ste/ lhag chad med par 'gyur ro// gzhan du na sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ba med par zad do// byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang
246b3: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur/ de dag rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'od dpag med yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang na
246b4: po che sna bdun gyi pad ma dag dang shing ljon pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de ji ltar chos ston pa de bzhin du pad ma dag dang shing ljon pa de dag kyang chos kyi sgo brgya phrag du ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi
246b5: b ude stir de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos nub ma thag pa'i mtshan mo skya reng 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
